src: Mambo hayakwenda vizuri kwa Waitaliano katika Afrika Kaskazini tangu karibu mwanzoni. Ndani ya wiki tangu Italia kutangaza vita mnamo Juni 10, 1940, Hussar wa 11 wa Kiingereza walikuwa wameteka Ngome ya Kapuzo huko Libya. Katika shambulizi mashariki mwa Bardia, Wazungu walimkamata Mhandisi Mkuu wa Jeshi la Kumi la Kiitaliano, Jenerali Lastucci. Mnamo Juni 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Gavana Mkuu wa Libya na mrithi dhahiri wa Mussolini, aliuawa kimakosa alipokuwa akitua huko Tobruk.
mt: Things did not go well for the Allies in North Africa since June. Within a week of Italy declaring war on June 10, 1940, the 11th Hussars of the British Army had taken Capuzzo Hill in Libya. In the eastern battle of Bardia, the British captured the Chief Engineer of the Italian Tenth Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor General of Libya and Mussolini's heir apparent, was killed in a friendly fire incident while landing at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Ubuddha wa Tibetani una msingi wa mafundisho ya Buddha, lakini ulipanuliwa na njia ya mahayana ya upendo na mbinu nyingi za kutoka kwa Yoga ya India. Katika kanuni, Ubudha wa Kitibeti ni rahisi sana. Una Yoga ya Kundalini, kutafakari na njia ya upendo unaokumbatia yote. Kupitia Yoga ya Kundalini, nguvu za Kundalini (nguvu za mwangaza) huibushwa kupitia mkao wa yoga, mazoezi ya kupumua, urudiaji maneno au sauti na taswira. Kitovu cha fikira za Tibet ni Yoga ya Uungu. Kupitia taswira ya miungu mbalimbali njia za nishati zinasafishwa, chakra zinaamilishwa na fahamu ya wongofu inaamshwa.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism has its basis in the teachings of Buddha, but was later modified by the Mahayana path of love and many methods of liberation from Yoga of India. In the canon, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It has Kundalini Yoga, contemplation and the path of love that embraces all. Through Kundalini Yoga, the Kundalini (light) forces are released through the yoga posture, breathing exercises, chanting of mantras or sounds and images. The center of Tibetan thought is Yoga of the Void. Through the images of various gods the methods of energy are purified, chakras are activated and the awareness of emptiness is awakened.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Ubuddha wa Tibetani una msingi wa mafundisho ya Buddha, lakini ulipanuliwa na njia ya mahayana ya upendo na mbinu nyingi za kutoka kwa Yoga ya India. Katika kanuni, Ubudha wa Kitibeti ni rahisi sana. Una Yoga ya Kundalini, kutafakari na njia ya upendo unaokumbatia yote. Kupitia Yoga ya Kundalini, nguvu za Kundalini (nguvu za mwangaza) huibushwa kupitia mkao wa yoga, mazoezi ya kupumua, urudiaji maneno au sauti na taswira. Kitovu cha fikira za Tibet ni Yoga ya Uungu. Kupitia taswira ya miungu mbalimbali njia za nishati zinasafishwa, chakra zinaamilishwa na fahamu ya wongofu inaamshwa.

src: Mpango ulianza saa 2 na dakika 30 jioni saa za ndani (15.00 UTC) Waimbaji maarufu katika nchi waliwasilisha bhajan, au nyimbo za ibada, kwenye miguu ya Shyam. Mwimbaji Sanju Sharma alianzisha jioni, akifuatiwa na Jai Shankar Chaoudhary. Alionyesha chhappan bhog bhajan vilevile. Mwimbaji, Raju Khandewal aliandamana naye. Kisha, Lakkha Singh akachukua uongozi wa uimbaji wa bhajan. Sahani 108 za Chhappan Bhog (katika Uhindi, vyakula 56 vya aina tofauti tofauti, kama vile peremende, matunda, karanga, na kadhalika ambazo hutozwa kwa miungu) zilipeanwa kwa Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh aliwasilisha chhappan bhog bhajan vile vile. Mwimbaji, Raju Khandelwal aliandamana naye.
mt: 2:30 pm local time (15.00 UTC) The popular singers from the country performed bhajan, or devotional songs, on the feet of Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Chaoudhary. He also performed chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandewal joined him. Then, Lakkha Singh took over the bhajan of bhajan. Sahani 108 of Chhappan Bhog (in Hindi, 56 different types of food, such as peremende, fruits, nuts, and so on, which are offered to gods) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also performed chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal joined him.

src: "Sherehe hizo zilianza na onyesho maalum la kikundi maarufu duniani cha Cirque du Soleil. Ilifuatiwa na Simfoni Okestra ya Jimbo la Istanbul, bendi ya Janissary, na wanamuziki Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Kisha Kimbunga ya Daveshi ikachukua jukua. Diva wa Uturuki Sezen Aksu aliigiza pamoja na mwimbaji wa sauti mwembamba wa kiume, Alessandro Safina wa Italia pamoja na mwimbaji wa Ugiriki Haris Alexiou. Ili kumalizia, kundi la densi la Kituruki Fire of Anatolia kilifanya onyesho ""Troy""."
mt: "The celebrations began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul Symphony Orchestra, the Janissary Band, and musicians Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then the Daveshi took the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with male vocalist Alessandro Safina of Italy and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The celebrations ended with a performance by the Turkish dance troupe Fire of Anatolia in ""Troy""."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Abiria walipewa maji walipokuwa wakisubiri katika joto la nyusi 90. Mkuu wa Zimamoto Scott Kouns alisema, ""Kulikuwa na joto siku hiyo huko Santa Clara halijoto ikifikia 90. Urefu wowote wa wakati ukiwa kwenye vigari vya kuzunguka hewani hautakuwa raha, kwa kusema machache, na ilichukua angalau saa kumuondoa mtu wa kwanza kwenye kigari."""
mt: "Passengers were given water while waiting in the 90 degree heat. Chief of Fire Department Scott Kouns said, "It was 90 degrees in Santa Clara that day. Any amount of time spent in a fire vehicle in that heat would not be comfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person out of the fire vehicle."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Kulingana na taarifa za hivi punde, vipimo vya kiwango cha bahari vilionyesha tufani ilizalishwa. Kulikuwa na baadhi ya shughuli dhahiri za tufani zilizorekodiwa karibu na Pago Pago na Niue. Hakuna madhara makubwa au majeraha yaliyoripotiwa huko Tonga, lakini nguvu za umeme zilipotea kwa muda, hali ambayo iliripotiwa kuzuia mamlaka ya Tongan kupokea onyo la tsunami lililotolewa na PTWC. Shule kumi na nne katika Hawaii zilizoko au zilizo karibu na mipaka ya pwani zilifungwa siku nzima Jumatano licha ya tahadhari kuondolewa.
mt: According to the latest reports, sea level measurements showed a tsunami was generated. There were some reported tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. There were no major damage or injuries reported in Tonga, but power was out for a time, which was reported to prevent the Tongan authority from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii were closed on Monday due to the tsunami warning.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Johnny Reid, dereva mwenza wa timu ya A1GP ya Nyuzilandi, leo ameweka historia kwa kuendesha mbio zaidi katika Daraja la Bandari ya Auckland, Nyuzilandi, lenye miaka 48, kihalali. Bw. Reid aliweza kuendesha gari la A1GP la New Zealand, Urembo Mweusi kwa kasi zaidi ya kilomita 160 kwa saa mara saba juu ya daraja. Polisi wa New Zealand walikua na shida kutumia bunduki zao za rada ya kasi kuona jinsi Mr Reid alivyoendesha gari kwa sababu ya vile urembo ulikua chini, wakati polisi waliweza kumuweka Bwana Reid wakati alipopunguza mwendo hadi 160 Km/h.
mt: Johnny Reid, the New Zealand A1GP team's reserve driver, set a new record today for the Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand's 48-year-old legal speed limit. Mr. Reid was able to drive the New Zealand A1GP car, the Black Beauty, at speeds of over 160 km/h over the bridge. New Zealand police had trouble using their radar guns to see how Mr. Reid was driving the car because the Black Beauty was so low, but police were able to catch Mr. Reid when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Mtetemeko wastani wa ardhi ulitikisa Montana magharibi saa 4 na dakika 8 usiku wa Jumatatu. Hakuna ripoti za sasa zilizopokewa na Utafiti wa Jiolojia wa Marekani (USGS) na Kituo chake cha Kitaifa cha Taarifa za Mitetemeko ya Ardhi. Kitovu cha mtetemeko huo kilikuwa takriban kilomita 20 (maili 15) kaskazini mwa kaskazini mashariki mwa Dillon, na takriban kilomita 65 (maili 40) kusini mwa Butte.
mt: 4:08 p.m. local time on Monday, a 4.8 magnitude earthquake struck Montana. No reports have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The epicenter was about 20 miles (15 km) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 miles (40 km) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Jela la Abu Ghraib la Iraki limewashwa moto wakati wa ghasia. Jela ilikuwa na sifa mbaya baada ya udhalilishaji wa mahabusu kugunduliwa humo baada ya majeshi ya US kuchukua uongozi.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set ablaze during riots. The prison had a bad reputation after abuse of detainees was revealed there after US forces took control.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Bendi ilifuta onyesho pale Uwanja wa Maui’s War Memorial, ambalo lingehudhuriwa na watu 9,000, na kuwaomba mashabiki msamaha. Kampuni ya usimamizi wa bendi, HK Management Inc., haikutoa sababu yoyote mwanzoni ilipoghairi mnamo 20 Septemba, lakini ikalaumu sababu za kiutaratibu kufikia siku iliyofuata.
mt: 9,000 people were expected to attend the concert at Maui’s War Memorial, and the band apologized to fans. The concert promoter, HK Management Inc., did not give any reason for the cancellation on Sept. 20, but blamed logistical issues the following day.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Inasemekana uporaji ulioenea uliendelea usiku kucha, kwani maafisa wa utekelezaji wa sheria hawakuwako katika mitaa ya Bishkek. Bishkek ilielezewa kama iliyozama katika hali ya ""mchafuko"" na mtazamaji mmoja, huku magenge ya watu wakirandaranda mitaani na kupora maduka ya bidhaa za watumiaji. Wakaaji kadhaa wa Bishkek waliwalaumu waandamanaji kutoka kusini kwa uvunjaji huo wa sheria."
mt: "It is said that the widespread looting continued throughout the night, as police officers were not in the streets of Bishkek. Bishkek was described as being in a state of ""chaos"" by one observer, as people ran through the streets and looted shops. Some residents of Bishkek blamed the rioters from the south for this disruption of law."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Hapo awali, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, alitamka kampuni hiyo ilianza wakati kengele yake ya mlangoni haikuwa inasikika katika duka lake kwenye karakana yake. Aliunda kengele ya mlango ya Wi-Fi, alisema. Siminoff alisema mauzo yaliongezeka baada ya yeye kuonekana katika kipindi cha Shark Tank mnamo 2013 ambapo paneli ya onyesho hilo ilikataa kufadhili biashara hiyo mpya. Baadaye 2017, Siminoff alionekana katika chaneli ya ununuzi ya televisheni QVC. Ring pia alitatua mashtaka ya kampuni pinzani ya usalama, Shirika la ADT.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff had touted the company's start when his front doorbell wasn't ringing in his store on his corner. He invented the Wi-Fi doorbell, he said. Siminoff said sales increased after he appeared on the Shark Tank show in 2013, when the show's panel rejected funding the new business. Later in 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring also settled a lawsuit with a security company, ADT.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

Ring also settled a lawsuit with a security company, ADT.

Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "Onyesho la PBS lina tuzo zaidi ya dazeni mbili za Emmy, na muda wake ni mfupi kuliko tu Sesame Street na Mister Roger's Neighborhood. Kila kipindi cha onyesho kingeangazia mada katika kitabu maalum na kisha kuchunguza mada hiyo kupitia hadithi nyingi. Kila onyesho pia lingetoa mapendekezo ya vitabu ambavyo watoto wangepaswa kutafuta walipokwenda katika maktaba. John Grant, kutoka WNED Buffalo (kituo cha nyumbani cha Reading Rainbow) alisema ""Reading Rainbow iliwafunza watoto ni kwa nini wasome,…kupenda kusoma — [onyesho] liliwahimiza watoto kuchukua kitabu na kusoma."" Inaaminika na baadhi, akiwemo John Grant, kwamba hitilafu ya ufadhili na mabadiliko ya falsafa ya maudhui ya televisheni ya kielimu ilichangia kwa kutamatishwa kwa mfululizo."
mt: "The PBS show has won more than two dozen Emmys, and its run was shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Roger's Neighborhood. Each episode introduces a topic in a special book and then explores that topic through several stories. Each episode also offers book recommendations that children should look for in the library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (the show's home station) said, ""Reading Rainbow taught children why they should read…to love reading…[the show] encouraged children to take a book and read."" Some, including John Grant, believe that funding cuts and changes in the educational philosophy of educational television contributed to the show's cancellation."
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Maafisa wa mji wa Amsterdam na Makavazi ya Anne Frank wanasema kwamba mti huo umeambukizwa kuvu na unatoa hatari kwa afya ya jamii kwani walisema kwamba ulikuwa katika hatari ya karibu ya kuanguka. Ulikuwa umeratibiwa kukatwa mnamo Jumanne, lakini uliokolewa na uamuzi wa dharura wa korti.
mt: Amsterdam city officials and the Anne Frank Museum say the tree was infected with a fungus and posed a threat to public health, saying it was in danger of falling. It was scheduled to be cut down on Monday, but was saved by a last-minute court order.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Uhuru wa Wanyama na Jamii ya Kifalme ya Uzuiaji wa Ukatili kwa Wanyama (RSPCA) wanatoa tena wito wa kuwekwa kwa kamera za CCTV kwa lazima katika vichinjio vyote vya Australia. Inspekta David O’Shannesy wa RSPCA Wales mpya kusini aliambia ABC kuwa ufuatiliaji na ukaguzi wa maiti wafaa kuwa mahali pa kawaida pale Australia. ""Kamera ya siri bila shaka ingetuma ishara imara kwa wale watu wanaofanya kazi na wanyama kwamba ustawi wao ni wa kipaumbele cha juu."""
mt: "The RSPCA is again calling for CCTV cameras to be installed in all Australian abattoirs. Inspector David O’Shannesy of the new South Wales RSPCA told ABC that surveillance and inspection of carcasses should be a normal part of the process in Australia. ""A covert camera would certainly send a strong message to those working with animals that their welfare is a top priority."""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Habari zilienea katika jamii ya Red Lake leo wakati mazishi ya Jeff Weisse na watatu kati ya waathiriwa tisa yalifanywa kwamba mwanafunzi mwingine alikamatwa kuhusiana na upigaji risasi kwenye shule mnamo 21 Machi. Mamlaka ilisema machache kirasmi zaidi ya kuthibitisha ukamataji wa leo. Hata hivyo, asili iliyo na ufahamu wa uchunguzi iliambia Star-Tribune ya Minneapolis kuwa ni Louis Jourdian, mwana mwenye umri wa miaka 16 wa Mwenyekiti wa Red Lake Tribunal Floyd Jourdain. Haijulikani kwa wakati huu ni mashtaka gani yatawekwa au ni kipi kilielekeza mamlaka kwa mvulana huyo lakini kesi ya vijana imeanza katika mahakama ya shirikisho.
mt: News spread in the Red Lake community today as the funerals of Jeff Weise and nine of the ten victims were held. Another student was arrested in connection with the shooting at the school on March 21st. Authorities said more than a dozen people were questioned today. However, the source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdian, a 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be filed or what led authorities to the young man, but the juvenile case has begun in tribal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Watayarishaji wa maandamano walisema kwamba takribani watu 100,000 walitokea katika miji ya Ujerumani kama vile Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, na Hanover. Katika Berlin, polisi walikadiria waandamanaji 6,500. Maandamano pia yalifanyika katika Paris, Sofia huko Bulgaria, Vilnius huko Lithuania, Valetta huko Malta, Tallinn huko Estonia, na Edinburgh na Glasgow huko Uskoti. Katika London, takribani watu 200 waliandamana nje ya ofisi za baadhi ya wenye hakimiliki. Mwezi uliopita, kulikuwa na maandamano makubwa huko Poland wakati nchi hiyo ilisaini Mkataba wa Kupambana na Biashara za Bidhaa Bandia, ambao umesababisha serikali ya Polandi kuamua kutoidhinisha makubaliano hayo, kwa sasa. Lativia na Slovakia wamechelewesha mchakato wa kujiunga na ACTA
mt: 100,000 people were reported to have come out in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside the offices of some of the signatories. Last month, there were large protests in Poland when the country signed the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement, which has led the Polish government to decide to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have refused to join ACTA
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Takriban matukio 60 ya iPod zenye kasoro kutoa joto jingi yameripotiwa, hivyo kusababisha jumla ya mioto sita na kuwaacha watu wanne na majeraha madogo ya kuchomeka. Wizara ya Uchumi, Biashara na Viwanda ya Japani (METI) ilisema ilijua ajali 27 zilizohusiana na vifaa hivyo. Wiki iliyopita, METI ilitangaza kwamba Apple ilikuwa imewaarifu kuhusu matukio 34 ya ziada ya utoaji wa joto jingi, ambayo kampuni hiyo ilisema ""hayakuwa makubwa."" Wizara hiyo ilijibu kwa kuita kuhairishwa kwa ripoti na Apple kuwa kwa ""kusikitisha sana."""
mt: 60 incidents of overheating iPods have been reported, resulting in six fires and leaving four people and minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it knew of 27 such incidents. Last week, METI announced that Apple had been informed of 34 additional incidents of overheating, which the company said were ""not significant."" METI responded by requesting a report from Apple, which it said was ""very disappointing.""
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Apple Steve Jobs alizindua kifaa hicho kwa kutembea kuingia kwenye jukwaa na kuitoa iPhone kwenye mfuko wake wa jinzi. Wakati wa hotuba yake ya masaa 2, alisema kwamba ""Leo Kampuni la Tofaa itaandaa tena simu hiyo, Tutafanya historia leo""."
mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking into the auditorium and pulling an iPhone out of a glass case. During his two-hour presentation, he said, ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone. We're going to reinvent the music player. We're going to reinvent the camera. We're going to reinvent the Internet. We're going to reinvent the mail system. We're going to reinvent the calendar. We're going to reinvent the maps. We're going to reinvent the contacts. We're going to reinvent the entire way you manage your digital life.""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Seneta wa sasa na Mke wa Rais wa Ajentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner alitangaza uwaniaji wake wa urais jana jioni katika La Plata, mji ulio kilomita 50 (maili 31) kutoka Buenos Aires. Bi. Kirchner alitangaza nia yake ya kuwania urais katika Ukumbi wa Ajentina, mahali pale pale alipotumia kuanzisha kampeni yake ya Seneti mnamo 2005 kama memba wa ujumbe wa wilaya ya Buenos Aires.
mt: The current Senator and wife of Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for the presidency last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Congress, the same place she used to launch her Senate campaign in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires district delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA ilipata kujua kwamba licha ya video hiyo kufululizwa kwenye Intaneti, Big Brother haikuwa imekiuka sheria za udhibiti wa maudhui ya mtandaoni kwani midia hiyo haikuwa imehifadhiwa kwenye tovuti ya Big Brother. Sheria ya Huduma za Utangazaji huruhusu udhibiti wa maudhui ya Intaneti, hata hivyo ili kuchukuliwa kuwa maudhui ya intaneti, ni lazima yawe kwenye seva.
mt: ACMA learned that despite the video being posted on the Internet, Big Brother was not in breach of the online content regulation laws because the content was not hosted on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Services Act allows the regulation of Internet content, however, for content to be considered Internet content, it must be hosted on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Peter Kostello, mweka hazina wa Australia na mtu aliye na uwezekano mkubwa wa kurithi nafasi ya Waziri Mkuu Yohana Howad kama kiongozi wa Chama Huria ametupa msaada wake kwa tasnia moja ya nguvu za nyuklia huko Australia. Bwana Kostello alisema kuwa utoaji wa nguvu za nyuklia ukifanikiwa kiuchumi, Australia inapaswa kufuata matumizi yake. ""Kama itakuwa ya kibiashara, tunapaswa kuwa nayo. Yaani, hakuna upingaji wa nishati ya nyuklia kikanuni, Bw Costello alisema."
mt: "Peter Kostello, an Australian philanthropist and a man with a strong chance of succeeding Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has offered his support to one of Australia's most powerful industries. Mr Kostello said that if nuclear power was economically viable, Australia should have it. "If it's commercial, we should have it. That is, no nuclear power for fun, Mr Kostello said."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Huku medali kumi na nane zikipatikana kwa siku, baadhi ya nchi zimekosa kufikia jukwaa la medali. Ni pamoja na Uholanzi, huku Anna Jochemsen akimaliza wa tisa katika kitengo cha kusimama cha wanawake kwenye Super-G jana, na Ufini huku Katja Saarinen akimaliza wa kumi katika tukio hilo hilo. Mitchell Gourley wa Australia alimaliza wa kumi na mmoja katika kitengo cha kusimama cha wanaume cha Super-G. Mshindani wa Cheki Oldrich Jelinek alimaliza wa kumi na sita katika kitengo cha kuketi cha wanaume cha Super-G. Arly Velasquez wa Meksiko alimaliza kwa nafasi ya kumi na tano katika seti ya Super-G ya wanaume. Ukumbi wa Adam wa Zilandi Mpya lilimaliza wa tisa katika msimamo wa Super-G wa wanaume. Mtelezaji wa theluji asiyeona vizuri kutoka Poland Maciej Krezel na mwelekezi wake Anna Ogarzynska walimaliza wa kumi na tatu katika Super-G. Jong Seork Park kutoka Korea Kusini alimaliza wa ishirini na nne katika kikundi cha wanaume cha kuketi cha Super-G.
mt: 18 medals will be awarded today, but some countries have yet to reach the podium. The Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's Super-G standing, and Finland, with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the women's Super-G, are among them. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's Super-G standing. Czech skier Oldrich Jelinek finished sixth in the men's Super-G standing. Meksiko's Arly Velasquez finished fifteenth in the men's Super-G standing. The Adam's Hut of New Zealand finished ninth in the men's Super-G standing. Poland's best skier Maciej Krezel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished fourteenth in the men's Super-G standing.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Kesi ilifanyika katika Mahakama ya Birmingham Crown na ilikamilika mnamo Agosti 3. Mtangazaji, ambaye alikamatwa kwenye eneo hilo, alikanusha shambulio na kudai kwamba alitumia boriti kujikinga dhidi ya chupa alizokuwa akirushiwa na watu waliofikia thelathini. Blake pia alitiwa hatiani kwa kujaribu kuzuia mkondo wa sheria. Jaji alimwambia Blake ilikuwa karibu kuepukika ""alikuwa akienda kutumwa gerezan""."
mt: "The case was heard at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The broadcaster, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed that he had used a baton to protect himself against the thirty people. Blake was also found not guilty of attempting to prevent the course of justice. The judge told Blake that it was ""almost averted"" ""he was going to be sent to prison""."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Masomo mengine kwenye agenda kule Bali yanahusu kunusuru misitu ya dunia iliyobaki, na kuzisambaza teknolojia za kusaidia nchi zinazoendelea kukua kwa njia zisizo na uchafuzi mkubwa. Umoja wa Mataifa pia una matumaini ya kumaliza ufadhili wa kusaidia mataifa yaliyoathirika kutokana na ongezeko la joto duniani ili kuweza kupambana na athari. Pesa zingeenda kwa nyumba ambazo ni sugu-kwa-mafurikowa, usimamizi bora wa maji, na mseto wa mazao.
mt: Other items on the agenda in Bali include preserving the world's remaining forests, and spreading technology to help developing countries grow without major damage. The United Nations also hopes to end funding to help countries affected by global warming to be able to fight its effects. Money will go to homes that are flood-resistant, better water management, and crop insurance.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Hapo awali, Nigeria ilitangaza mipango ya kujiunga na AfCFTA katika wiki inayoongoza kwa mkutano huo. Kamishna wa biashara na tasnia ya Jumuiya ya Afrika Albert Muchanga alitangaza Benin ingejiunga nao. Kamishna alisema, “Bado hatujakubaliana kuhusu kanuni za chanzo na idhini ya orodha ya ada, lakini mfumo tulionao umetosha kuanza kufanya biashara mnamo Julai 1, 2020”.
mt: Earlier, Nigeria announced its intention to join the AfCFTA at the upcoming summit. Albert Muchanga, the Commissioner of Trade and Industry of the African Union, announced that Benin would join them. The commissioner said, "We have not yet agreed on the rules of origin and the approval of the tariff list, but our system is ready to start doing business on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Alipata sifa za kisiasa wakati wa muda wake Atlanta na alitambuliwa kwa elimu bunifu ya mjini. Mnamo 2009 alituzwa cheo cha Msimamizi wa Kitaifa wa Mwaka. Katika wakati wa tuzo, shule za Atlanta zilikuwa zimepata maboresho makubwa ya alama za mtihani. Muda mfupi baadaye, Jarida la Atlanta-Katiba lilichapisha ripoti kuonyesha shida za matokeo ya vipimo. Ripoti ilionyesha alama za jaribio zilikuwa zimeongezeka kwa haraka isiyowezekana, na ikadai shule ilikuwa imegundua matatizo lakini haikuchukua hatua dhidi ya matokeo. Ushahidi baadaye ulionyesha karatasi za mtihani zilivurugwa. Hall, pamoja na maafisa wengine 34 wa elimu, alishtakiwa mnamo 2013.
mt: He was recognized for his political work while in Atlanta and was named National Teacher of the Year in 2009. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had received major improvements in test scores. Shortly thereafter, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing test score problems. The report showed that test scores had increased rapidly and that the school had discovered problems but had not taken action against the results. Later evidence showed that test answers had been changed. Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Bomu moja lililipuka nje ya ofisi ya gavana mkuu. Mabomu matatu zaidi yalilipuka karibu na majengo ya serikali katika kipindi cha saa tatu. Baadhi ya ripoti zilionyesha idadi rasmi ya vifo kuwa vinane, na ripoti rasmi zinathibitisha kulikuwa na majeruhi hadi 30; lakini idadi kamili bado hazijajulikana.
mt: 1 bomb exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a three-hour period. Some reports showed the official death toll to be 11, and official reports confirmed there were up to 30 injured; but the total number is still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Yesu aliyekuwa na umri wa miaka 21 alijiunga na Manchester City Januari mwaka uliopita 2017 kutoka klabu cha Kibrazili Palmeiras kwa ada iliyoripotiwa kuwa dola milioni 27. Tangu wakati huo, Mbrazili huyo ameshiriki pakubwa kwa ajili ya klabu hicho kwenye mechi 53 katika mashindano yote na amefunga mabao 24.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus, who joined Manchester City in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of $27 million, has since played a key role for the club in 53 matches and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Hosteli iliporomoka katika Makka, mji mtakatifu wa Kiislamu takriban saa 4 asubuhi ya leo saa za ndani. Jengo hilo lilikuwa na mahujaji kadhaa ambao walikuja kuzuru mji mtakatifu siku iliyotangulia hija. Wageni wengi wa hosteli hizo walikuwa raia wa Falme za Kiarabu. Idadi ya vifo ni angalau 15, idadi ambayo inatarajiwa kuongezeka.
mt: 15 people were killed in a hotel fire in Mecca, a holy city of Islam, around 4 am local time. The building was hosting several pilgrims who came to visit the holy city yesterday. Many of the hotel guests were Arab nationals. The death toll is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Setilaiti, ambazo zote mbili zilikuwa na uzani wa zaidi ya pauni 1,000, na kusafiri kwa takribani maili 17,500 kwa saa, ziligongana maili 491 juu ya Dunia. Wanasayansi wanasema mlipuko uliosababishwa na mgongano huo ulikuwa mkubwa. Bado wanajaribu kuamua kiwango cha ukubwa cha mgongano na jinsi Ulimwengu utaathirika. Amri ya Kimkakati ya Marekani ya ofisi ya Idara ya Ulinzi ya Marekani inafuatilia vifusi. Matokeo ya uchambuzi wa uchoraji yatatumwa kwenye tovuti ya umma.
mt: Both satellites weighed more than 1,000 pounds and traveled at about 17,500 miles per hour. The collision was significant, scientists say. They are still trying to determine the size of the collision and how the world will be affected. The U.S. Department of Defense's Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency is monitoring the debris. The results of the analysis will be posted on the public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten aliwekwa katika nafasi ya 190 katika orodha ya Wamarekani 400 Tajiri Zaidi ya 2008 kwa utajiri unaokadiriwa kuwa dola bilioni 2.3. Alihitimu kutoka Chuo cha Sanaa na Sayansi cha Chuo Kikuu cha Virginia mnamo 1950 na alikuwa mfadhili muhimu wa taasisi hiyo.
mt: Batten was ranked at number 190 in the Forbes 400 Richest Americans 2008 list with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia School of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and was a major benefactor of the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "Gavana wa California Arnold Schwarzenegger alisaini kuwa sheria mswada unaopiga marufuku uuzwaji au ukodishwaji wa michezo ya video yenye vurugu kwa wasiofikia utu uzima. Mswada huo unahitaji michezo ya video yenye vurugu inayouzwa katika jimbo la Kalifornia kuwa na lebo iliyoandikwa ""18"" na kufanya mauzo yake kwa watoto wadogo kuwa na adhabu ya faini ya dola 1000 kwa kila kosa."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill banning the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in California to be labeled ""18"" and fined $1000 for each offense."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvall, ambaye ameolewa na ana watoto waliokomaa, hakuacha hisia kubwa kwa Miller, ambayehadithi ilimhusu. Alipoambiwa atoe maoni, Miller alisema, ""Mike huongea sana wakati wa kesi…nilikuwa najitayarisha kwa hivyo sikuwa ninasikia kwa kweli alichokuwa akisema."""
mt: "Duvall, who is married and has grown children, did not leave Miller with a lasting impression. When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during trials...so I was preparing for that, so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Duvall, ambaye ameolewa na ana watoto waliokomaa, hakuacha hisia kubwa kwa Miller, ambayehadithi ilimhusu. Alipoambiwa atoe maoni, Miller alisema, ""Mike huongea sana wakati wa kesi…nilikuwa najitayarisha kwa hivyo sikuwa ninasikia kwa kweli alichokuwa akisema."""

ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Waziri Mkuu Stephen Harper amekubali kutuma ‘Mkataba wa Hewa Safi’ wa serikali kwa kamati ya vyama vyote kwa ukaguzi, kabla ya kusomwa kwake kwa mara ya pili, baada ya mkutano wa Jumanne wa dakika 25 na kiongozi wa NDP Jack Layton kwenye PMO. Layton alikuwa ameomba mabadiliko ya mswada wa kimazingira wa wahafidhina wakati wa mkutano na PM, akiomba “uandishi upya wa undani na mkamilifu” wa mswada wa kimazingira wa chama cha Wahafidhina. Tangu Serikali ya Shirikisho ilipoingilia kati kuhusu ufadhili wa hospitali ya Mersey katika Davenport, Tasmania, serikali ya jimbo na baadhi ya wabunge wa shirikisho wameshutumu kitendo hiki kama sarakasi kabla ya uchaguzi wa kishirika utakaofanyika mnamo Novemba. Lakini Waziri Mkuu John Howard alisema kitendo hicho kilikuwa tu cha kulinda majengo ya hospitali kutokana na kushushwa hadhi na serikali ya Tasmania, kwa kutoa dola milioni 45 za Australia.
mt: Harper has agreed to send the government's "clean air" bill to a committee of all parties for review, before it is read for a second time, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for "substantial and comprehensive" changes to the Liberal environment bill, when he met with PM, asking for "a complete rewrite" of the NDP environment bill. Since the Coalition government intervened in the Mersey Hospital funding dispute in Davenport, Tasmania, the state government and some Coalition MPs have criticized this as a stunt before the upcoming November state election. But Prime Minister John Howard said this was just to protect the hospital buildings from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, by offering $45 million of Australian dollars.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Waziri Mkuu Stephen Harper amekubali kutuma ‘Mkataba wa Hewa Safi’ wa serikali kwa kamati ya vyama vyote kwa ukaguzi, kabla ya kusomwa kwake kwa mara ya pili, baada ya mkutano wa Jumanne wa dakika 25 na kiongozi wa NDP Jack Layton kwenye PMO. Layton alikuwa ameomba mabadiliko ya mswada wa kimazingira wa wahafidhina wakati wa mkutano na PM, akiomba “uandishi upya wa undani na mkamilifu” wa mswada wa kimazingira wa chama cha Wahafidhina. Tangu Serikali ya Shirikisho ilipoingilia kati kuhusu ufadhili wa hospitali ya Mersey katika Davenport, Tasmania, serikali ya jimbo na baadhi ya wabunge wa shirikisho wameshutumu kitendo hiki kama sarakasi kabla ya uchaguzi wa kishirika utakaofanyika mnamo Novemba. Lakini Waziri Mkuu John Howard alisema kitendo hicho kilikuwa tu cha kulinda majengo ya hospitali kutokana na kushushwa hadhi na serikali ya Tasmania, kwa kutoa dola milioni 45 za Australia.

But Prime Minister John Howard said this was just to protect the hospital buildings from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, by offering $45 million of Australian dollars.

src: Asidi sayanuri na melanini zilipatikana kwenye sampuli za mkojo kutoka kwa wanyamavipenzi waliokufa baada ya kula chakula kichafu cha wanyamavipenzi. Kampaundi hizo mbili humenyuka pamojakutengeneza fuwele ambazo zinaweza kuzuia kazi za figo, watafiti chuoni walisema. Watafiti waliona uwele zilizoundwa katika mkojo wa paka kwa kuongezewa melamine na asidi ya sianiuriki. Mchanganyiko wa fuwele hizi unalingana na wa zile zinazopatikana kwenye mkojo wa wanyamavipenzi walioathiriwa ikilinganishwa kutumia uchunguzi wa miale isiyoonekana (FTIR).
mt: 2 chemicals were found in the urine of the dead pets after they ate a tainted pet food. These two compounds together form a foam that can inhibit sperm, researchers said. Researchers found foam made in a cat's urine by adding melamine and cyanuric acid. The combination of these foams matches those found in the urine of the affected pets when compared using an invisible microscope (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Xinhua aliripoti kwamba wachunguzi wa serikali walipata vifaa vya 'sanduku nyeusi' vya kurekodi matukio kwenye ndege siku ya Jumatano. Mabondia wenzake pia walimuombeleza Luna. Tommy Dreamer alisema, “Luna alikuwa Malkia wa kwanza wa Kukithiri. Meneja wangu wa kwanza. Luna aliaga dunia mnamo usiku wa miezi miwili. Kipekee kama alivyo tu. Mwanamke hodari.” Justin “Goldust” Runnels ametoa maoni kwamba “Luna alikuwa mdhaifu kama mimi … labda hata zaidi … umpende na utamkosa… kwa matumaini yupo mahali pazuri.”
mt: Xinhua reported that government investigators found "black box" flight recorders on Wednesday. His colleagues also visited Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first Queen of Wrestling. My first manager. Luna died in the world two months ago. Just like that. A strong woman." Justin "Goldust" Runnels said that "Luna was weak like me... maybe even more... you love and you miss... I hope he's in a good place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Ingawa watu watatu walikuwa ndani ya nyumba wakati gari liliigonga, hakuna aliyejeruhiwa. Hata hivyo, dereva alipata majeraha mabaya kwenye kichwa. Barabara ambamo mgongano ulifanyika ilifungwa kwa muda wakati huduma za dharura walipokuwa wakiokoa dereva kutoka kwa Audi TT nyekundu. Mwanzoni alikuwa amelazwa kwenye Hospitali ya James Paget katika Great Yarmouth. Baadaye alihamishiwa Hospitalini Addenbrooke katika Cambridge.
mt: 3 people were inside the house when the car hit, but no one was injured. However, the driver sustained serious head injuries. The road where the accident occurred was closed for a time while emergency services were helping the driver out of the red Audi TT. He was initially taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Michezo hiyo ilianza saa 10 asubuhi na hali nzuri ya hewa na ingawaje kulikuwa na manyunyu ya katikati ya asubuhi ambayo yaliisha haraka, ilikuwa siku nzuri kwa raga ya watu 7. Wachezaji wa juu katika mashindano, Afrika Kusini, walianza vizuri walipowashinda Zambia walio katika nafasi ya 5 kwa 26 - 00 kwa urahisi. Wakionekana hakika kudhoofika katika mchezo dhidi ya dada zao wa kusini, Afrika Kusini hata hivyo walitia fora jinsi mashindano yalivyoendelea. Ulinzi wao wa nidhamu, ustadi wa kushughulikia mpira, na kazi bora ya pamoja ziliwafanya wajitokeze na ikawa wazi kuwa hii ndiyo iliyokuwa timu ya kushinda.
mt: The match started at 10 am and with good weather and despite the mid-morning fog that ended quickly, it was a good day for the men. The top teams in the tournament, South Africa, started well beating Zambia who were in 5th place out of 26 teams with ease. They looked certain to falter in the match against their southern sisters, South Africa, however they pulled together and it was clear this was the winning team.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Wakati wa miongo mitatu iliyopita, licha ya kubaki kuwa jimbo la kikomunisti, China imekuza uchumi wa soko. Marekebisho ya kwanza ya kiuchumi yalifanywa chini ya uongozi wa Deng Xiaoping. Tangu wakati huo, saizi ya uchumi wa China imekua mara 90. Kwa mara ya kwanza, mwaka uliopita China iliuza nje magari mengi kuliko Ujerumani na ikapita Marekani kama soko kubwa zaidi kwa tasnia hii. Huenda Pato la Taifa la China likawa kubwa kuliko la Marekani ndani ya miongo miwili.
mt: 3 years ago, despite remaining a communist state, China has boosted its economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown by 90%. For the first time last year, China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market for this industry. The Chinese National People's Congress may be larger than the United States within two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """Tutajaribu kupunguza utoaji wa dayoksidi ya kaboni kwa kila kipimo cha GDP kwa kiwango muhimu kufikia 2020 kutoka kiwango cha 2005"", Hu alisema. Hakuweka kiwango cha kukatwa, akisema itafanywa kulingana na pato la kiuchumi la China. Hu aliimiza nchi zinazokua “kuepuka njia ya kitambo ya kuchafua kwanza na kusafisha baadaye.’’ Aliongeza kwamba ""hawapaswi, hata hivyo, kuombwa kuchukua wajibu ambao ni zaidi ya hatua yao ya ukuaji, uwajibikaji na uwezo."""
mt: """We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount to reach 2020 from 2005 levels,'' Hu said. He did not set a target, saying it would be done according to China's economic growth. Hu urged developing countries to ""avoid the trap of first burning and then cleaning up.'' He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take responsibility that is more than their pace of development, accountability and capacity.''"""
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Msaada wa matibabu Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres na Shirika la Afya Duniani wanasema ni mlipuko mbaya zaidi uliorekodiwa nchini. Msemaji wa Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman alisema: “Angola inaelekea kwenye mkurupuko mbaya zaidi daima na hali inabaki kuwa mbaya sana katika Angola,” alisema.
mt: Angolan health officials, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organization say it is the worst outbreak ever recorded in the country. Medecines Sans Frontieres spokesman Richard Veerman said: "Angola is always on the verge of a major outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Kiongozi wa Mashtaka ya Umma, Wakili Kier Starmer, alitoa taarifa asubuhi ya leo akitangaza kushtakiwa kwa Huhne na Pryce. Huhne amejiuzulu na nafasi yake katika Baraza la Mawaziri itachukuliwa na mbunge Ed Davey. Mbunge Norman Lamb anatarajiwa kuchukua kazi ya Waziri wa Biashara inayoachwa na Davey. Huhne na Pryce wameratibiwa kutokea katika Mahakama ya Hakimu ya Westminster mnamo Februari 16.
mt: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer, announced this morning that Huhne and Pryce would be charged. Huhne has resigned from the Cabinet and his position will be taken by MP Ed Davey. MP Norman Lamb is expected to take the role of Business Secretary vacated by Davey. Huhne and Pryce have been ordered to stay away from the Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Hadithi iliyotolewa kwenye mchezo wa kifaransa wa kuigiza wa opera na Camille Saint-Saens ni wa msanii “ambaye maisha yake yanaamuriwa na upendo wa madawa na Japani. Kama matokeo, watendaji huvuta misokoto ya bangi kwenye jukwaa, na ukumbi wenyewe unawahimiza hadhira kushiriki.
mt: The story told in the French opera by Camille Saint-Saens is of an artist “whose life is haunted by love of drugs and Japan. As a result, performers are lured into drinking sake in the dressing room, and the theater itself encourages the audience to join in.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "Leonov, anayejulikana pia kama “Mwanaanga Nambari 11”, alikuwa kati ya timu ya kiasili ya Umoja wa Soviet ya wanaanga. Mnamo Machi 18, 1965, alifanya shughuli ya kwanza ya gari la kwanza la nje lililo na dereva (EVA), au ""matembezi ya angani"", akabaki peke yake nje ya chombo cha angani kwa zaidi ya dakika kumi na mbili. Alipokea ‘Shujaa wa Umoja wa Kisovieti’, heshima kubwa zaidi ya Jumuiya ya Sovieti, kwa sababu ya kazi yake. Miaka kumi baadaye, aliongoza sehemu ya Kisovieti ya misheni ya Apollo-Soyuz hivyo kuashiria kwamba Mbio za Angani zilikuwa zimekwisha."
mt: "Leonov, also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11", was one of the original Soviet cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first EVA, or "spacewalk", of a spacecraft, remaining outside the spacecraft alone for more than two minutes. He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the highest Soviet honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, thus marking the end of the Space Race."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Baada ya ajali kutokea, Gibson alisafirishwa hospitalini lakini alifariki muda mfupi baadaye. Dereva wa lori, aliye na umri wa miaka 64, hakujeruhiwa katika ajali. Gari lenyewe liliondolewa kwenye eneo la ajali takriban saa 1200 GMT siku hiyo hiyo. Mtu aliyekuwa akifanya kazi karibu na gereji iliyo karibu na eneo la ajali hiyo alisema: ""Kulikuwa na watoto waliokuwa wakisubiri kuvuka barabara na wote walikuwa wakipiga mayowe na kulia."" Wote walikimbia kutoka kwenye mahali ambapo ajali ilikuwa imetokea."
mt: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was airlifted to the hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, aged 64, was not injured in the accident. The truck itself was removed from the accident scene about 1200 GMT that day. A man who was working nearby the gas canister near the accident site said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and all were crying."" They all ran away from the area where the accident occurred."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: "Baada ya ajali kutokea, Gibson alisafirishwa hospitalini lakini alifariki muda mfupi baadaye. Dereva wa lori, aliye na umri wa miaka 64, hakujeruhiwa katika ajali. Gari lenyewe liliondolewa kwenye eneo la ajali takriban saa 1200 GMT siku hiyo hiyo. Mtu aliyekuwa akifanya kazi karibu na gereji iliyo karibu na eneo la ajali hiyo alisema: ""Kulikuwa na watoto waliokuwa wakisubiri kuvuka barabara na wote walikuwa wakipiga mayowe na kulia."" Wote walikimbia kutoka kwenye mahali ambapo ajali ilikuwa imetokea."

src: Kazi iliyofanywa ilikuwa hasa ya nadharia, lakini programu ilitengenezwa ili kuiga mitazamo iliyofanywa ya galaksi ya Mshale. Athari ambayo timu ilikuwa ikitafuta ingesababishwa na nguvu za mawimbi baina ya dutu nyeusi za galaksia na dutu nyeusi za Kilimia. Kama vile mwezi unavuta nguvu duniani, na kusababisha mawimbi, vivyo hivyo ndivyo Njia ya Kimaziwa hutia nguvu kwenye giligili la alama ya Mshale. Wanasayansi waliweza kuhitimisha kuwa udusi mweusi unaathiri udusi mwingine mweusi kwa njia ile ile ya kawaida. Nadharia hii inasema kuwa dutu nyingi yenye giza inayozingira galaksi iko karibu na galaksi kwa aina ya mwangaza, na inatengenezwa kwa chembechembe nyingi ndogo.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the team developed a program to simulate the behavior of the Milky Way galaxy. The effect that the team was looking for was caused by the gravitational pull between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Local Group. As the moon pulls on the Earth, and causes tides, so too does the path of the Milky Way pull on the Local Group. The team was able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way. This theory says that many galaxies with a lot of dark matter are close to a galaxy of the type of luminosity, and are made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Mjadala ulianzishwa na mzozo juu ya kutumia zaidi kwa msaada na ujenzi upya katika Kimbunga Katrina; ambacho wahafidhina wa fedha wabebandika kwa ucheshi “Mpango wa Bushwa New Orleans.” Ukosoaji huru wa juhudi za ujenzi upya umezingatia utoaji wa kandarasi za ujenzi upya kwa wajuzi wanaodhaniwa wa Washington.
mt: The debate was sparked by a dispute over using more for aid and new construction in Kimbunga Katrina; which aid donors have been criticized for their “Bushwa New Orleans” plan. A free review of new construction efforts has highlighted the delivery of new construction materials to Washington insiders believed to be corrupt.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Mjadala ulianzishwa na mzozo juu ya kutumia zaidi kwa msaada na ujenzi upya katika Kimbunga Katrina; ambacho wahafidhina wa fedha wabebandika kwa ucheshi “Mpango wa Bushwa New Orleans.” Ukosoaji huru wa juhudi za ujenzi upya umezingatia utoaji wa kandarasi za ujenzi upya kwa wajuzi wanaodhaniwa wa Washington.

A free review of new construction efforts has highlighted the delivery of new construction materials to Washington insiders believed to be corrupt.

Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Wakati kibonge kitakapofika Duniani na kuingia kwenye angahewa, takriban saa 11 asubuhi (saa za mashariki), kinatarajiwa kutoa onyesho lenye mwangaza kwa wakaaji wa California Kaskazini, Oregon, Nevada na Utah. Kibumba hicho kitaonekana kama vimondo vinavyopita angani. Kibonge kitakuwa kikisafiri kwa mwendo wa takriban kilomita 12.8 au maili 8 kwa sekunde, kasi ya kutosha kutoka San Francisco hadi Los Angeles kwa dakika moja. Stardust itaweka rekodi mpya ya wakati wote kwa kuwa chombo cha angani chenye kasi ya juu zaidi kurudi Duniani, na kuvunja rekodi ya awali iliyowekwa mnamo Mai 1969 wakati wa kurudi kwa moduli ya udhibiti ya Apollo X. Kitapita juu ya pwani ya magharibi ya California kaskazini na kitaangaza anga kutoka California kupitia Oregon ya kati na kuendelea kupitia Nevada na Idaho na katika Utah, Tom Duxbury, meneja wa mradi wa Stardust, alisema.
mt: When the comet reaches Earth and enters the atmosphere, it is expected to put on a show for Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The comet will appear as a bright meteor. The comet will travel at about 12.8 kilometers per second, fast enough to get from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for the fastest returning space object, breaking the previous record set in May 1969 when the Apollo X command module returned. It will fly over the west coast of California, and will light up the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah, Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager, said.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Daktari aliyefanya kazi katika Hospitali ya Watoto ya Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania atashtakiwa kwa uuaji uliochochewa baada ya mamake kupatikana ameuawa katika buti ya gari lake Jumatano, mamlaka ya Ohio inasema. Dk. Malar Balasubramanian, mwenye umri wa miaka 29, alipatikana katika Blue Ash, Ohio, kitongoji kilichoko takriban maili 15 kaskazini mwa Cincinnati akiwa amelala chini kando ya barabara akiwa amevalia tishati na nguo za ndani katika hali iliyoonekana kuwa ya matumizi ya dawa nyingi. Aliwaelekeza maafisa kwenye Oldsmobile yake nyeusi ambayo ilikiwa kwa umbali wa futi 500. Hapo, walipata mwili wa Saroja Balasubramanian, aliyekuwa na umri wa miaka 53, umefunikwa kwa blanketi zilizokuwa na madoa ya damu. Polisi walisema kwamba ilionekana kama mwili huo ulikuwa hapo kwa takriban siku moja.
mt: A pediatrician at Pittsburgh Children's Hospital will be charged with murder after the mother was found dead in his car trunk on Monday, Ohio authorities say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, lying on the side of the road in a dazed state wearing a bathrobe and pajamas and appearing to be under the influence of drugs. He directed officers to his Oldsmobile, which was about 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, wrapped in blankets with blood stains. Police said the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Ndio ununuzi mkubwa katika historia ya eBay. Kampuni inatumai kupanua vyanzo vyake vya faida na kupata umaarufu katika maeneo ambako Skype inamiliki nafasi thabiti, kama vile China, Uropa Mashariki, na Brazili.
mt: It's a big purchase in eBay's history. The company hopes to expand its foothold in areas where Skype has a strong presence, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Wakati mapigano yalipokoma na majeruhi kupelekwa hospitalini, takriban 40 wa wafungwa waliobaki walikaa kwenye yadi na kukataa kurudi kwenye seli zao. Wapatanishi walijaribu kurekebisha hali, lakini mahitaji ya wafungwa si dhahiri. Kati ya saa 4 na 5 usiku MDT, moto uliwashwa kwenye yadi na wafungwa. Karibuni, maafisa walio na vyombo vya ghasia waliingia kwenye yadi na kuwazingira wafungwa kwa vitoa machozi. Kundi la uokoaji wa moto hatimaye walizima moto huo saa 11:35 usiku.
mt: When the fighting stopped and the wounded were taken to the hospital, about 40 of the prisoners remained on the yard and refused to return to their cells. The guards tried to restore order, but the prisoners' demands were unclear. By 4:00 to 5:00 p.m. MDT, the prisoners set fire to the yard. Shortly thereafter, guards armed with tear gas entered the yard and sprayed the prisoners with tear gas. The fire team finally extinguished the fire at 11:35 p.m.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "Maoni ya moja kwa moja kwenye televisheni, yalikuwa ya mara ya kwanza kwa wakuu wa serikali ya Irani kukubali kuwa vikwazo vilikuwa na athari yoyote. Inahusisha vikwazo na umoja wa Ulaya kupiga marufuku kwa usafirishaji wa mafuta yasiyosafishwa, ambapo uchumi wa Iran unapokea 80% ya mapato ya nje. Katika ripoti yake ya kila mwezi ya hivi karibuni, Shirika la Nchi Zinazosafirisha nje Petroli ilisema mauzo ya nje ya ghafi yamepungua sana kwa miongo miwili kwa mapipa milioni 2.8 kwa siku. Kiongozi mkuu wa nchi, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, ameelezea utegemeaji wa mafuta kama ""mtego"" ulioanza kabla ya mapinduzi ya Kiislamu ya Irani mnamo 1979 na ambao nchi inafaa kujiokoa kutokana nao."
mt: "One-on-one interviews on television were the first time Iranian officials acknowledged that sanctions had any effect. It includes sanctions and the unity of Europe banning the export of unrefined oil, where the economy of Iran receives 80% of its foreign income. In its latest monthly report, the Organization of the Exporting Countries of Oil said that the export of unrefined oil has decreased significantly for two years for the amount of $2.8 billion per day. The supreme leader of the country, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the oil embargo as a "trap" that began before the Islamic Revolution of Iran in 1979 and that the country should be protected from it."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Huko Ufaransa, upigaji kura tangu jadi umekuwa uzoefu wa teknolojia ambayo haijaimarika: wapigaji kura hujitenga kwenye kibanda, kisha wanaweka karatasi iliyochapishwa mapema kuonyesha mgombea wao wa uchaguzi katika bahasha. Baada ya maafisa kuthibitisha utambulisho wa mpigaji kura, mpigaji kura hutumbukiza bahasha kwenye sanduku la kura na kusaini orodha ya kupiga kura. Sheria ya uchaguzi ya Ufaransa badala yake hupanga kesi hiyo kwenye msimbo. Madhubuti. Tangu 1988, ni lazima masanduku ya kura yawe maangavu ili wapigaji kura na wachunguzi waweze kushuhudia kwamba hakuna bahasha zinazoongezwa isipokuwa zile za wapigaji kura waliohesabiwa na kuidhinishwa. Wagombeaji wanaweza kutuma wawakilishi kushuhudia kila sehemu ya mchakato. Jioni, kura huhesabiwa na watu waliojitolea chini ya usimamizi mkubwa, kwa kufuata utaratibu maalum.
mt: In France, voting by mail has been a technological experience that has not yet been replicated: voters are separated into booths, then place a printed ballot into a ballot box. After election officials verify the voter's identity, the voter marks the ballot and signs a roster of voters. French election law instead requires that the ballot be sealed in a ballot box. Since 1988, it is mandatory that ballot boxes be opaque so that voters and scrutineers can see that no ballots are being added except those of registered voters. Candidates can send representatives to observe every stage of the process. In the evening, the ballots are counted by volunteers under the supervision of a senior official, following a specific procedure.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
