Baada ya maafisa kuthibitisha utambulisho wa mpigaji kura, mpigaji kura hutumbukiza bahasha kwenye sanduku la kura na kusaini orodha ya kupiga kura. Sheria ya uchaguzi ya Ufaransa badala yake hupanga kesi hiyo kwenye msimbo. Madhubuti. Tangu 1988, ni lazima masanduku ya kura yawe maangavu ili wapigaji kura na wachunguzi waweze kushuhudia kwamba hakuna bahasha zinazoongezwa isipokuwa zile za wapigaji kura waliohesabiwa na kuidhinishwa. Wagombeaji wanaweza kutuma wawakilishi kushuhudia kila sehemu ya mchakato. Jioni, kura huhesabiwa na watu waliojitolea chini ya usimamizi mkubwa, kwa kufuata utaratibu maalum.
mt: In France, voting by mail has been a technological experience that has not yet been replicated: voters are separated into booths, then place a printed ballot into a ballot box. After election officials verify the voter's identity, the voter marks the ballot and signs a roster of voters. French election law instead requires that the ballot be sealed in a ballot box. Since 1988, it is mandatory that ballot boxes be opaque so that voters and scrutineers can see that no ballots are being added except those of registered voters. Candidates can send representatives to observe every stage of the process. In the evening, the ballots are counted by volunteers under the supervision of a senior official, following a specific procedure.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Kama imedhibitishwa, utafutaji unakamilisha miaka minane ya Allen kutafuta Musashi. Kufuatia uchoraji wa ramani za chini ya bahari mabaki yamepatikana kwa kutumia ROV. Mmoja wa watu tajiri zaidi ulimwenguni, Allen ameripotiwa kuwekeza mwingi wa utajiri wake katika uchunguzi wa baharini na alianza juhudi zake za kuipata Musashi kutokana na mvuto wa maisha yake yote katika vita hivyo.
mt: As noted, Allen's search for Musashi has taken years. Following the mapping of the ocean floor, some of the wreckage has been found using ROVs. One of the richest men in the world, Allen has invested heavily in ocean exploration and began his efforts to find Musashi due to his fascination with the war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Ripoti kwenye televisheni zinaonyesha moshi mweupe unaotoka kwenye mmea huo. Mamlaka ya ndani inaonya wakaaji walio karibu na mmea huo kukaa ndani, kuzima viyoyozi na kutokunywa maji ya bomba. Kulingana na shirika la nyuklia la Japan, mionzi, cesiamu na iodini zimetambuliwa kiwandani. Serikali inabashiri kuwa hii inaonyesha kuwa vyombo vinayokuwa na Urani kwenye tovuti vinaweza kuwa vimetoboka na vinavuja.
mt: A report on television shows white smoke coming from the building. The government is advising people near the building to stay indoors, close windows and not drink water from the fire hoses. According to the Japan Atomic Energy Agency, cesium, iodine and uranium have been detected inside the building. The government is saying this shows that the materials in the building that were on the internet were contaminated and leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "Dk. Tony Moll aligundua Kifua Kikuu Kinachokinza Dawa Kabisa (XDR-TB) katika eneo la KwaZulu-Natal, Afrika Kusini. Katika mahojiano, alisema aina mpya ilikuwa ""ya kusumbua sana na ya kutisha kwa sababu ya kiwango cha juu cha kufariki."" Huenda baadhi ya wagonjwa waliambukizwa mdudu huyo hospitalini, kama anavyofikiria Dkt. Moll, na angalau wawili walikuwa wafanyakazi hospitalini. Katika mwaka mmoja, mtu aliyeambukizwa huenda akaambukiza wato 10-15 wa karibu. Hata hivyo, asilimia ya XDR-TB katika kikundi kizima cha watu wenye kifua kikuu bado inaonekana kuwa chini, watu 6,000 kati ya 330,000 walioambukizwa kwa wakati wowote maalumu katika Afrika Kusini."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll identified XDR-TB in the KwaZulu-Natal area of South Africa. In an interview, he said the new strain was ""very alarming and scary because of its high mortality rate."" Some patients may have been infected by the doctor himself, as he believes, and at least two were hospital workers. In one year, a person infected can infect 10-15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the general population of TB patients still appears to be low, with 6,000 of 330,000 cases in South Africa."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen ni mfumo ambao Utawala wa Shirikisho la Anga unadai ungeruhusu ndege kutumia njia fupi na kuokoa mamilioni ya galoni za mafuta kila mwaka na kukata uzalishaji wa kaboni. Hutumia teknolojia yenye msingi wa setalaiti kinyume na teknolojia ya kitambo yenye msingi wa radar ya ardhini ili kuwezesha wadhibiti wa trafiki ya anga kupata vyombo vya angani kwa usahihi zaidi na kuwapatia marubani taarifa za usahihi zaidi.
mt: NextGen is a system that the Federal Aviation Administration says will allow planes to use more direct routes and save millions of gallons of fuel per year and reduce carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology instead of the radar-based technology of the past to allow air traffic controllers to better track aircraft and provide pilots with more accurate information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Wanahistoria wameshutumu sera za zamani za FBI kwa kuangazia rasilimali kwenye kesi ambazo ni rahisi kutatua, hasa kesi za magari yaliyoibwa, kwa madhumuni ya kuongeza kiwango cha mafanikio cha wakala. Bunge lilianza kufadhili kikundi chenye nia chafu katika mwaka wa kifedha wa 2005 na kuaini kuwa FBI lazima itoe makachero kumi kwa ponografia ya watu wazima.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policies of hyping resources on cases that are easily solved, especially car bombing cases, for the purpose of increasing the agency's success rate. Congress began funding a corrupt unit in the fiscal year of 2005 and ordered the FBI to provide ten thousand dollars for adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39C Gripen ilianguka kwenye barabara kuu karibu masaa ya 9:30 asubuhi (0230 UTC) na kulipuka, kwa hivyo ikafunga uwanja wa ndege kwa ndege za kibiashara. Rubani alitambuliwa kama Kiongozi wa Kikosi Dilokrit Pattavee. Vyombo vya habari vya ndani vinaripoti kwamba gari la zimamoto la uwanja wa ndege lilibingirika wakati wa kuitikia.
mt: 39C Gripen crashed on the main road around 9:30 am (0230 UTC) and burst, thus closing the airport for commercial flights. A rescue was reported as Dilokrit Pattavee squadron leader. Local media reports that the airport's security car was hit while responding.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Katika miaka yote ya 1960, Brzezinski alimfanyia kazi John F. Kennedy kama mshauri wake na pia utawala wa Lyndon B. Johnson. Wakati wa uteuzi wa 1976, alimshauri Carter kuhusu sera ya nje, kisha akafanya kazi kama Mshauri wa Usalama wa Kitaifa (NSA) kutoka 1977 hadi 1981, na alichukua hatamu kutoka kwa Henry Kissinger. Kama NSA, alimsaidia Carter katika kushughulikia masuala ya dunia kidiplomasia, kama vile Mikataba ya Kambi David, 1978; kurekebisha uhusiano wa Marekani na China mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1970; Mapinduzi ya Irani, ambayo yalipelekea janga la mateka la Irani, 1979; na shambulio la Kisovyeti katika Afganistani, 1979.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and Lyndon B. Johnson. In 1976, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he helped Carter deal with issues of international diplomacy, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; the normalization of relations with China in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian Hostage Crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Huku akizaliwa katika mji mkuu wa Kroatia, Zagreb, Bobek alipata umaarufu wakati wa kuichezea Partizan Belgrade. Alijiunga nao mwaka wa 1945 na akakaa hadi mwaka wa 1958. Wakati wake na timu, alifunga mabao 403 katika mechi 468. Hakuna mtu mwingine aliyewahi kujitokeza zaidi au kufungia klabu mabao mengi kuliko Bobek. Mnamo 1995, alichaguliwa kama mchezaji bora katika historia ya Partizan.
mt: Born in the capital of Croatia, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the club, he scored 403 goals in 468 matches. No one else has ever appeared in more or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995, he was elected as the club's best player in history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae ni spishi ya familia Dromaeosauridae na ni binamu ya Velociraptor. Ndege huyu mwindaji aliye na manyoya kamili na mwenye damu ya joto aliaminika kutembea wima kwa miguu miwili na makucha kama Dinosau mdogo mwenye mwendokasi. Ukucha wake wa pili ulikuwa mkubwa, na kuleta chimbuko la jina Hesperonikasi linalomaanisha ""ukucha wa magharibi."""
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a member of the Dromaeosauridae family and is a relative of Velociraptor. This warm-blooded, feathered, fully feathered, bipedal dinosaur with a small tail was a small dinosaur with a small tail. Its second toe was large, and the name Hesperonychus means ""western claw."""
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Angalau watu 100 walihudhuria sherehe hiyo, ili kusherehekea adhimisho la kwanza la wanandoa ambao harusi yao ilifanyika mwaka jana. Hafla rasmi ya maadhimisho ilipangwa kwa tarehe ya baadaye, maafisa walisema. Wanandoa hao walikuwa wameoana katika Texas mwaka mmoja uliopita na wakaja Buffalo kusherehekea na marafiki na jamaa. Mume huyo wa miaka 30, ambaye alizaliwa Buffalo, alikuwa mmoja wa watu wanne waliouawa katika tukio la ufyatuaji risasi, lakini mkewe hakuumia.
mt: 100 people attended the event, to celebrate the first anniversary of the couple who got married last year. The official celebration was scheduled for later, officials said. The couple had married in Texas last year and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of four people killed in a shooting incident, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno ilikuwa na mita 120-160 za ujao za mafuta ndani yake wakati ilipoharibika na upepo mkali na mawimbi yakaisukuma ndani ya kizuizi cha maji. Helikopta ziliwaokoa wafanyakazi hao kumi na wawili na jeraha la pekee lilikuwa pua lililovunjika. Meli hiyo ya mita 100 ilikuwa safarini kuchukua mzigo wake wa kawaida wa samadi na mwanzoni maafisa walihofia meli hiyo huenda ikamwaga mzigo.
mt: 120-160 feet of fuel was on board when the ship was hit by strong winds and waves pushed it into a water barrier. Helicopters rescued the crew of twelve and the only injury was a broken nose. The ship was on a routine trip to pick up its usual load of sand and at first officials feared the ship would dump its load.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Luno ilikuwa na mita 120-160 za ujao za mafuta ndani yake wakati ilipoharibika na upepo mkali na mawimbi yakaisukuma ndani ya kizuizi cha maji. Helikopta ziliwaokoa wafanyakazi hao kumi na wawili na jeraha la pekee lilikuwa pua lililovunjika. Meli hiyo ya mita 100 ilikuwa safarini kuchukua mzigo wake wa kawaida wa samadi na mwanzoni maafisa walihofia meli hiyo huenda ikamwaga mzigo.
mt: 120-160 feet of fuel was on board when the ship was hit by strong winds and waves pushed it into a water barrier. Helicopters rescued the crew of twelve and the only injury was a broken nose. The ship was on a routine trip to pick up its usual load of sand and at first officials feared the ship would dump its load.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Mafanikio ya Vautier nje ya ukurugenzi ni pamoja na kususia chakula mnamo 1973 dhidi ya kile alichoona kama udhibiti wa kisiasa. Sheria ya Ufaransa ilibadilishwa. Uanaharakati wake ukarudi nyuma kwa miaka 15 ambapo alijiunga na Upinzani wa Ufaransa wakati wa Vita vya Dunia vya II. Alijirekodi katika kitabu cha 1998. Mnamo 1960 alirudi Algeria iliyokuwa imepata uhuru ili kufunza uelekezaji wa filamu.
mt: Vautier's achievements outside of his directorial work include the banning of a meal in 1973 against what he saw as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism returned for 15 years when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He was recorded in a 1998 book. In 1960 he returned to Algeria which had gained independence to teach film editing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Watu zaidi ya milioni nne walienda Roma kuhudhuria mazishi. Idadi ya watu waliokuwepo ilikuwa kubwa sana kwamba haikuwezekana kwa kila mtu kupata kuingia kwenye mazishi katika uwanja wa St. Peter. Skrini kadhaa kubwa za televisheni ziliangikwa mahali mbalimbali jijini Roma ili kuwezesha watu kutazama sherehe hiyo. Katika miji mingine mingi ya Italia na ulimwengu kwa ujumla, haswa katika Polandi, mipangilio sawa ilifanywa, ambayo ilionekana na idadi kubwa ya watu.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was impossible for everyone to enter the funeral at St. Peter's. Large TV screens were set up in various places in the city of Rome to allow people to watch the event. In other cities in Italy and around the world, especially in Poland, the same arrangements were made, which was seen by a large number of people.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Kwa mujibu wa ripoti, ghorofa katika Mtaa wa Macbeth ililipuka kwa sababu ya uvujaji wa gesi. Afisa wa kampuni ya gesi alikuwa anaripoti mahali pa tukio baada ya jirani kupiga simu kuhusu uvujaji wa gesi. Afisa alipowasili, ghorofa ililipuka. Hakuna majeraha makubwa yaliyoripotiwa, lakini angalau watu watano katika eneo wakati wa mlipuko huo walitibiwa kwa dalili za mshtuko. Hakuna mtu alikuwa ndani ya nyumba. Kwa wakati huo, takriban wakaazi 100 waliokolewa kutoka kwenye eneo hilo.
mt: According to reports, the roof of a building in Macbeth Street collapsed due to gas leakage. A gas company official was reporting the scene after a neighbor called about gas leakage. The official arrived, and the roof collapsed. No serious injuries have been reported, but at least five people in the area at the time of the collapse were treated for shock. No one was inside the building. At the time, about 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Vifo vilikuwa vya Nicholas Alden, 25, na Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback alikuwa dereva. Edgar Veguilla alipata majeraha ya mkono na taya huku Kristoffer Schneider akihitaji upasuaji wa kurekebisha uso wake. Silaha ya Uka ilikosa kufanya kazi huku ikilenga kichwa cha mwanamume wa tano. Schneider ana maumivu yanayoendelea, upofu katika jicho moja, hana sehemu ya fuvu na uso uliotengenezwa kwa titani. Schneider alitoa ushahidi kupitia kiungo cha video kutoka makazi ya Jeshi la Anga la Amerika katika nchi yake.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was the driver. Edgar Veguilla suffered hand and leg injuries while Kristoffer Schneider required surgery to repair his face. The UCA missed its target, a male. Schneider has ongoing injuries, lost an eye, has no spleen and has a titanium face. Schneider gave his testimony via video from his home at the U.S. Air Force base in his country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Gofu na raga zote zimepangwa kurejea kwenye Michezo ya Olimpiki. Kamati ya Kimataifa ya Olimpiki ilipigia kura kujumuisha spoti hiyo katika mkutano wake mkuu wa bodi katika Berlin leo. Raga, hususan muungano wa raga, na gofu ziliteuliwa kushiriki katika Olimpiki. Michezo ya Boga, karate na kujiririka ilijaribu kuingia kwenye ratiba ya olimpiki vilevile mpira wa chini na mpira laini, ambayo ilitolewa katika Michezo ya Olimpiki mwaka wa 2005. Kura bado lazima ithibitishwe na IOC yote kwenye mkutano wake wa Oktoba katika Kopenhagen.
mt: All sports have been approved to return to the Olympics. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sport in its meeting in Berlin today. Boxing, karate and bowling were also approved to participate in the Olympics. Soccer and rugby, which were introduced in the 2005 Olympics, were also considered. The vote must be approved by the entire IOC in its October meeting in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: Mnamo September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness alitia saini makubaliano ya kukodishwa kwa kiwanda cha pombe cha St James' Gate kilicho huko Dublin, Ireland. Miaka 250 baadaye, Guinness imekua kuwa biashara ya kimataifa ambayo hupata mauzo ya yuro bilioni 10 (dola bilioni 14.7 za Marekani) kila mwaka.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a lease for a brewery at St James' Gate in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has become an international business that sells $10 billion (US$14.7 billion) worth of beer every year.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Aina ya homa ya ndege iliyo hatari kwa binadamu, H5N1, imethibitishwa kuambukiza bata mwitu aliyekufa, aliyepatikana Jumatatu, katika kinamasi karibu na Lyon mashariki mwa Ufaransa. Ufaransa ni nchi ya saba katika Jumuiya ya Ulaya kukabiliwa na virusi hivi; kufuatia Austria, Ujerumani, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Ugiriki na Italia. Matukio yanayoshukiwa ya H5N1 katika Kroatia na Denmaki hayajathibitishwa.
mt: A potentially deadly strain of bird flu, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a wild duck that died on Monday, in a marsh near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to be hit by the virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Outbreaks suspected of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark have not been confirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Walinda amani wa Umoja wa Mataifa, ambao waliwasili Haiti baada ya mtetemeko wa ardhi wa 2010, wanalaumiwa kwa ueneaji wa ugonjwa huo ulioanza karibu na kambi ya kikosi hicho. Kulingana na shtaka hilo, uchafu kutoka kwenye kambi ya Umoja wa Mataifa haukutakaswa vizuri, hivyo kusababisha bakteria kuingia kwenye tawi la Mto Artibonite, mojawapo ya mito mikubwa sana ya Haiti. Kabla ya kufika kwa vikosi, Haiti haikuwa imekumbana na shida zinazohusiana na magonjwa tangu miaka ya 1800. Taasisi ya Haki na Demokrasia ya Haiti imerejelea utafiti huru ambao unapendekeza kwamba kikosi cha kulinda amani cha Kinepali cha Umoja wa Mataifa kilileta ugonjwa huo Haiti bila kujua. Danielle Lantagne, mtaalamu wa UN kuhusu ugonjwa huo, alisema kuna uwezekano mkurupuko huo ulisababishwa na walinda amani.
mt: 2010 Haiti earthquake peacekeepers are blamed for the spread of the disease. According to the complaint, the UN peacekeepers' camp was not properly cleaned, allowing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Before the arrival of the peacekeepers, Haiti had not been affected by disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Rights and Democracy has commissioned an independent study that suggests that the UN's Kinepali peacekeeping force brought the disease to Haiti without knowing. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, said there was a possibility that the outbreak was caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Serikali ya Ayalandi inasisitiza dharura ya sheria za bunge ili kurekebisha hali. ""Sasa ni muhimu kwa mtazamo wa afya ya umma na haki ya jinai kwamba sheria itungwe haraka iwezekanavyo"", alisema msemaji wa serikali. Waziri wa afya alieleza wasiwasi kwa watu walionufaika kwa uhalali wa mda wa vitu vilivyohusika, na kutolewa kwa hukumu ya mambo yanayohusiana na madawa tangu kuanza kwa mabadiliko ambayo sasa hayaambatani na katiba."
mt: "The government of Ayalandi stresses the urgency of legislative action to correct the situation. ""It is now important for the public health and criminal justice perspective that legislation be drafted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesman. The health minister explained people's concerns about the legality of the substances, and the issuance of rulings on matters related to drugs since the start of the changes that now conflict with the constitution."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Christopher Garcia, msemaji wa Idara ya Polisi ya Los Angeles, alisema mtuhumiwa wa ukosefu wa kiume anachunguzwa kwa uingiaji bila ruhusa badala ya uharibifu. Kibao hakikuharibiwa; ugeuzi ulifanywa kutumia maturubai meusi yaliyopambwa kwa ishara za amani na moyo ili kubadilisha “O” kusomeka kama “e” ndogo.
mt: Los Angeles Police Department spokesman Christopher Garcia said the suspect is being investigated for unlawful entry instead of vandalism. No damage was done; the graffiti was changed using black paint with peace and heart symbols to change the "O" to a small "e".
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno ni mwalimu maarufu wa Kiingereza lakini mwenye utata ambaye alifunza chini ya Elimu ya Kisasa na King's Glory ambaye alidai kuwa na wanafunzi 9,000 katika kilele cha kazi yake. Katika maelezo yake alitumia maneno ambayo wazazi wengine walichukulia kuwa ya kiupuzi na mara nyingi alitumia matusi darasani. Elimu ya Kisasa ilimlaumu kwa kuchapa matangazo makubwa kwenye mabasi bila idhini na kudanganya kwa kusema kwamba alikuwa mwalimu mkuu wa Kiingereza. Pia alilaumiwa awali kwa kukiuka hakimiliki, lakini hakushtakiwa. Mwanafunzi wa awali alisema kwamba ‘alitumia lugha ya mtaani darasani, kufunza ujuzi wa kutongoza katika maandishi, na alikuwa kama tu rafiki wa wanafunzi.’
mt: A well-known English teacher but controversial one who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his lectures he used words that other parents considered vulgar and often used profanity in class. Modern Education was criticized for making large advertisements on buses without permission and claiming that he was the main English teacher. He was also previously criticized for copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that "he used street language in class, taught the art of writing in the letters, and was like a friend to the students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Polisi wa kitambo wa Filipino amewateka nyara watalii wa Hong Kong kwa kuteka basi lao katika Manila, mji mkuu wa Ufilipino. Rolando Mendoza alifyatua bunduki yake ya M16 kwa watalii. Mateka kadhaa wamenusuriwa na angalau sita wamethibitishwa kufa kufikia sasa. Mateka sita, wakiwemo watoto na wazee, waliachiliwa mapema kama vile wapiga picha wa Ufilipino. Wapiga picha baadaye walichukua nafasi ya mwanamke mzee kwani alihitaji kwenda haja. Mendoza alivamiwa kwa risasi.
mt: Police in the Philippines have shot dead a Hong Kong tourist after opening fire on their bus in Manila, the country's capital. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several people have been injured and at least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six others, including children and elderly, were taken to hospital early on. A photographer later took the place of an elderly woman as she needed to go to the toilet. Mendoza was shot dead by police.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazili ndiyo nchi kubwa zaidi duniani ya Katoliki ya Kirumi, na Kanisa Katoliki ya Kirumi limepinga mara kwa mara uhalalishaji wa ndoa za jinsia moja nchini humo. Kongamano la Kitaifa la Brazili limejadili uhalalishaji kwa miaka 10, na ndoa kama hizo za kiserikali sasa hivi ni halali tu katika Rio Grande do Sul. Mswada halisi ulitungwa na meya wa awali wa Sao Paulo, Marta Suplicy. Sheria iliyopendekezwa, baada ya kurekebishwa, sasa iko mikononi mwa Roberto Jefferson. Waandamanaji wanatumaini kukusanya ombi lenye saini milioni 1.2 ili kuliwasilisha kwenye Kongamano la Kitaifa mnamo Novemba.
mt: Brazil is the largest Catholic country in the world, and the Catholic Church has repeatedly opposed same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has discussed legalization for ten years, and such marriages are now legal only in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was written by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed law, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Supporters hope to collect one million signatures to present at the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Dakika tano ndani ya onyesho upepo unaanza kuingia, takriban dakika moja baadaye, upepo unafikia kilomita 70 kwa saa…kisha mvua inakuja, lakini kwa nguvu na kubwa sana kiasi kwamba inapiga ngozi yako kama sindano, kisha mvua ya mawe ikaanguka toka angani, watu wakapata wasiwasi na kupiga mayowe na kukanyangana. Nilimpoteza dadangu na rafiki yake, na nikiwa njiani kulikuwa na watu wawili wenye ulemavu kwenye viti vya magurudumu, watu waliruka tu juu yao na kuwasukuma,"" Armand Versace alisema."
mt: 5 minutes into the show, the wind starts to pick up, about a minute later, the wind is at 70 mph…then the rain comes, but with such force that it feels like a sandblaster, then the hail comes down from the sky, people get scared and start running around. I lost my mother and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just ran over them," Armand Versace said.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Dhoruba, iliyo maili 645 (kilomita 1040) magharibi mwa visiwa vya Cape Verde, ina uwezekano wa kutengana kabla ya kutisha maeneo yoyote ya ardhi, watabiri wanasema. Fred hivi sasa ina upepo wa maili 105 kwa saa (kilomita 165 kwa saa) na inaelekea kaskazini magharibi. Fred ndicho kimbunga cha kitropiki chenye nguvu zaidi kuwahi kurekodiwa kusini na mashariki katika Atlantiki kufikia sasa tangu ujio wa picha za setalaiti, na kimbunga kikuu cha tatu tu katika rekodi mashariki mwa 35° Magharibi.
mt: 645 miles (1040 km) west of Cape Verde Islands, Fred has a chance of becoming a tropical storm before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred is currently at 105 mph (165 km/h) and moving west-northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded south and east of the Atlantic since satellite imagery began, and the third strongest ever recorded east of 35° West.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Kiwango cha 802.11n hufanya kazi katika masafa ya gigahezi 2.4 na gigahezi 5.0. Hii itaiwezesha kutangamana kwa nyuma na 802.11a, 802.11b na 802.11g, mradi tu kituo cha ardhini kina redio mbili. Kasi za 802.11n ni haraka sana kuliko zile za watangulizi wake zikiwa upeo wa kinadharia wa kiwango cha juu cha 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n operates in the 2.4 and 5.0 GHz bands. This will allow backward compatibility with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, a single radio device will have two radios. The speeds of 802.11n are much faster than its predecessors with a theoretical maximum of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Aliyeshinda nishani ya dhahabu ya Olimpiki alikuwa amepangiwa kuogelea katika mtindo huru wa mita 100 na mita 200 na mbio tatu za kupokezana vijiti katika Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola, lakini kwa sababu ya malalamiko yake uzima wake umekuwa na shaka. Hakuweza kunywa dawa zinazohitajika kutuliza maumivu yake kwani zimepigwa marufuku katika Michezo.
mt: The gold medalist was banned from competing in the free style 100 and 200 meter runs and three relay races in the Commonwealth Games, but because of his complaints about his health, his life has been in doubt. He could not take the required medication to relieve his pain because it was banned in the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

Hakuweza kunywa dawa zinazohitajika kutuliza maumivu yake kwani zimepigwa marufuku katika Michezo.

He could not take the required medication to relieve his pain because it was banned in the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Ramani ya kimataifa ya zilizala ya Utafiti wa Jiolojia wa Marekani haikuonyesha zilizala huko Aisilandi katika wiki iliyotangulia. Ofisi ya Hali ya Hewa ya Iceland pia iliripoti kutokuwa na shughuli za tetemeko la ardhi katika eneo la Hekla masaa 48 yaliyopita. Shughuli kuu ya mtetemeko wa ardhi iliyokuwa na matokeo ya mbadiliko wa awamu ilikuwa imetokea mnamo 10 Machi upande wa kaskazini mashariki mwa bonde kuu la kilele cha volikano. Mawingu mazito yasiyo na uhusiano na shughuli zozote za volkano yaliripotiwa katika chini ya mlima. Mawingu yalitoa uwezekano wa mkanganyiko kuhusu kama mlipuko halisi ulifanyika.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's global earthquake map did not show any earthquakes in Iceland in the previous week. Iceland's Meteorological Office also reported no volcanic activity in the area of Hekla 48 hours ago. The main volcanic eruption with the most significant impact occurred on March 10 in the northeastern part of the main volcanic crater. Heavy clouds with no relation to volcanic activity were reported below the mountain. Clouds were reported to be a possibility of confusion about whether a real eruption occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Chombo cha kuzunguka mwezi Chandrayaan-1 kisichoendeshwa na mtu kilitoa Kichunguza Athari za Mwezi (MIP) chake, ambacho kilisonga kwa kasi katika uso wa Mwezi kwa mwendo wa kilomita 1.5 kwa sekunde (maili 3000 kwa saa), na kikatua kwa kishindo kwa mafanikio karibu na ncha ya kusini ya Mwezi. Zaidi ya kubeba zana tatu muhimu za kisayansi, kichunguza mwezi pia kilibeba picha za bendera ya kitaifa ya India, iliyochorwa kwenye pande zake zote.
mt: The Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which was not crewed, was released by Chandrayaan-1, which sped up in the Moon's orbit at a rate of 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour), and impacted the Moon's surface near its southern pole. In addition to three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried a picture of the national flag of India, which was printed on all its sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Kesi za kwanza za ugonjwa huo msimu huu ziliripotiwa mwishoni mwa Julai. Ugonjwa huo hubebwa na nguruwe, kisha huhamia kwa binadamu kupitia mbu. Mkurupuko huo umechochea serikali ya India kuchukua hatua kama kuwatuma wawinda nguruwe katika maeneo yaliyoathiriwa sana, na kusambaza maelfu ya mapazia ya mbu na kunyunyiza dawa za kuua wadudu. Vichupa milioni kadhaa vya chanjo ya uvimbe wa ubongo vimeahidiwa na serikali, ambavyo vitasaidia kuandaa mawakala wa afya kwa mwaka ujao. Mipango ya kufikisha chanjo mwaka huu katika maeneo yanayojulikana kihistoria kuathirika sana ilicheleweshwa kwa sababu ya ukosefu wa fedha na kipaumbele cha chini ikilinganishwa na magonjwa mengine.
mt: The first cases of the disease this season were reported at the end of July. The disease is spread by deer, then to humans through ticks. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to consider sending hunters into affected areas, and distributing millions of deer ticks and spraying insecticides. Millions of brain-eating worm vaccines have been promised by the government, which will help prepare health workers for next year. Plans to vaccinate areas known to be historically affected this year were shelved due to lack of funds and low priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Marekebisho yaliyopendekezwa tayari yalipitia nyumba zote mbili mnamo 2011 Mabadiliko yalifanywa katika hiki kipindi cha sheria wakati hukumu ya pili ilipofutwa kwanza na Nyumba ya Wawakilishi kasha ikapitishwa katika njia sawa na Seneti Jumatatu. Kutofaulu kwa hukumu ya pili, ambayo inapendekeza kupigwa marufuku kwa ndoa za jinsia moja, kunaweza kuwezesha ndoa za kiraia katika siku za usoni. Kufuatia mfumo huu, HJR-3 itakaguliwa tena na bunge litakaloteuliwa mnamo mwaka 2015 au 2016 ili kubaki katika mchakato.
mt: 2011 proposed amendments had already passed both houses by 2011. The bill was vetoed by the governor on the first vote and the House of Representatives voted to override the veto on Monday. Failure to pass the second vote, which recommends banning same-sex marriage, could allow civil unions in the state. Following this process, HJR-3 will be voted on again by the legislature in 2015 or 2016 to remain in the process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

Following this process, HJR-3 will be voted on again by the legislature in 2015 or 2016 to remain in the process.

A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """Karatasi za Panama"" ni jina la kijumla la takriban stakabadhi milioni kumi kutoka kwa Kampuni ya sheria ya Panama ya Mossack Fonseca, zilizofichuliwa kwa vyombo vya habari katika majira ya kuchipua ya 2016. Stakabadhi hizo zilionyesha kuwa benki kumi na nne ziliwasaidia wateja wakwasi kuficha mabilioni ya dola za Marekanai ili kuepuka kulipa ushuru na kanuni nyinginezo. Gazeti la Uingereza liitwalo The Guardian lilipendekeza kuwa benki ya Kijerumani ilidhibiti theluthi ya kampuni 1200 za Shell zinazotumika kufanikisha haya. Kulikuwa na maandamano kote ulimwenguni, mashtaka kadhaa ya jinai, huku viongozi wa serikali za Aislandi na Pakistani wakijiuzulu."

The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Ajali za hewani ni kawaida nchini Iran, ambayo ina ndege ambazo huhifadhiwa kihafifu kwa shughuli za kiraia na zile za kijeshi. Vikwazo vya kimataifa vimemaanisha kuwa ndege mpya haiwezi kununuliwa. Mapema wiki hii, helikopta ya polisi ilianguka na kuua watu watatu na kujeruhi wengine watatu. Mwezi uliopita Iran iliona janga la hewani baya zaidi kwa miaka wakati ndege iliyokuwa ikielekea Amenia ilianguka na kuwaua watu wote 168. Katika mwezi huo huo ndege nyingine ya abiria ilipita njia yake katika Mashhad na kugonga ukuta, ikawaua watu kumi na saba.
mt: Air crashes are common in Iran, which has planes that are kept in poor condition for military and civilian use. International sanctions mean new planes cannot be purchased. Early this week, a police helicopter crashed and killed three people and injured three others. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when a plane bound for Armenia crashed and killed all 168 people on board. In that same month another passenger plane veered off its course in Mashhad and hit a wall, killing 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Kikundi cha Wasomi wa Iraq kiliwasilisha ripoti yao saa 12 GMT leo. Inatoa ilani kwamba hakuna yeyote anayeweza kutoa hakikisho kwamba mpango wowote wa hatua katika Iraki wakati huu utakomesha vita vya kimadhehebu, vurugu inayozidi, au mwelekeo kwenye machafuko. Ripoti hiyo inaanza kwa ombi la mjadala wazi na kuundwa kwa maafikiano katika Marekani kuhusu sera kuhusu Mashariki ya Kati. Ripoti hiyo inashutumu vikali karibu kila kipengele cha sera ya sasa ya Mtendaji kuhusu Iraki na inahimiza ubadilishaji wa mwelekeo mara moja. Kwanza kati ya mapendekezo yake 78 ni kwamba mpango mpya wa kidiplomasia unapaswa kuchukuliwa kabla ya mwisho wa mwaka huu ili kuweka katika hali ya usalama mipaka ya Iraq dhidi ya uingiliaji wa maadui na kuanzisha tena uhusiano wa kidiplomasia na majirani zake.
mt: The Iraqi Scholars Group submitted its report at 12 GMT today. It calls for no one to be able to guarantee that any current course of action in Iraq will stop sectarian violence, civil war, or chaos. The report begins with a call for open dialogue and the creation of agreements in the United States regarding policy in the Middle East. The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of current policy in Iraq and calls for an immediate change of course. Among its recommendations, number 78 is that a new diplomatic plan should be taken before the end of this year to ensure the security of Iraq's borders against enemy infiltration and to reestablish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Kulingana na Ansa, ""polisi walihangaishwa na mashambulio machache ya watu wa kiwango cha juu, wakiogopa yanaweza kusababisha vita kamili vya urithi. Polisi walisema Lo Piccolo alikuwa na udhibiti kwa sababu alikuwa msaidizi mwaminifu wa Provenzano katika Palamo na tajiriba yake kuu ilimpatia heshima ya kizazi kizee cha mabosi walipokuwa wakifuatilia sera ya Provenzano ya kuwa watulivu iwezekanavyo huku wakiimarisha mtandao wao wa uwezo. Mabosi hawa walikuwa wamedhibitiwa na Provenzano wakati alipokomesha vita vilivyoendeshwa na Riina dhidi ya taifa ambavyo vilisababisha vifo vya wanaharakati wa Mafia Giovanni Falcone na Paolo Borsellino mnamo 1992."""
mt: "According to Ansa, ""police were alarmed by the sporadic attacks of the upper class, fearing they could lead to a full-scale war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo was under control because he was a loyal assistant of Provenzano in Palermo and his arrest brought respect to the second generation of bosses who were following Provenzano's policy of being as peaceful as possible while strengthening their power base. These bosses had been controlled by Provenzano when he ended the war waged by Riina against the state which led to the deaths of Mafia leaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Judoka Hitosi Saito Mjapani, mshindi wa medali mbili za dhahabu za Olimpiki amekufa akiwa na miaka 54. Chanzo cha kifo kilitangazwa kama saratani ya kifereji cha nyongo kilicho ndani ya ini. Alifariki katika Osaka Jumanne. Pamoja na kuwa bingwa wa Olimpiki na Dunia, Saito alikuwa mwenyekiti wa kamati ya mafunzo ya Shirikisho la Judo la Japani wakati wa kifo chake.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, an Olympic gold medalist, has died. The cause of death was announced as esophageal cancer. He died in Osaka on Monday. In addition to being an Olympic and world champion, Saito was chairman of the Japan Judo Association's training committee at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Wakati wa safari yake, Iwasaki alikumbwa na matata mara nyingi. Aliporwa na maharamia, akashambuliwa huko Tibeti na mbwa mwenye kichaa, akakwepa ndoa katika Nepali na akakamatwa huko India.
mt: During his travels, Iwasaki was often in trouble. He was kidnapped by bandits, attacked by a Tibetan mastiff, rejected a marriage proposal in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella alishindwa kudhibiti gari lake na kulazimika kutamatisha mashindano muda mfupi baada ya kuanza. Mwanatimu mwenzake Fernando Alonso alikuwa akiongoza kwa wingi wa mbio hizo, lakini aliumaliza mara tu baada ya kusimama kwa matengenezo, labda kwa sababu ya gurudumu la kulia la mbele kushonwa vibaya. Michael Schumacher alimaliza mbio zake muda mfupi baada ya Alonso, kwa sababu ya uharibifu wa mfumo wa kusimamisha gari, uliosababishwa na mapambano kadhaa wakati wa mbio hizo.
mt: 2009 Formula One World Championship leader Giancarlo Fisichella was unable to control his car and was forced to retire early after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was leading the race, but he retired immediately after stopping due to a broken rear wing. Michael Schumacher retired early due to a malfunction in his car's braking system, caused by several collisions during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Katika miezi mitatu iliyopita, mahabusu zaidi ya 80 waliachiliwa kutoka kituo cha Central Booking bila kushtakiwa rasmi. Mnamo Aprili mwaka huu, amri ya kuzuia kwa mda ilitolewa na Jaji Glynn dhidi ya kituo hicho kutekeleza kuachiliwa kwa wale waliofungiwa kwa zaidi ya saa 24 baada ya kuchukuliwa kwao ambao kesi zao hazikusikilizwa na na kamishna wa korti. Kamishna huweka dhamana, ikiwa imeruhusiwa, na kufanya rasmi mashtaka yaliyofailiwa na afisa mwenye kukamata. Kisha mashtaka huingizwa kwenye mfumo wa kompyuta wa nchi ambapo kesi hiyo hufuatiliwa. Wakati wa kusikilizwa kwa kesi, tarehe ya haki ya mtuhumiwa kupata jaribio la haraka pia huashiriwa.
mt: 80+ people have been released from Central Booking in the past three months without being formally charged. In April of this year, Judge Glynn issued a temporary restraining order against the facility for releasing people who had been held for more than 24 hours after their arrest, whose cases had not been heard by a magistrate. The magistrate sets bail, if allowed, and makes the formal charges against the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. During the hearing of the case, the speedy trial date is also issued.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin pia alisema maafisa waliamua kufuta kurudiwa kwa kura ili kuokoa watu wa Afghan gharama na hatari kwa usalama ambayo ingeletwa na uchaguzi mwengine. Wanadiplomasia walisema kwamba walipata tata za kutosha katika katiba ya Kiafgani kuamua kwamba duru ya pili ya uchaguzi haikuwa ya lazima. Hii inapinga ripoti za awali, ambazo zilisema kuwa kughairi duru ya pili ya uchaguzi kungekuwa dhidi ya katiba.
mt: Lodin also said officials decided to forgo a runoff to save Afghan lives and money and the security risks that would come with another election. Diplomats said they had received enough assurances from the Afghan constitution that a second round of voting was not necessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that forgoing a second round of voting would be a violation of the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

Wanadiplomasia walisema kwamba walipata tata za kutosha katika katiba ya Kiafgani kuamua kwamba duru ya pili ya uchaguzi haikuwa ya lazima. Hii inapinga ripoti za awali, ambazo zilisema kuwa kughairi duru ya pili ya uchaguzi kungekuwa dhidi ya katiba.
mt: Lodin also said officials decided to forgo a runoff to save Afghan lives and money and the security risks that would come with another election. Diplomats said they had received enough assurances from the Afghan constitution that a second round of voting was not necessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that forgoing a second round of voting would be a violation of the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Tangu uhuru wa Pakistani kutoka kwa utawala wa Uingereza mnamo 1947, Rais wa Pakistani amewateua ""Mawakala wa Kisiasa"" kutawala FATA, ambao hufanya udhibiti ulio karibu huru wa maeneo hayo. Wakala hawa wana wajibu wa kutoa huduma za kiserikali na kisheria chini ya Kifungu cha 247 cha Katiba ya Pakistani."
mt: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani president has appointed a ""Political Agent"" to govern FATA, who performs a near-autonomous administration of these areas. These agents have the responsibility of providing government and legal services under Section 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Sinema, iliyoshirikisha Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone ilipata uteuzi katika kategoria zote kuu. Gosling na Stone walipokea uteuzi wa Muigizaji na Mwigizaji wa kike Bora mtawalia. Uteuzi mwingine unahusisha Picha, Mwelekezi, Sinema, Muundo wa Mavazi, Uhariri wa Filamu, Alama ya Asili, Muundo wa Uzalishaji, Uhariri wa Sauti, Uchanganyaji wa Sauti na Mchezo Halisi wa Skrini Bora. Nyimbo mbili kutoka kwa sinema, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na Mji wa Nyota, zilipendekezwa kuwa nyimbo bora asilia. Studio ya Lionsgate ilipendekezwa mara 26 – zaidi ya studio nyingine yoyote.
mt: La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received Best Actor and Actress nominations. Other nominations include Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Original Song, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Best Live Action Short Film. Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate was nominated for the 26th time – more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK pia iliripoti kuwa kiwanda cha nguvu za nyuklia cha Kashiwazaki Kariwa katika wilaya ya Niigata kilikuwa kikifanya kazi kwa njia ya kawaida. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. iliripoti hakukuwa na athari zozote kutokana na mtetemeko wa ardhi na kwamba tanuri Nambari 1 na 2 katika kiwanda chake cha nguvu za nyuklia cha Shika zilikuwa zimezimwa. Inaripotiwa kwamba takribani kaya 9400 katika eneo hazina maji na takribani 100 hazina umeme. Baadhi ya barabara zimeharibiwa, huduma za reli kukatishwa katika maeneo yaliyoathirika, na uwanja wa ndege wa wilaya ya Ishikawa unabaki kufungwa.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported that there had been no impact from the earthquake and that the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that about 9,400 homes in the affected area are without water and about 100 are without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, rail service has been suspended in affected areas, and the Ishikawa Prefecture airport remains closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Hati hiyo, kulingana na fununu, itarejelea mzozo wa mipaka, ambayo Palestina inataka iwe na msingi wa mipaka kabla ya Vita vya 1967 vya Mashariki ya Kati. Mada nyingine zilizoshughulikiwa inaripotiwa zinatia ndani hali ya baadaye ya Yerusalemu ambayo ni takatifu kwa mataifa yote mawili na suala la Bonde la Yordani. Israeli inadai kuendelezwa kwa uwepo wa kijeshi katika bonde hilo kwa miaka kumi pindi mkataba utakapotiwa saini huku PA ikikubali kuondoa uwepo huo kwa miaka mitano tu.
mt: 1. The document, according to the draft, will address the issue of borders, which the Palestinians want to be based on the pre-1967 borders of the West Bank. Other issues discussed include the future of Jerusalem, which is holy to both faiths, and the Jordan Valley. Israel wants to maintain a military presence in the valley for ten years after a peace agreement is signed, while the PA agrees to remove it after five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Mzaliwa wa Hong Kong, Ma alisomea katika kituo kikuu cha New York na shule ya Chuo cha Sheria cha Harvard na kwa wakati mmoja alikuwa na “kadi ya kijani” ya mkazi wa kudumu wa Amerika. Hsieh aliashiria wakati wa uchaguzi kwamba huenda Ma akatoroka nchini wakati wa matatizo. Hsieh pia alidai kuwa Ma aliyeonekana mzuri sana kwenye picha alikuwa mwenye mtindo zaidi kuliko maana. Hata kwa mashtaka haya, Ma alishinda kimuhimu katika jukwaa akitetea uhusiano wa karibu zaidi na bara la Kichina.
mt: A native of Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and at one point held a "green card" for permanent U.S. residency. Hsieh said during the campaign that Ma might flee the country during a crisis. Hsieh also claimed that Ma looked better in pictures than he actually did. Even with these charges, Ma won the debate in importance by defending a closer relationship with mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Baada ya kuwa dhahiri kwamba familia nyingi zilikuwa zinatafuta usaidizi wa kisheria kupigana na ufukuzwaji, mkutano ulifanywa mnamo Machi 20 katika Kituo cha Sheria cha Jamii cha East Bay kwa waathirika wa utapeli wa makazi. Wakati wapangaji walianza kusumulia yaliyowatendekea, familia nyingi husika ziligundua kuwa Carolyn Wilson wa shirika la OHA aliiba amana yao na kutoweka mjini. Wapangaji katika Lockwood Gardens wanaamini kwamba huenda kukawa na familia nyingine 40 au zaidi zitakazokabili kufukuzwa, kwani walifahamu kuwa polisi wa OHA pia wanachunguza mali nyingine za makazi katika Oakland ambazo huenda zikajipata katika sakata ya nyumba.
mt: After it became clear that many families were seeking legal assistance to fight eviction, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for affected tenants. As the tenants began to recount their experiences, many of the families discovered that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their trust and disappeared in the city. Tenants in Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be as many as 40 or more other families who will be affected by eviction, as they knew that OHA police were also investigating other tenants' property in Oakland that may have been caught in the house fire.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Baada ya mbio hizo, Keselowski anabaki kuwa kiongozi wa Ubingwa wa Madereva kwa pointi 2,250. Kwa pointi saba nyuma, Johnson ni wa pili na 2,243. Akiwa wa tatu, Hamlin yuko nyuma kwa pointi ishirini, lakini tano mbele ya Bowyer. Kahne na Truex, mdogo, ni wa tano na sita mtawalia kwa alama 2,220 na 2,207. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth na Harvick wanachukua nafasi kumi za juu za Ubingwa wa Madereva huku mbio nne zikibaki katika msimu.
mt: 1. Keselowski 2,250
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Hii inaaminika kuwa mara ya tano katika historia ambapo watu walitazama kilichogeuka kuwa nyenzo zilizothibitiwa kikemikali kuwa za mihiri zikianguka Duniani. Kati ya takriban vimondo 24,000 vinavyojulikana kuanguka Duniani, ni takribani 34 tu ambavyo vimethibitishwa kuwa na asili ya mirihi. Kumi na tano ya haya mawe yamehusishwa kwa mawe yaliyotoka katika nyota na kunyesha Julai iliyopita. Baadhi ya mawe, ambayo ni nadra sana katika Dunia, yanauzwa kutoka dola 11,000 hadi dola 22,500 za Marekani kwa aunsi, ambayo ni takriban mara kumi ya bei ya dhahabu.
mt: 24,000 meteorites are known to have fallen on Earth. Of these, 34 have been confirmed to be of extraterrestrial origin. Fifteen of these meteorites fell in July. Some of the meteorites, which are rare on Earth, are selling for between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher aliyestaafu mwaka wa 2006 baada ya kushinda michuano ya Formula 1 mara saba, alikua tayari kuchukua nafasi ya Felipe Massa aliyejeruhiwa. Mbrazili huyo alipata jeraha baya la kichwani baada ya ajali wakati wa Grand Prix ya Hungaria ya 2009. Massa anatarajiwa kuwa nje kwa angalau muda uliobaki wa msimu wa 2009.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Schumacher, who retired last year after winning seven titles, was ready to take the place of Felipe Massa, who was seriously injured. The Brazilian suffered a severe head injury in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is expected to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Hadi sasa, AOL imeweza kusongesha na kuendeleza soko la IM kwa kasi yake mwenyewe, kwa sababu ya matumizi yake yaliyoenea ndani ya Merika. Mpangilio huu ukiwa, uhuru huu unaweza kumalizika. Jumla ya idadi ya watumiaji wa huduma za Yahoo! na Microsoft pamoja itazidi idadi ya wateja wa AOL.
mt: So far, AOL has been able to grow and expand its IM market on its own, because of its widespread use in the U.S.  This arrangement could end.  The combined number of Yahoo! and Microsoft users will surpass AOL's user base.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Bomu la gari lililolipuliwa katika hedikota ya polisi katika Gaziantep, Uturuki jana asubuhi liliwaua maafisa wawili wa polisi na kuwajeruhi watu wengine zaidi ya ishirini. Ofisi ya Gavana ilisema kumi na tisa wa wale waliojeruhiwa walikuwa maafisa wa polisi. Polisi walisema wanashuku wanaodaiwa kuwa wanamgambo wa Daesh (ISIL) kwa kuhusika na shambulio hilo.
mt: A bomb that exploded in the city of Gaziantep, Turkey this morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others. The governor's office said nineteen of those injured were police officers. Police said they were seeking suspects believed to be members of Daesh (ISIL) for involvement in the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Gavana wa awali wa Massachusetts Mitt Romney alishinda uchaguzi wa msingi wa urais wa Chama cha Republican wa Florida Jumanne kwa zaidi ya asilimia 46 ya kura. Spika wa Nyumba wa zamani wa Marekani Newt Gingrich alikuwa wa pili kwa asilimia 32. Kama jimbo la mshindi-huchukua-yote. Florida ilimtunukia Romney wajumbe wake wote hamsini, hivyo kumsukuma mbele kama mgombeaji mkuu katika uchaguzi wa Chama cha Republican.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney won the state's primary election Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich was second with 32 percent. As a winner-take-all state, Florida awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, putting him ahead of the pack in the Republican race.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Gavana wa awali wa Massachusetts Mitt Romney alishinda uchaguzi wa msingi wa urais wa Chama cha Republican wa Florida Jumanne kwa zaidi ya asilimia 46 ya kura. Spika wa Nyumba wa zamani wa Marekani Newt Gingrich alikuwa wa pili kwa asilimia 32. Kama jimbo la mshindi-huchukua-yote. Florida ilimtunukia Romney wajumbe wake wote hamsini, hivyo kumsukuma mbele kama mgombeaji mkuu katika uchaguzi wa Chama cha Republican.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney won the state's primary election Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich was second with 32 percent. As a winner-take-all state, Florida awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, putting him ahead of the pack in the Republican race.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Spika wa awali Newt Gingrich, gavana wa Texas Rick Perry na Mbunge Michelle Bachmann walimaliza katika nafasi za nne, tano, na sita mtawalia. Baada ya matokeo kuingia, Gingrich alimpongeza Santorum, lakini alikuwa na maneno makali kwa Romney, ambaye matangazo hasi ya kampeni yalipeperushwa kwa niaba yake dhidi ya Gingrich. Perry alisema, ""Nitarudi Texas ili kutathmini matokeo ya mkutano wa usiku wa leo, kuamua kama kuna njia yangu ya kusonga mbele katika mbio hizi"", lakini baadaye akasema kwamba angebaki kwenye mbio na kushindana katika uchaguzi wa msingi wa Carolina Kusini mnamo Januari 21. Bachmann, aliyeshinda Kura ya maoni ya Ames Straw mnamo Agosti, aliamua kukomesha kampeni yake."
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Representative Michelle Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth and sixth place respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich congratulated Santorum, but had harsh words for Romney, whose campaign ads were pulled on his behalf against Gingrich. Perry said, "I will return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's debate, to decide if there is a path forward in this race," but later said he would stay in the race and compete in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
