src: "Wavuti wa kituo hicho unaelezea onyesho hilo kama ""Thieta ya zamani ya redio yenye mzunguko mpya wa kukera na wa kichizi!"" Katika siku zake za mwanzo mwanzo, onyesho hilo liliwasilishwa tu kwenye wavuti ya muda mrefu ya redio ya intaneti ya TogiNet, wavuti iliyozingatia mazungumzo ya redioni. Mwishoni mwa 2015, TogiNet ilianzisha Redio ya AstroNet kama idhaa tanzu. Kipindi cha awali kilionyesha waigizaji wa sauti wasio na ujuzi, wa ndani hadi Mashariki mwa Texas."
mt: "The station's website describes the show as ""A classic AM radio station with a new spin on talk and news!"" In its early days, the show was only broadcast on TogiNet's long-running Internet radio station, TogiNet Radio, a station that focused on radio talk. In late 2015, TogiNet launched AstroNet Radio as a new station. The first show featured voice actors with no experience, from inside to the Eastern part of Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Wavamizi wa Mumbai walifika kwa boti mnamo 26 Novemba 2008, na wakaleta gruneti, silaha za kiotomatiki na wakapiga sehemu nyingi zikiwamo kituo cha reli cha Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus kilichojawa na watu na Hoteli maarufu ya Taj Mahal. Uwezo wa David Headley wa kutafuta na kukusanya habari ulikuwa umesaidia kuwezesha operesheni ya wanamgambo 10 kutoka kwa kikundi cha Laskhar-e-Taiba cha wapiganaji wa Pakistani. Shambulio hilo liliweka shida kubwa kwenye mahusiano kati ya India na Pakistani.
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers arrived by boat and brought grenades, automatic weapons and attacked several locations including the Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's ability to gather and collect information had helped to facilitate the operation of 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. This attack caused great difficulty in the relationship between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Rekodi ya Nadal dhidi ya Kanada ni 7-2. Hivi karibuni alipoteza dhidi ya Raonic kwenye Brisbane Open. Nadal alipata 88% ya pointi kwenye mechi na kushinda pointi 76 kwenye utumishi wa kwanza. Baada ya mechi, Mfalme wa Clay alisema, “Nina msisimko tu kuhusu kuwa tena katika raundi za mwisho za tukio muhimu zaidi. Niko hapa kujaribu kushinda hii.”
mt: 7-2 Nadal's record against Canada. Recently he lost to Raonic at the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of points in the match and won 76 points in the first set. After the match, the King of Clay said, "I have only one goal in mind to be back in the final rounds of the most important event. I'm here trying to win this."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Wiki iliyopita, Naked News ilitangaza kuwa wangeongeza sana idhini yake ya utangazaji wa Habari kwa lugha za kimataifa, na watangazaji watatu wapya. Tayari likiripoti kwa Kiingereza na Kijapani, shirika la kimataifa linazindua mipango ya lugha za Kihispania, Kiitaliano, na Kikorea, kwa televisheni, wavuti, na vifaa vya mkononi.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced that it would greatly increase its foreign language broadcasting, and three new anchors. It already reports in English and Japanese, the international company is now launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean, for television, web, and mobile.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Zaidi ya tukio la Jumatatu, Carpanedo alishindana katika mbio mbiliza kibinafsi katika Ubingwa. Yake ya kwanza ilikuwa Slalom, ambapo alipata Hakumaliza katika mbio zake za kwanza. 36 wa washindani 116 walikuwa na matokeo sawa katika mbio hizo. Alimaliza wa kumi katika mbio yake nyingine, Giant Slalom, kwenye kitengo cha kuketi cha wanawake kwa muda uliojumuishwa wa ukimbiaji wa 4:41.30, dakika 2:11.60 polepole kuliko aliyemaliza katika nafasi ya kwanza Mwaustralia Claudia Loesch na dakika 1:09.02 polepole kuliko aliyemaliza katika nafasi ya tisa Gyongyi Dani wa Hungaria. Wazungu wanne kwenye kundi la wanawake walishindwa kumaliza mbio zao, na 45 ya 117 walifeli na kushindwa kupata nafasi kwenye mbio hizo.
mt: 36 of 116 competitors had the same results in those races. She finished tenth in her other race, Giant Slalom, in the women's sitting category for a combined time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 slower than the first-place finisher, Australian Claudia Loesch, and 1:09.02 slower than the ninth-place finisher, Hungarian Gyongyi Dani. Four of the 14 women in the sitting category failed to finish their races, and 45 of 117 competitors failed to finish or were disqualified in those races.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Mnamo Jumatano, Ushirika wa Kitaifa wa Mpira wa Kikapu wa Marekani (NBA) ulisimamisha kipindi chake cha mpira wa kikapu wa kitaalamu kwa sababu ya wasiwasi kuhusu COVID-19. Uamuzi wa NBA ulifuatia mchezaji wa Utah wa mziki wa Jazz kupatikana na virusi vya COVID-19.
mt: On Tuesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its season due to concerns over the COVID-19 virus. The NBA's decision followed the Jazz's center testing positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Mchezaji wa Siku wa Leo ni Alex Ovechkin wa Washington Capitals. Alikuwa na goli mbili na saidizi mbili katika ushindi wa Washington wa 5-3 dhidi ya Atlanta Thrashers. Usaidizi wa kwanza wa usiku wa Ovechkin ulikuwa kwenye bao la ushindina mgeni Nicklas Backstrom; goli lake la pili katika usiku lilikuwa lake la 60 kwenye msimu, hivyo kuwa mchezaji wa kwanza kufunga magoli 60 au zaidi kwenye msimu tangu 1995-96, wakati Jaromir Jagr na Mario Lamieux kila mmoja alifikia hatua hiyo.
mt: 2008 NHL Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had two goals and two assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night came on a power-play goal by guest Nicklas Backstrom; his second assist of the night was on his 60th goal of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that mark.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Benki ya Mwamba wa Kaskazini ilifanywa ya kitaifa mnamo 2008 kufuatia ufunuzi kuwa kampuni hiyo ilipokea msaada wa dharura kutoka Serikali ya Uingereza. Benki ya Northern Rock ilihitaji msaada kwa sababu ya hatari za mzozo wa rehani wa 2007. Ofa ya Kikundi cha Virgin cha Bwana Richard Branson ya ununuzi wa benki hiyo ilikataliwa kabla ya kutaifishwa kwa benki hiyo. Katika mwaka wa 2010, benki ya sasa ya mtaa wa juu Northern Bank plc ilitenganishwa na ‘benki mbaya’, Northern Rock (Usimamizi wa Mali). Virgin wamenunua tu 'benki nzuri' ya Northern Rock, si kampuni ya udhibiti wa rasilimali.
mt: 2008, the bank was nationalised following a run on the bank when it was revealed that Northern Rock had received emergency funding from the UK government. The Virgin Group's bid to buy the bank was blocked before the bank was nationalised. In 2010, the current high street bank Northern Bank plc was separated from the 'bad bank', Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin had only bought the 'good bank' of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Uamuzi wa Bw. Rudd kusaini makubaliano ya hali ya hewa ya Kyoto unatenga Marekani, ambayo sasa itakuwa nchi ya pekee iliyostawi kutoridhia mkataba huo. Serikali ya awali ya kihafidhina ya Australia ilikataa kuridhia Kyoto, ikisema ingeharibu uchumi kwa utegemeaji wake mkubwa wa uuzaji nje wa makaa-mawe, wakati nchi kama India na China hazikufungwa na malengo ya uzalishaji wa vichafuzi.
mt: Mr Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol puts Australia at odds with the United States, which has refused to ratify the treaty. Australia's previous conservative government rejected Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy by its large export of coal, while countries such as India and China are not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Walenga shabaha katika jaribio la ziada la kudhibiti visumbufu walipaswa kusimamiwa na walinzi, kwani jaribio lingefuatiliwa na ufanisi wake kutathminiwa. Kwa kushirikiana na NPWS na Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, wajitoleaji waliohitimu waliandikishwa, chini ya mpango wa uwindaji wa Sporting Shooters Association. Kwa mujibu wa Mick O'Flynn, Kaimu Mkurugenzi wa Uhifadhi wa Mbuga na Urithi katika NPWS, walenga shabaha hao wanne walioteuliwa kwa operesheni ya kwanza ya upigaji risasi walipokea mafunzo na maagizo kamili ya usalama.
mt: The targets were to be monitored by guards, as the exercise would be followed by an assessment of its effectiveness. In conjunction with the NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, successful applicants were enrolled under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, NPWS Senior Conservation Officer, the four selected for the first shooting operation had received full training and safety instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: """Kwa kutegemea kisukuku hiki, hii inamaanisha mpasuko huo ni wa mapema zaidi kuliko ilivyotarajiwa na ushahidi wa kimolekuli. Hiyo inammanisha kuwa kila kitu kinafaa kurejeshwa, “alisema mtafiti katika Huduma ya Utafiti wa Bonde la Ufa Ethiopia na mwandishi mwenza wa utafiti huo, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: """Based on this eruption, this means that the eruption is earlier than expected and evidence from the fossil record. This means that everything should be pushed back, “said researcher at the Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Center and co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Katika uwasilishaji mkuu wa Onyesho la Mchezo la Tokyo Alhamisi, Rais wa Nintendo Satoru Iwata alizindua muundo wa kidhibiti cha kiweko kipya cha kampuni hiyo cha Nintendo Revolution. Ifananayo na rimoti ya runinga, kidhibiti hutumia sensa mbili zilizowekwa karibu na runinga ya mtumiaji ili kupata nafasi yake katika sehemu ya pande tatu. Hii itawaruhusu wachezaji kudhibiti machaguo na misogeo katika michezo ya video kwa kusogeza kifaa hewani.
mt: In the keynote address at the Tokyo Game Show on Thursday, Nintendo President Satoru Iwata unveiled a new controller design for the company's Nintendo Revolution. Similar to a rifle, the controller uses two sensors placed near the player's screen to determine its position. This will allow players to control game actions and gestures in video games by moving the device around.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Mapema wakala wa taarifa wa Kichina Xinhua uliripoti utekwaji nyara wa ndege. Kisha ripoti za baadaye zilisema ndege ilipokea tishio la bomu na ikaelekezwa tena Afganistani, na kutua Kandahar. Ripoti za mapema zinasema ndege ilielekezwa tena Afganistani baada ya kunyimwa ruhusa ya kutua katika Urumki.
mt: Early reports from Chinese news agency Xinhua said the plane was hijacked. Later reports said the plane was diverted due to a bomb threat and returned to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. Early reports said the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being cleared to land in Urumqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "Mnamo Jumatatu, Sara Danius, katibu wa kudumu wa Kamati ya Nobel ya Fasihi katika Chuo cha Uswidi, alitangaza hadharani wakati wa kipindi cha redio kwenye Sveriges Radio katika Uswidi kwamba kamati hiyo, kwa kutoweza kumfikia Bob Dylan moja kwa moja kuhusu ushindi wa Tuzo la Nobel la Fasihi 2016, iliacha juhudi zake za kujaribu kumfikia. Danius alisema, ""Sasa hivi hatufanyi chochote. Nimepiga simu na kutuma barua pepe kwa mshirika wake wa karibu na kupata majibu ya kirafiki sana. Kwa sasa, hakika hiyo imetosha."""
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced on Swedish radio during a broadcast on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the academy, after failing to reach Bob Dylan directly about his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had given up its efforts. Danius said, "Now we're doing nothing. I've called and sent emails to a close colleague and got very friendly responses. For now, that's enough."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: Rais wa marekani George W. Bush alikaribisha tangazo hilo. Msemaji wa Bush Gordon Johndroe alitaja ahadi ya Korea Kaskazini kama “hatua kuu kuelekea lengo la kufikia uondoaji wa kuaminika wa silaha za kinyuklia katika rasi ya Kikorea.”
mt: President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.  White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the North Korean pledge a "significant step toward the verified elimination of nuclear weapons in North Korea."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: Mnamo 1956 Slania alihamia Uswidi, ambako miaka mitatu baadaye alianza kazi katika Ofisi ya Posta ya Uswidi na akawa mchoraji wao mkuu. Alizalisha stempu zaidi ya 1,000 kwa Uswidi na nchi nyingine 28. Kazi yake ni ya ubora na undani wa kutambulika sana hadi yeye ni mmoja wa wachache katika “majina ya kinyumbani” kati ya wanastempu. Watu wengine hushughulika na kuikusanya kazi yake pekee. Stempu yake ya 1,000 ilikuwa “Great Deeds by Swedish Kings” nzuri sana na David Klocker Ehrenstrahl mwaka wa 2000, ambayo imetajwa katika Guinness Book of World Records.. Pia alikuwa anashughulika na uchoraji wa noti za benki kwa nchi nyingi, mifano ya hivi karibuni ya kazi yake ikiwa ni pamoja na picha za Uwaziri Mkuu katika upande wa mbele wa noti mpya za dola 5 na dola 100 za Kanada.
mt: 1956 Slania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work at the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He designed stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of high quality and very recognizable until he is one of the few in the “household names” among engravers. Other people are concerned with collecting his work only. His 1,000th stamp was “Great Deeds by Swedish Kings” by David Klocker Ehrenstrahl in the year 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He also worked on banknote engraving for many countries, recent examples of his work including the front of the new $5 and $100 Canadian bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Maili 800 za Mfumo wa Trans-Alaska Pipeline zilifungwa kufuatia umwagikaji wa maelfu ya mapipa ya mafuta yasiyosafishwa kusini mwa Fairbanks, Alaska. Ukosefu wa umeme kufuatia jaribio la kawaida la amri ya moto ulisababisha vilango vya kutuliza kufunguka na mafuta yasiyosafishwa yalifurika karibu na kituo cha pampu cha Fort Greely. Ufunguzi wa vilango uliruhusu kuachiliwa kwa shinikizo kwa mfumo na mafuta yalitiririka kwenye pedi hadi kwenye tangi ambalo linaweza kubeba mapipa 55,000 (galoni milioni 2.3). Kufikia Jumatano alasiri, matundu ya tanki yalikuwa bado yanavuja labda kutokana na upanuzi wa kijoto ndani ya tanki. Eneo lingine ndogo chini ya tangi zenye uwezo wa kuhifadhi mapipa 104,500 bado halikuwa limejazwa hadi kiwango chake.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline were closed following the release of thousands of barrels of unrefined oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. Power failure due to a routine shutdown of the power plant caused the valves to open and unrefined oil flowed into the pump station at Fort Greely. The opening of the valves allowed the pipeline to be depressurized and the oil flowed into the tank which can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). By morning, the tank was still filling up possibly due to the expansion of the oil inside the tank. Another smaller area under the tank with the capacity to hold 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to its capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Corps of Engineers cha Marekani kilikadiria kwamba inchi 6 za mvua huenda zikabomoa matuta ambayo yaliharibiwa awali. Wadi ya Tisa, ambayo ilishuhudia mafuriko ya hadi futi 20 kwa kimo wakati wa Kimbunga Katrina, sasa iko kwenye maji yanayofikia kiunoni kwani tuta lililokuwa karibu lilifurika. Maji yanamwagika juu ya tuta katika sehemu ya futi 100 upana.
mt: 6 inches of rain could flood levees that were damaged previously. The Ninth Ward, which saw up to 20 feet of flooding during Hurricane Katrina, is now underwater as the levee that was close to failing during that storm has been breached. Water is being pumped over the levee in a 100-foot-wide area.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton alithibitisha kwamba Chuo cha Howard kilimpokea mgonjwa akiwa katika hali thabiti. Mgonjwa alikuwa Nijeria, ambako baadhi ya matukio ya virusi vya Ebola yametokea. Hospitali imefuata itifaki ya kudhibiti maambukizi, ikiwa ni pamoja na kutenga mgonjwa kutoka kwa wengine ili kuzuia uwezekano wa kuwaambukiza wengine.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that Howard University had received a patient in stable condition. The patient was from Nigeria, where some Ebola virus outbreaks have occurred. The hospital is following protocols to prevent infection, including isolating the patient from others to prevent the possibility of infecting others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Kuna uwezekano kwamba nyotamkia zilikuwa chanzo cha kusafirisha maji katika dunia, pamoja na vitu vilivyo na kaboni vinavyoweza kuunda protini na kusaidia uhai. Wanasayansi wanatumai kuelewa jinsi sayari huundwa, hasa jinsi Dunia ilivyoundwa, kwani nyotamkia ziligongana na Dunia kitambo.
mt: It is possible that cyanobacteria were responsible for transporting water in the universe, along with carbon-based life forms that could form proteins and aid life. Scientists believe that understanding how planets are formed, especially how the Earth was formed, because cyanobacteria collided with the Earth long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Wakati mamlaka haina uhakika juu ya kuaminika kwa tishio hilo, Mamlaka ya Usafirishaji ya Maryland ilifanya ufungaji kufuatia hamasisho la Shirika la Upelelezi la Marekani. Malori ya mizigo yalitumiwa kuzuia milango ya njia za treni na usaidizi wa polisi 80 ulikuwapo ili kuelekeza madereva kwenye njia za mzunguko. Hapakuwa na ucheleweshwaji mkubwa wa trafiki ulioripotiwa kwenye barabara ya ukanda, njia mbadala ya jiji.
mt: While the agency has not confirmed the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the facility following a warning from the Federal Bureau of Investigation. Freight trains were rerouted and police were on hand to direct drivers around the facility. No major traffic disruptions were reported on the beltway, an alternate route through the city.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Mpigaji picha alichukuliwa hadi Kituo cha Matibabu cha Ronald Reagan, ambako baadaye alifariki. Aliripotiwa kuwa katika miaka yake ya 20. Katika taarifa, Bierber alisema “Ingawa sikuwako au kuhusika na ajali hii mbaya moja kwa moja, mawazo na maombi yangu yako kwa familia ya muathiriwa.” Tovuti ya habari za burudani TMZ inaelewa mpiga picha alisimamisha gari katika upande mwingine wa Sepulveda Boulevard na akajaribu kupiga picha za kizuizi cha polisi kabla ya kuvuka barabara na kuendelea, akamfanya afisa wa polisi wa California Highway Patrol aliyekuwa akiendesha kizuizi kumwamrisha kurudi katika upande mwingine, mara mbili. Kwa mujibu wa polisi, dereva wa gari lililomgonga mpigaji picha huenda akakabiliwa na mashtaka ya jinai.
mt: The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan Medical Center, where he later died. He was reported to be in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said, "Although I did not cause the accident, my heart goes out to the family (of the victim). My thoughts and prayers are with them during this most difficult time." TMZ entertainment news site reported the photographer had stopped his car on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police barricade before crossing the street and continuing, prompting a California Highway Patrol officer to instruct him to return to the opposite side, twice. According to police, the driver of the car that struck the photographer may be charged with a crime.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

TMZ entertainment news site reported the photographer had stopped his car on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police barricade before crossing the street and continuing, prompting a California Highway Patrol officer to instruct him to return to the opposite side, twice. According to police, the driver of the car that struck the photographer may be charged with a crime.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Arias alipima chanya kwa kesi ndogo ya virusi, Waziri wa Rais Rodrigo Arias alisema. Hali ya rais ni thabiti, ingawa atatengwa nyumbani kwa siku kadhaa. ""Bali na joto na vidonda vya koo, nahisi vizuri na hali njema kuendelea na kazi yangu kwa mawasiliano ya simu. Natarajia kurudi katika majukumu yangu yote Jumatatu,” Arias alisema katika taarifa."
mt: "Arias said he was tested for a minor virus. The president's condition is stable, although he will be kept at home for a few days. "But with the heat and the cold, I feel well and in good spirits to continue with my work by phone. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Katika kilele chake, Kimbunga cha Kitropiki cha Gonu, kilichopatiwa jina la begi la majani ya mtende kwa lugha ya Maldivi, kililifikia pepo imara za kilomita 240 kwa saa (maili 149 kwa saa). Kufikia mapema leo, pepo zilikuwa za kilomita 83 kwa saa, na zilitarajiwa kuzidi kudhoofika.
mt: At its peak, the Gonu cyclone, named after a Maldivian coconut palm, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). By early Monday, winds were at 83 kilometers per hour, and were expected to increase.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Wimbi jekundu husababishwa na mkusanyiko mkubwa kuliko kawaida wa Karenia brevis, kiumbe asilia cha seli moja kinachopatikana baharini. Sababu asilia zinaweza kukutana na kutoa hali ifaayo, na kuruhusu mwani huu kuongezeka sana kwa idadi. Mwani huo hutoa sumu ya neva ambayo inaweza kulemaza neva katika binadamu na samaki. Mara nyingi samaki hufa kwa sababu ya viwango vikubwa vya sumu ndani ya maji. Wanadamu waweza kuathiriwa kwa kupumua maji yaliyoathirika yaliyopelekwa hewani na upepo na mawimbi.
mt: Red tides are caused by a large bloom of Karenia brevis, a single-celled organism found in the ocean. Natural causes can combine to create this situation, and allow this bloom to grow very large. This bloom produces a neurotoxin that can cause respiratory distress in humans and fish. Fish often die from high levels of toxin in the water. Humans can be affected by inhaling water that has been brought to shore by wind and waves and tides.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia, iliyokuwa kwa wakati mmoja dhoruba ya Kategoria ya 4kwenye kiwango cha Vimbunga cha Saffir- Simpson, ilidhoofika hadi unyongovu wa kitropiki kabla ya kufifia Jumanne. Mabaki yake yalitoa rasharasha katika visiwa vingi, ingawa kufikia sasa, hakuna uharibifu au mafuriko yaliyoripotiwa. Usafirishaji wa joto uliofikia inchi 6.34 kwenye geji katika Oahu, ulielezewa kuwa na “ faida”. Mvua kiasi iliandamana na ngurumo na radi za mara kwa mara.
mt: Felicia, which had been a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Monday. Its remnants brought heavy rain to many islands, although no damage or flooding has been reported. A temperature of 6.34 degrees Fahrenheit on the geiger scale in Oahu was described as "beneficial." Rainfall was accompanied by thunder and lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet mdogo alianguka katika Grand Prix ya Singapori mara tu baada ya kituo cha mapema cha matengenezo kwa Fernando Alonso, na kuleta gari la usalama. Huku magari yaliyokuwa mbele ya Alonso yakiingia kuwekwa mafuta chini ya gari la usalama, alienda mbele yao kuchukua ushindi. Piquet Jr. alifutwa kazi baada ya kipindi cha 2009 cha Hungarian Grand Prix.
mt: The young Piquet crashed in the Singapore Grand Prix after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, and brought out the safety car. As Alonso's car was being refueled, he went ahead of them to take the win. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Utafiti uliochapishwa Alhamisi katika jarida la Science uliripoti kuhusu kuundwa kwa spishi mpya ya ndege katika Visiwa vya Galapagos vya Kiekuado. Watafiti kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton katika Marekani na Chuo Kikuu cha Uppsala katika Uswidi waliripoti spishi hiyo mpya iligeuka katika vizazi viwili pekee, ingawa mchakato huu ulikuwa unaaminika kuchukua muda mrefu zaidi, kwa sababu ya kuzaana kati ya wenyeji shorewanda wa Darwin, Geospiza fortes , na wahamiaji shorewanda wa dungusi kakati, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reported on the creation of a new species of finch on the Galapagos Islands of Kiekuado. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species had evolved in two generations, although this process was thought to take longer, due to hybridization between resident Darwin's finches, Geospiza fortes, and immigrant cactus finches, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Tukio hilo la kisanaa pia ni sehemu ya kampeni ya Bucharest City Hall ambayo ina lengo la kuzindua taswira ya mji huo mkuu wa Romania kama jiji bunifu la kusisimua. Jiji litakuwa la kwanza katika Uropa kusini mashariki kuwa mwenyeji wa CowParade, tukio kubwa zaidi duniani la umma la sanaa, katikati mwa Juni na Agosti mwaka huu.
mt: The incident is also part of the Bucharest City Hall's campaign to promote the city as a creative and innovative capital. The city will be the first in Southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, in the middle of June and August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Ndege ilikuwa inaelekea Irkutsk na ilikuwa ikiendeshwa na majeshi ya ndani. Uchunguzi ulianzishwa ili kupeleleza. Il-76 imekuwa sehemu kuu ya wanajeshi wa Urusi na Sovieti tangu miaka ya 1970, na tayari walikuwa wameona ajali mbaya huko Urusi mwezi uliopita. Mnamo Oktoba 7 injini ilijitenga wakati wa kuruka, bila majeraha. Urusi iliweka Il-76 kando baada ya ajali hiyo.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was being flown by the military. An investigation has been launched to determine the cause. The Il-76 has been a mainstay of Russian and Soviet military forces since the 1970s, and they have seen major accidents in Russia recently. On October 7, an engine failed during takeoff, without injury. Russia grounded the Il-76 after this accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Kabla ya The Simpsons Simon alikuwa amefanyia kazi maonyesho kadhaa katika nafasi mbalimbali. Katika miaka ya 1980 alishughulikia vipindi kama vile Taxi, Cheers, na Onyesho la Tracy Ullman. Mnamo 1989 alisaidia kuunda The Simpsons Pamoja na Brooks na Groening, na ndiye aliyehusika katika kuajiri timu ya kwanza ya uandishi ya kipindi. Licha ya kutoka kwenye onyesho mwaka wa 1993 alihifadhi cheo cha mtendaji mzalishaji, na kuendelea kupokea makumi ya mamilioni ya dola kwa kila msimu wa mrahaba.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked on a number of shows in various capacities. In the 1980s, he worked on such series as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing staff. Despite leaving the show in 1993, he continued to receive millions of dollars per season of reruns.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke aliandika kwamba juhudi za baadhi kuzamisha wanawake wasizungumze kuhusu uzima wa wanawake hazikufaulu. Alifikia hitimisho hili kutokana na wingi wa maoni chanya na kutiwa moyo kwake na wake kwa waume waliohimiza kuwa matibabu ya uzazi yachukuliwe kuwa mahitaji muhimu ya kimatibabu.
mt: Fluke wrote that efforts by some to keep women silent about women's lives have failed. He reached this conclusion because of the abundance of negative comments and his being encouraged by women who advocated that reproductive health care be considered a vital health need.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: """Itakuwa na tabia kama za maji. Ni wazi kama vile maji yalivyo. Kwa hivyo kama ungesimama kwenye ukingo wa bahari, ungeweza kuona hadi changarawe na taka zilizo chini. Kadiri sisi tunavyojua, kuna chombo kimoja cha sayari ambacho huonyesha nguvu nyingi kuliko Titani, na jina lake ni Dunia,” aliongeza Stofan."
mt: """It will be like water. It will be clear like water. So if you were to stand on the edge of the ocean, you would be able to see down to the corals and the rocks below. As we know it, there is one object in the solar system that is more powerful than titanium, and its name is Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Hii haithibitishi tu kuwa baadhi ya dinosaria walikuwa na manyoya, nadharia ambayo tayari imezagaa, bali pia inatoa maelezo ambayo kijumla visukuku haviwezi, kama vile rangi na mpangilio wa pande-tatu. . Wanasayansi wanasema manyoya ya mnyama huyu yalikuwa ya rangi ya kahawia-nyekundu upande wa juu na hafifu au rangi ya karotini upande wa chini. Utambuzi huo pia unatoa ufahamu wa mageuko ya manyoya katika ndege. Kwa sababu manyoya ya dinosau hayana chimbuko uliyostawishwa vizuri, inayoitwa rachi, lakini huwa na sifa zingine za manyoya — barbu na barbule — watafiti waligundua rachi labda ni maendeleo ya baadaye ya uvumbuzi kuliko sifa hizi nyingine. Muundo wa manyoya unaonyesha kwamba hayakutumika katika kupeperuka bali yalitumiwa kudhibiti joto au uonyesho. Watafiti walipendekeza kwamba, ingawa huu ni mkia wa dinosauri mchanga, sampuli inaonyesha manyoya ya utu uzima na si manyoya laini ya ndani ya kifaranga. Watafiti walipendekeza kwamba, hata kama huu ni mkia wa dinosau mdogo, sampuli hiyo inaonyesha manyoya ya ukubwa na si manyoya ya kifaranga mdogo.
mt: This does not prove that some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has already gained traction, but also provides details that a mass extinction could not, such as color and arrangement of the three parts. Scientists say this dinosaur's feathers were light brown on top and pale or orange on the bottom. This identification also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur's skin lacked a well-defined ridge, called a crest, but had other feather characteristics — barbs and barbules — researchers found a ridge perhaps was a later development than these other features. The arrangement of feathers shows that they were not used for insulation but for temperature or display. Researchers suggested that, although this is a small dinosaur's tail, the sample shows large feathers and not small feathers of a crest.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

Utambuzi huo pia unatoa ufahamu wa mageuko ya manyoya katika ndege. Kwa sababu manyoya ya dinosau hayana chimbuko uliyostawishwa vizuri, inayoitwa rachi, lakini huwa na sifa zingine za manyoya — barbu na barbule — watafiti waligundua rachi labda ni maendeleo ya baadaye ya uvumbuzi kuliko sifa hizi nyingine. Muundo wa manyoya unaonyesha kwamba hayakutumika katika kupeperuka bali yalitumiwa kudhibiti joto au uonyesho. Watafiti walipendekeza kwamba, ingawa huu ni mkia wa dinosauri mchanga, sampuli inaonyesha manyoya ya utu uzima na si manyoya laini ya ndani ya kifaranga. Watafiti walipendekeza kwamba, hata kama huu ni mkia wa dinosau mdogo, sampuli hiyo inaonyesha manyoya ya ukubwa na si manyoya ya kifaranga mdogo.
mt: This does not prove that some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has already gained traction, but also provides details that a mass extinction could not, such as color and arrangement of the three parts. Scientists say this dinosaur's feathers were light brown on top and pale or orange on the bottom. This identification also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur's skin lacked a well-defined ridge, called a crest, but had other feather characteristics — barbs and barbules — researchers found a ridge perhaps was a later development than these other features. The arrangement of feathers shows that they were not used for insulation but for temperature or display. Researchers suggested that, although this is a small dinosaur's tail, the sample shows large feathers and not small feathers of a crest.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Huku chanjo moja ya majaribio ikionekana kupunguza vifo kutokana na Ebola, hadi kufikia sasa, hakuna dawa zimeonyeshwa dhahiri kufaa kutibu maambukizo yaliyoko. Kinywaji kimoja cha kingamwili, ZMapp, hapo awali kilionyesha ahadi uwanjani, lakini tafiti rasmi zilionyesha kilikuwa na faida kidogo kuliko ilivyotafutwa katika kuzuia kifo. Katika jaribio la PALM, Zmapp ilitumika kama kidhibiti, kumaanisha wanasayansi waliitumia kama msingi na kulinganisha matibabu mengine matatu nayo.
mt: 1 of 4 experimental vaccines has shown to reduce deaths from Ebola, but no drug has been shown to be effective in treating the disease. One experimental drug, ZMapp, previously showed promise, but official trials showed it had little benefit in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning researchers used it as a baseline and compared it to other treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Mnamo Jumatatu, wanasayansi kutoka Shule ya Tiba ya Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford walitangaza uvumbuzi wa kifaa kipya cha utambuzi ambacho kinaweza kupanga seli kwa aina: kidude kidogo kinachoweza kuchapwa, na ambacho kinaweza kutengenezwa kwa kutumia printa ya kawaida ya kupuliza rangi, yawezekana kwa takribani senti moja ya Marekani kwa kila moja. Watafiti wakuu wanasema hili linaweza kuleta ugunduzi wa mapema wa saratani, kifua kikuu, ukimwi na malaria kwa wagonjwa katika nchi zenye mapato ya chini, ambapo viwango vya kupona kwa magonjwa kama vile saratani ya matiti vinaweza kuwa nusu ya vile vya nchi tajiri.
mt: On Monday, scientists from Stanford University School of Medicine announced a new device that can detect a single cancer cell, as small as a speck of dust, and which can be printed using a standard inkjet printer, for about a dollar per test. The researchers say this could lead to early detection of cancer, heart disease, HIV and malaria in low-income countries, where the cost of testing for conditions like breast cancer can be half that of high-income countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Wanasayansi wamegundua miundo ya ardhi iliyojaa juu ya mwezi inayoitwa lobate scarps ambayo inaonekana imetokana na kunywea kwa mwezi polepole sana. Chakavu hizi zilipatikana kote kwenye mwezi na kuonekana kumomonyoka kidogo,kuashiria kwamba matukio ya kijiolojia ambayo yaliziunda yalikuwa ya hivi karibuni. Nadharia hii inapinga dai kwamba mwezi hauna shughuli za kijiolojia kamwe.
mt: Scientists have discovered evidence of a type of terrain called lobate scarps, which appear to have been formed by slow cooling of the moon. These features were found all over the moon and appeared to be slightly raised, indicating that the geologic events that created them were recent. This theory contradicts the belief that the moon has no geologic activity at all.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Tangu wakati huo Adekoya amekuwa katika Mahakama ya Edinburg Sheriff kwa mashtaka ya kumuua mwanaye. Yuko korokoroni akisubiri mashtaka na kesi, lakini ushahidi wowote wa walioshuhudia huenda ukaathirika vibaya kwa sababu picha yake imechapishwa sana mahali kwingi. Hii ni desturi kwingineko Uingereza lakini haki ya Kiskoti hufanya kazi kwa njia tofauti na mahakama zimeangalia uchapishaji wa picha kama wenye ubaguzi. Profesa Pamela Ferguson wa Chuo Kikuu cha Dundee anasema ""wanahabari wanaonekana kujihatarisha kwa kuchapisha picha n.k. za watuhumiwa."" Crown Office, ambayo husimamia mashtaka, imeashiria kwa wanahabari kwamba hakuna maoni ya ziada yatakayotolewa angalau hadi mashtaka yafanyike."
mt: "Since then Adekoya has been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court on charges of murdering his brother. He is currently awaiting trial and evidence, but any witnesses may be compromised because of his widespread media coverage. This is another example of the UK, but the court has looked at the publication of images as discrimination. Professor Pamela Ferguson of Dundee University says ""journalists seem to be putting themselves at risk by publishing images etc. of suspects."" Crown Office, which handles charges, has warned journalists that no further comment will be made until charges are made."
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Pamoja na barafu iliyoponda, hali kali za hewa zimekuwa zikizuia juhudi za uokoaji. Pittman alipendekeza kwamba hali hazingeboreka hadi wakati fulani wiki ijayo. Kiasi na unene wa tando hilo la barafu, kulingana na Pittman, ndicho kibaya zaidi ambacho kimewahi kuwa kwa wawindaji kwa miaka 15 iliyopita.
mt: Despite the snowfall, cold conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that the conditions would not improve until some time next week. The size and depth of the snow drift, according to Pittman, is the worst that hunters have seen in 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Roberts alikataa kabisa kusema ni lini anaamini uhai huanza, swali muhimu inapozingatiwa maadili ya uavyaji mimba, akisema kwamba ingekuwa kinyume na maadili kutoa maoni kuhusu mambo maalum ya matukio ambayo yanawezekana. Hata hivyo, alirudia tamko lake la awali kwamba Roe dhidi ya Wade ilikuwa ""sheria iliyoafikiwa ya nchi"", akisisitiza umuhimu wa maamuzi thabiti ya Mahakama Kuu. Alithibitisha pia kuwa aliamini katika haki iliyodokezwa ya faragha ambayo uamuzi wa Roe ulitegemea."
mt: "Roberts refused to say when he believes life begins, saying that it would be inappropriate to comment on matters of personal conscience regarding events that are possible. However, he reiterated his previous statement that Roe v. Wade was a "misguided decision for the country," emphasizing the importance of Supreme Court decisions. He also affirmed his belief in the right to privacy that Roe's decision was based on."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Saa 8:46 kamili, unyamavu ulitanda mjini kote, kuashiria wakati hasa ambapo ndege ya jeti ilipiga lengo. Miali miwili ya mwanga imeundwa ili kuelekea juu usiku kucha. Ujenzi wa ghorofa tano mpya unaendelea katika eneo, na kituo cha usafirishaji na mbuga ya ukumbusho zikiwa katikati.
mt: 8:46 precisely, darkness fell over the city, indicating the time especially when a jet aircraft was to fly overhead. Two searchlights have been erected to point upwards at night. Construction of a new five-story building continues in the area, and the transportation hub and memorial park are in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Milango yote ya pango, iliyopewa jina ""Dada Saba"", ina kipenyo cha angalau mita 100 hadi 250 (futi 328 hadi 820). Picha za miale isiyoonekana zinaonyesha kwamba utofauti wa joto kati ya usiku na mchana unaonyesha kwamba huenda ni mapango. ""Ni baridi kuliko maeneo ya karibu katika mchana na ni ya joto zaidi katika usiku. Tabia yazo ya kijoto si thabiti kama mapango makubwa katika Dunia ambayo mara nyingi hudumisha halijoto sawa kwa kadiri fulani, lakini inapatana nazo kuwa mashimo marefu ardhini,"" alisema Glen Cushing wa Timu ya Falakiolojia ya Utafiti wa Jiolojia wa Marekani (USGS) na wa Chuo Kikuu cha Arizona Kaskazini kilichoko Flagstaff, Arizona."
mt: " All doors of the cave, named "Sister Seven," have a minimum opening of about 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet). Unseen images show that the temperature difference between night and day may indicate that it is a cave. "It is colder than nearby areas in the day and is warmer at night. The temperature pattern is not stable like large caves in the world that often maintain a certain temperature, but it matches the long-term trend of the earth,"" said Glen Cushing of the USGS Astrogeology Science Team and the University of Arizona's Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Inasemekana mwanamume huyo aliendesha gari lenye magurudumu matatu lililokuwa na vilipuzi kwenye umati. Mwanamume ambaye alishukiwa kulipua bomu alizuiliwa, baada ya kupata majeraha kutokana na mlipuko. Jina lake bado halijulikani kwa mamlaka, ingawa wanajua yeye ni memba wa kikundi cha kikabila cha Uighur.
mt: It is reported that the man drove a car with three license plates that was in a crowd. The man who was arrested for detonating a bomb was injured, but his name is unknown to the authorities, although they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Afrika Kusini wamewashinda All Blacks (Nyuzilandi) katika mechi ya muungano wa raga ya Mataifa Matatu katika Uwanja wa Royal Bafokeng katika Rustenburg, Afrika Kusini. Alama ya mwisho ilikuwa ushindi wa nukta moja, 21 hadi 20, na kumaliza mfuo wa ushindi wa michezo wa Weusi Wote. Kwa Springboksi, iliishia kuwa mfuo wa kupoteza mechi-tano Ilikuwa mechi ya mwisho kwa All Blacks, ambao tayari walikuwa wameshinda kombe wiki mbili zilizopita. Mechi ya mwisho ya msururu itafanyika katika Ellis Park mjini Johannesburg wiki ijayo, wakati Springboks watakapocheza dhidi ya Australia.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in the Tri Nations rugby union match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was one point, 21 to 20, and ended the All Blacks' winning streak at five. It was the All Blacks' last match, who had already won the championship two weeks ago. The final match of the season will be played at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks will play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Kituo kilidumisha mtazamo wake, licha ya upotezaji wa gurudumu tuzi mapema kwenye misheni ya kituo cha angani, hadi mwisho wa matembezi ya angani. Chiao na Sharipov waliripoti walikuwa katika umbali salama kutoka kwenye vifaa vya kurushia vya kurekebisha kimo. Udhibiti wa ardhi wa Urusi uliamsha jeti na mtazamo wa kawaida wa kituo ulipatikana tena.
mt: The station maintained its normal attitude, despite the loss of the gyroscopes early in the mission's spacewalks. Sharipov and Chiao reported they were in a safe distance from the repair equipment. Russian ground control restored the jet and the station's normal attitude was regained.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Kituo kilidumisha mtazamo wake, licha ya upotezaji wa gurudumu tuzi mapema kwenye misheni ya kituo cha angani, hadi mwisho wa matembezi ya angani. Chiao na Sharipov waliripoti walikuwa katika umbali salama kutoka kwenye vifaa vya kurushia vya kurekebisha kimo. Udhibiti wa ardhi wa Urusi uliamsha jeti na mtazamo wa kawaida wa kituo ulipatikana tena.
mt: The station maintained its normal attitude, despite the loss of the gyroscopes early in the mission's spacewalks. Sharipov and Chiao reported they were in a safe distance from the repair equipment. Russian ground control restored the jet and the station's normal attitude was regained.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Kesi hiyo ilishtakiwa huko Virginia kwa sababu ni nyumbani kwa mtoaji mkuu wa huduma ya intaneti AOL, kampuni iliyoanzisha mashtaka hayo. Hii ndio mara ya kwanza hukumu imepatikana kwa kutumia sheria iliyopitishwa mwaka wa 2003 ili kupunguza barua-pepe nyingi yaani taka kutoka kwa wasambazaji wasioombwa hadi kwenye masanduku ya watumiaji.
mt: The case was filed in Virginia, where AOL's chief executive is based. It is the first ruling to use a 2003 law that limits unsolicited e-mail, or spam, to enter users' inboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: Vidal mwenye umri wa miaka 28 alikuwa amejiunga na Barca misimu mitatu iliyopita kutoka Sevilla. Tangu kuhamia katika mji mkuu wa Catalan, Vidal alikuwa amechezea klabu yake michezo 49.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barca three seasons ago from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 matches for his club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Hakuna ilani ya tsunami iliyotolewa, na kulingana na uwakala wa jeofizikia wa Jakarta, hakuna ilani ya tsunami itakayotolewa kwani mtetemeko haukufikia ukubwa unaohitajika wa 6.5. Licha ya kutokuwa na tishio la tsunami, wakazi walianza kuwa na hofu na wakaanza kuacha biashara na nyumba zao.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysical observatory, no tsunami warning will be issued as the earthquake did not reach the required magnitude of 6.5. Despite the lack of tsunami threat, residents began to fear and began to abandon their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Walipata kuwa Jua lilifanya kazi kwa kanuni msingi sawa na za nyota nyingine: Shuguli za nyota zote kwenye mfumo zilipatikana kuendeshwa na mng'ao wao, mzunguko wao na hakuna jingine. Mng'ao na mzunguko hutumika pamoja ili kuamua namba ya Rossby ya nyota, ambayo inahusiana na mtiririko wa utegili. Jinsi idadi ya Rossby inavyokuwa ndogo, ndivyo nyota zinapungua kuwa wa utendaji kwa kuzingatia mabadiliko ya sumaku.
mt: They found that the Sun behaved like other stars: All the stars in the system were found to be driven by their mass, rotation and nothing else. Mass and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the turbulence. The lower the Rossby number, the more the star behaves according to changes in its magnetic field.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Kwa watu 1,400 waliopiga kura ya maoni kabla ya uchaguzi wa 2010 wa shirikisho, wale wanaopinga Australia kuwa jamhuri waliongezeka kwa asilimia 8 tangu mwaka wa 2008. Kaimu Waziri Mkuu Julia Gillard alidai wakati wa kampeni ya uchaguzi wa ushirika wa 2010 kwamba aliamini Australia inafaa kuwa jamhuri mwishoni mwa utawala wa Malkia Elizabeth II. Asilimia 34 ya walio kwenye uchunguzi wanashiriki maoni haya, kumtaka Malkia Elizabeth wa II awe malikia wa mwisho wa Australia. Katika wingi wa kura, asilimia 29 ya wale waliofanyiwa utafiti wanaamini Australia inapaswa kuwa jamhuri haraka iwezekanavyo, huku asilimia 31 wakiamini Australia haipaswi kamwe kuwa jamhuri.
mt: 1,400 people surveyed before the 2010 referendum on the Commonwealth, those who opposed Australia to be a republic increased by 8 percent since 2008. Deputy Prime Minister Julia Gillard said during the 2010 referendum campaign that she believed Australia should be a republic at the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. 34 percent of those surveyed participate in these opinions, asking Queen Elizabeth II to be the last queen of Australia. In the majority of votes, 29 percent of those surveyed believe Australia should be a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believe Australia should never be a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, msemaji wa Shirika la Komen, alisema kuwa shirika hilo lilipitisha sheria mpya ambayo hairuhusu ruzuku au ufadhili kutolewa kwa mashirika ambayo yanafanyiwa upelelezi wa kisheria. Sera ya Komen ilisitisha Planned Parenthood kwa sababu ya uchunguzi unaosubiri jinsi Planned Parenthood hutumia na kuripoti pesa zake ambao unaongozwa na Mwakilishi Cliff Stearns. Stearns anapepeleza kama ushuru hutumika katika utoaji wa mimba kupitia uzazi uliopangwa katika jukumu lake kama mwenyekiti wa Usimamizi na Upelelezi kwenye kamati ndogo, ambayo iko chini ya kamati ya nyumba, nishati na biashara.
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokeswoman for Komen, said the organization had passed new rules that would not allow funding or support to be given to organizations that perform illegal abortions. Komen's rules had banned Planned Parenthood because of an investigation into how Planned Parenthood reported its funding, which was led by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns had proposed that funding was used in planned births through his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations subcommittee, which is under the committee on Energy and Commerce.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: "Polisi wa Madhya Pradesh walikipata kipakatalishi na simu ya rununu iliyoibwa. Naibu Inspekta Jenerali D K Arya alisema, ""tumewakamata watu watano waliomnajisi mwanamke huyo Mswisi na tukapata rununu na kompyuta ndogo yake."" Washtakiwa wanatajwa kamaBaba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar, na Vishnu Kanjar. Mkuu wa polisi Chandra Shekar Solanki alisema mshtakiwa alitokea mahakamani na uso uliofunikwa."
mt: "Police of Madhya Pradesh have arrested a pimp and a mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""we have arrested five men who harassed this Swedish woman and we found her rununu and her small computer."" The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar, and Vishnu Kanjar. Police chief Chandra Shekar Solanki said the accused escaped from court and his face was wrapped."
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: Tarakilishi ya ASUS Eee, iliyozinduliwa mapema dunia nzima kwa sababu za uokoaji fedha na utendaji, ikawa mada moto mnamo 2007 Mwezi wa Teknolojia na Mawasiliano wa Taipei. Lakini soko la watumiaji wa kompyuta ndogo litatofautiana na kubadilika sana baada ya ASUS kuzawadiwa tuzo la 2007 la Tuzo Endelevu la Taiwan na Mtendaji Yuan wa Jamhuri ya China.
mt: 2007's Technology and Communications Expo in Taipei was the first time the world saw the ASUS Eee, a netbook that was criticized for its high price and poor performance. However, the netbook's sales and market will vary greatly after ASUS was awarded the 2007 Taiwan Excellence Award and the 2007 China Yuan Award.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Suala lilianza tarehe moja Januari wakati dazeni za wakaaji wa mtaa walipoanza kulalamikia Ofisi ya Posta ya Obanazawa kwamba hawakuwa wamepokea kadi zao za kiasili na za kawaida za Mwaka Mpya. Jana, ofisi ya posta iliomba radhi kutoka kwa wananchi na vyombo vya habari baada ya kugundua kwamba mvulana huyo alikuwa ameficha nyaraka zaidi ya 600 za posta, zikiwemo postkadi 429 za Mwaka Mpya, ambazo hazikufikishwa kwa wapokeaji waliokusudiwa.
mt: 1 January, residents of Obanazawa began complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they had not received their New Year's regular and special postcards. Yesterday, the post office apologized to the public and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 pieces of mail, including 429 New Year's postcards, which had not been delivered to the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray alipoteza seti ya kwanza kwa kuvunjwa kwa usawa baada ya wanaume wote kushikilia kila lishe kwenye seti. Del Potro ilikuwa na faida ya mapema katika seti ya pili, lakini hii pia ilihitaji kivunja usawabaada ya kufikia 6-6. Potro alipokea matibabu begani mwake kwa wakati huu lakini akamudu kurejea kwenye mchezo.
mt: Murray lost the first set when all the men held serve. Del Potro was up early in the second set, but this also required a break to reach 6-6. Potro received treatment for a thigh injury at this time but was able to return to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "Akiongozana na maafisa hao, alihakikishia wananchi wa Texas kuwa hatua zilikua zinachukuliwa kulinda usalama wa umma. Perry alisema hasa, “Kuna sehemu chache duniani ambazo zina uwezo mzuri zaidi wa kukabiliana na changamoto iliyoko katika kesi hii.” Gavana pia alitamka, “Leo, tulifahamu kwamba baadhi ya watoto walio na umri wa kwenda shuleni wametambuliwa kama waliokuwa wametangamana na mgonjwa.” Aliendelea kusema, ""Kesi hii ni nzito. Kuwa na uhakika kwamba mfumo wetu unafanya kazi vyema kama inavyopaswa."""
mt: "Accompanied by these officials, Perry assured Texans that steps have been taken to protect the public safety. Perry said specifically, "There are few places in the world that have a better ability to deal with the challenges in this case." The governor also noted, "Today, we know that some school-aged children have been identified as having been in contact with the patient." He continued, "This case is serious. We want to be sure that our system is working as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Kwa muda mrefu kabla ya onyesho la kila siku na ripoti ya Colbert, Heck na Johnson walifikiria kuhusu uchapishaji ambao ungebuni habari na taarifa wakati walikua wanfunzi wa UW mwaka wa 1988. Tangu kuanzishwa kwake, Onion imekuwa milki halisi ya habari za dhihaka, ikiwa na toleo la chapa, tovuti ambayo iliwavutia wageni 5,000,000 wa kipekee katika mwezi wa Oktoba, matangazo ya kibinafsi, mtandao wa habari wa saa 24, podikasti, na atlasi ya dunia iliyozinduliwa hivi majuzi inayoitwa Our Dumb World. Al Gore na Jenerali Tommy Franks kwa kawaida walinjuga mbali vichwa vya habari (Gore alijipata kwenye vichwa vya habari wakati Onion aliripoti kuwa yeye na Tipper walishiriki ngono baada ya kushindwa kwenye uchaguzi wa chuo). Waandishi wao wengi wameendelea kutumia ushawishi mkubwa kwa maonyesho ya ucheshi ya habari ya Jon Stewart na Stephen Colbert .
mt: For a long time before the daily show and Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson had considered the publication that would make news and information fun, when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, Onion has been a real-life news empire, with a print edition, a website that attracted 5,000,000 unique visitors in October, private advertisements, a 24-hour news network, a podcast, and a recently released world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have often been the butt of the news (Gore was caught on the news when Onion reported that he and Tipper had engaged in sex after losing the election). Many of their writers have gone on to use a great deal of satire in their news shows, Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
