src: Maandamano yalianza takriban saa 5 saa za ndani (UTC+1) katika Whitehall mkabala na mlango wa Mtaa wa Downing unaolindwa na polisi, Makao rasmi ya Waziri Mkuu. Muda mfupi baada ya saa 5, waandamanaji walizuia trafiki kwenye njia ya kuelekea kaskazini katika Whitehall. Saa 11 dakika 20, polisi waliwataka waandamanaji warudi nyuma kando ya barabara, wakisema kwamba walihitaji kusawazisha haki ya kuandamana na msongamano wa magari. Karibu 11:29, maandamano yalisonga juu katika Whitehall, kupita Trafalgar Square, kupitia Strand, kupita karibu na Aldwych na juu katika Kingsway kuelekea Holborn ambapo Chama cha Conservative kiliendesha Mkutano wa Majira ya Mchipuo kwenye hoteli ya Grand Connaught Rooms.
mt: Protests began around 5 pm local time (UTC+1) in Whitehall near the Downing Street entrance to the Prime Minister's official residence. Shortly after 5, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound Whitehall. At 11 minutes 20, police asked protesters to move back off the road, saying they needed to disperse the protest and traffic. Around 11:29, the protest moved up in Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, through Strand, past near Aldwych and up in Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party was holding its Autumn Conference at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: """Sasa tuna panya wenye umri wa miezi minne ambao hawana kisukari ambao awali walikuwa na kisukari"", aliongeza. Dak. Ehud Ur, profesa wa udaktari katika chuo kikuu cha Dalhousie kule Halifix, Nova Scotia na mwenyekiti wa kitengo cha kliniki na kisayansi kwenye ushirika wa ugonjwa wa kisukari nchini Canada alionya kuwa utafiti bado uko kwenye siku za mapema. Kama wataalam wengine, ana shaka kuhusu kama ugonjwa wa kisukari unaweza kutibiwa, akagundua kuwa matokeo haya hayana umuhimu kwa watu ambao tayari wana ugojwa wa kisukari wa aina 1."
mt: """Now we have four-month-old rats who are diabetic who previously were not diabetic"", he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific committee of the Canadian Diabetes Association, said the research is still in its early days. Like other researchers, he questioned whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these results have no relevance for people who already have type 1 diabetes."
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Twin Otter ilikuwa ikijaribu kutua jana kama ndege ya PNG CG4684, lakini tayari ilikuwa imeshindwa mara moja. Takribani dakika kumi kabla ya kutua kutoka kwa ujio wake wa pili ilipotea. Mahali pa ajali palipatikana leo na ni mahali pasipofikika kabisa hivi kwamba polisi wawili walishushwa msituni ili watembee waende kwenye eneo la tukio na kutafuta walionusurika. Utafutaji huo ulikuwa umetatizwa na hali hiyo hiyo mbaya ya hewa ambayo ilikuwa imesababisha kukatizwa kwa utuaji.
mt: The Twin Otter was attempting to depart yesterday as PNG CG4684, but had already failed once. About ten minutes before its second departure, it disappeared. The crash site was found today and is a place that is not reachable by road, so two police officers were sent to the area to walk to the scene and look for the injured. This search was hampered by the poor weather that had caused the crash.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: """Kwa bahati nzuri hakuna klichofanyika kwangu, lakini niliona jambo la kutisha sana, watu walipokuwa wakijaribu kuvunja madirisha ili watoke nje. Watu walikuwa wakigonga vioo kwa viti, lakini madirisha hayangevunjika. Kimojawapo cha vioo kilivunjika hatimaye, na wakaanza kutoka nje kupitia dirishani,"" alisema manusura Franciszek Kowal."
mt: """Fortunately, nothing happened to me, but I saw a very scary thing, people were trying to break the doors to get out. People were hitting the windows with sticks, but the doors would not break. One of the windows broke eventually, and they started to leave through the doors,"" Kowal said.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Dhoruba ya Kitropiki Danielle, iliyotajwa kuwa dhoruba ya nne ya msimu wa vimbunga vya Atlantiki vya 2010, imejiunda mashariki mwa Bahari ya Atlantiki. Dhoruba hiyo, iliyo takribani maili 3,000 kutoka Miami, Florida, ina kiwango cha juu thabiti cha upepo cha maili 40 kwa saa (kilomita 64 kwa saa). Wanasayansi katika Kituo cha Kitaifa cha Vimbunga wanabashiri kwamba Danielle itaimarika kuwa kimbunga kufikia Jumatano. Wakati dhoruba bado haijafikia kuporomoka kwa ardhi, inabakia kuwa vigumu kupima athari zinazoweza kukumba Marekani au Karibian.
mt: Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed east of the Atlantic Ocean. The storm, about 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has sustained winds of 40 mph (64 km/h). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict Danielle will become a hurricane by Wednesday. The storm is still too far out to sea to accurately measure its potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dkt. Lee pia alieleza wasiwasi wake kuhusu ripoti kwamba watoto katika Uturuki sasa wameambukizwa virusi vya homa ya ndege A(H5N1) bila kuugua. Baadhi ya tafiti zinapendekeza kwamba ni lazima ugonjwa huo upunguze uwezo wa kuua kabla ya kusababisha janga la kimataifa, alisema. Kuna wasiwasi kuwa wagonjwa wanaweza kuendelea kuambukiza watu wengi kwa kuendelea na shughuli zao za kila siku kama dalili za homa hiyo zitabaki kuwa pole.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern about reports that children in Turkey are now infected with the bird flu virus A(H5N1) without dying. Some studies suggest that the disease must reduce its ability to kill before causing a global pandemic, he said. There is concern that patients can continue to infect many people by continuing their daily activities as symptoms of this disease remain mild.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Mnamo usiku wa Agosti 9, jicho la Marakot lilikuwa karibu kilomita sabini kutoka kwenye mkoa wa uchina wa Fujian. Kimbunga hicho kinakadiriwa kusonga kuelekea Uchina kwa kasi ya kilomita kumi na moja kwa saa.
mt: 9 August, the Marakot eye was about sixty kilometers from the Fujian province of China. The eruption is estimated to be moving towards China at a rate of ten kilometers per hour.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Rais wa Marekani George W. Bush alifika Singapori asubuhi ya Novemba 16, hivyo kuanza ziara ya Asia ya wiki moja. Alisalimiwa na Naibu Waziri Mkuu wa Singapori Wong Kan Seng na wakajadili masuala ya biashara na ughaidi na Waziri Mkuu wa Singapori Lee Hsien Loong. Baada ya wiki ya kushindwa katika uchaguzi wa nusu muhula, Bush aliambia hadhira kuhusu upanuzi wa biashara katika Asia.
mt: 16 November 2006, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, thus beginning his one-week Asian tour. He was greeted by Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed business and terrorism with Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After losing the midterm elections, Bush told the audience about the expansion of business in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Tangazo la leo limeongeza kujitolea kwa serikali kulikofanyika Machi mwaka huu kufadhili mabehewa ya ziada. Mwongezo wa 300 unaleta jumla ya magari 1,300 kutafutwa ili kupunguza msongamano.
mt: 300 more vehicles are being sought to help the government's March effort to increase traffic enforcement. The addition of 300 vehicles brings the total number of vehicles being sought to 1,300 to reduce congestion.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "Alisema, ""Hakuna busara ya kupendekeza kuwa shambulio linatarajiwa kabisa. Hata hivyo, kupungua kwa kiwango cha vitisho kuwa kikubwa zaidi hakumaanishi tishio la jumla limeenda.”"
mt: "He said, ""There is no assurance that the attack is expected at all. However, a decrease in the level of violence to be greater does not mean that the overall threat has gone.”"
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly aliapisha Baraza mpya la muda la Uchaguzi la (CEP) la wanachama tisa jana. Ni CEP ya tano ya Martelly katika miaka minne. Mwezi uliopita tume ya rais ilipendekeza kujiuzulu kwa CEP iliyotangulia kama sehemu ya kifurushi cha hatua za kusogeza nchi kuelekea uchaguzi mpya. Tume ilikuwa jibu la Martelly kwa maandamano yaliyoenea dhidi ya utawala ambayo yalianza mnamo Oktoba. Maandamano hayo ambayo wakati mwingine huwa jeuri yalianzishwa na ukosefu wa kuwa na uchaguzi, ambapo mwingine ulichelewa tangu 2011.
mt: Martelly appointed a new nine-member Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) yesterday. It is the fourth CEP appointed by Martelly in four years. Last month the president's council recommended the dissolution of the previous CEP as part of a series of steps to move the country towards new elections. The council was a response to Martelly's handling of protests that began in October. The protests, which sometimes turned violent, were sparked by the lack of elections, which were delayed since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics hukubali barua ya Kamati ya Olimpiki ya Marekani na hukubali hitaji kuu la familia ya Olimpiki la kukuza mazingira salama kwa wanariadha wetu wote. Tunakubaliana na taarifa ya USOC kwamba masilahi ya wanariadha na vilabu vyetu, na spoti yao, huenda yakashughulikiwa vyema kwa kusonga mbele na mabadiliko ya maana ndani ya shirika letu, badala ya kughairi vyeti. USA Gymnastics inaunga mkono uchunguzi huru ambao labda utafafanua jinsi unyanyasaji wa kiwango kama vile ulivyoelezewa kwa ujasiri sana na manusura wa Larry Nassar ungekosa kugunduliwa kwa muda mrefu hivyo na inakumbatia mabadiliko muhimu na ya kufaa. USA Gymnastics na USOC zina lengo moja — kuifanya spoti ya sarakasi, na nyingine, salama iwezekanavyo ili wanariadha wafuate ndoto zao katika mazingira salama, chanya na ya kuwezesha.
mt: USA Gymnastics accepts the USOC's letter and recognizes the need for our Olympic and Paralympic families to have safe environments. We agree with the USOC's statement that the well-being of our athletes and our sport, and our sport's athletes, may be better served by addressing these issues in a comprehensive and meaningful way, rather than by ignoring them. USA Gymnastics supports a thorough review that may shed light on how the abuse of Larry Nassar's kind and magnitude was not identified sooner and we recognize the need for significant and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC share one goal — to make the sport safe for our athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, supportive and enabling environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: USA Gymnastics hukubali barua ya Kamati ya Olimpiki ya Marekani na hukubali hitaji kuu la familia ya Olimpiki la kukuza mazingira salama kwa wanariadha wetu wote. Tunakubaliana na taarifa ya USOC kwamba masilahi ya wanariadha na vilabu vyetu, na spoti yao, huenda yakashughulikiwa vyema kwa kusonga mbele na mabadiliko ya maana ndani ya shirika letu, badala ya kughairi vyeti. USA Gymnastics inaunga mkono uchunguzi huru ambao labda utafafanua jinsi unyanyasaji wa kiwango kama vile ulivyoelezewa kwa ujasiri sana na manusura wa Larry Nassar ungekosa kugunduliwa kwa muda mrefu hivyo na inakumbatia mabadiliko muhimu na ya kufaa. USA Gymnastics na USOC zina lengo moja — kuifanya spoti ya sarakasi, na nyingine, salama iwezekanavyo ili wanariadha wafuate ndoto zao katika mazingira salama, chanya na ya kuwezesha.
mt: USA Gymnastics accepts the USOC's letter and recognizes the need for our Olympic and Paralympic families to have safe environments. We agree with the USOC's statement that the well-being of our athletes and our sport, and our sport's athletes, may be better served by addressing these issues in a comprehensive and meaningful way, rather than by ignoring them. USA Gymnastics supports a thorough review that may shed light on how the abuse of Larry Nassar's kind and magnitude was not identified sooner and we recognize the need for significant and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC share one goal — to make the sport safe for our athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, supportive and enabling environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Jeshi la Wanamaji la Marekani pia limesema wanachunguza tukio hilo. Pia walisema katika taarifa, “Wafanyakazi sasa hivi wanafanya kazi kuamua mbinu bora ya kuondoa meli kwa usalama”. Ikiwa meli ya hatua za kupinga mabomu ya daraja la Avenger, meli hiyo ilikuwa ikielekea Puerto Princesa katika Palawan. Imewekwa kwenye kundi la Saba la meli za Nevi ya Marekani ya iliyoko Sasebo, Nagasaki huko Japani.
mt: The United States Navy also said it was investigating the incident. It also said in a statement, "Personnel are currently working to determine the best course of action to safely remove the vessel." If the Avenger-class minesweeper was heading to Puerto Princesa in Palawan, it had been assigned to the Seventh Fleet, which is based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Mwishoni mwa Jumapili, Rais wa Marekani Donald Trump, katika taarifa iliyowasilishwa kupitia katibu wa uandishi wa habari, alitangaza kwamba vikosi vya Marekani vitaondoka Siria. Tangazo lilifanywa baada ya Trump kuwa na mazungumzo ya simu na Rais wa Uturuki Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Uturuki ilikua yachukua ulinzi wa wapiganaji wa ISIS waliotekwa ambao, tangazo lilisema kuwa, nchi za Ulaya zilikataa kurudi.
mt: On Sunday, President Donald Trump, in a statement released through press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders, announced that U.S. troops will leave Syria. The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Turkey had taken control of ISIS fighters who were captured, the statement said, and European countries had refused to return them.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Muungano na vikosi vya Afghani vilihamia eneo hilo ili kulisalimisha pamoja na ndege nyingine za muungano zimetumwa ili kusaidia. Kishindo hicho kilitokea juu zaidi kwenye milima, na inaaminika kilikuwa matokeo ya shambulizi la adui. Juhudi za kutafuta eneo la ajali zinapingwa na hali mbaya ya hewa na maeneo yenye mazingara magumu.
mt: The coalition and Afghan forces arrived at the scene to assist and other coalition aircraft were dispatched. The crash occurred higher up in the mountains, and it is believed to be the result of enemy fire. Efforts to locate the crash site are hampered by poor weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Baada ya bwawa kujengwa mwaka wa 1963, mafuriko ya msimu ambayo yangeenea kote yalisimamishwa. Mashapo yalikuwa muhimu kwa kuunda mafungu ya mchanga na pwani, ambazo zilitumika kama makao ya wanyamapori. Kama matokeo, spishi mbili za samaki zimetoweka, na nyingine mbili zimekuwa katika hatari, zikiwemo humpback chub. Ingawa kiwango cha maji kitaongezeka kwa futi chache tu baada ya mafuriko, maafisa wanatumai kwamba kitatosha kurejesha mafungu ya mchanga yaliyomomonyolewa katika sehemu ya chini ya mto.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, seasonal flooding that would have covered the entire area was prevented. The marshes were important in creating sandbars and beaches, which were used as nesting sites for birds. As a result, two species of fish have gone extinct, and two others are endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will rise only a few feet after flooding, officials believe it will be enough to restore the marshes that were destroyed in the lower part of the river.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "Ubalozi wa Marekani ulio katika Nairobi, Kenya umetoa ilani kwamba ""watu wenye msimamo mkali kutoka Somalia"" wanapanga kufanya shambulio la bomu katika Kenya na Ethiopia. Amerika inasema imepokea habari kutoka kwa chanzo kisicho wazi ambacho kinataja haswa matumizi ya walipuaji mabomu wa kujitolea mhanga kulipua ""alamardhi maarufu"" nchini Ethiopia na Kenya."
mt: "The US Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, has issued a warning that ""people with extreme views from Somalia"" are planning to carry out bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The US says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to detonate ""well-known"" car bombs in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Mawakili maarufu wa Ugiriki, Sakis Kechagiogluo na George Nikolakopoulos wametiwa korokoroni katika jela ya Athens ya Korydallus, kwani walipatikana na hatia ya kula rushwa na ufisadi. Kama matokeo, sakata kubwa ndani ya jamii ya kisheria ya Ugiriki imeibuliwa kupitia kufunuliwa kwa vitendo haramu ambavyo majaji, mawakili, wanenea, na wanasheria wamefanya katika miaka iliyopita. Wiki chache zilizopita, baada ya taarifa iliyochapishwa na mwanahabari Makis Triantafylopoulos kwenye kipindi chake maarufu cha televisheni ""Zoungla"" katika Alpha TV, mbunge na Mwanasheria, Petros Mantouvalos alifanywa kujiuzulu kwani memba wa ofisi yake walikuwa wamehusika katika hongo haramu na ufisadi. Waaidha, hakimu mkuu Evangelos Kalousis alifungwa jela kwani alipatikana na hatia ya ufisadi na tabia mbaya."
mt: "Two prominent Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagiogluo and George Nikolakopoulos, were sentenced to prison in Athens' Korydallus jail, because they were found guilty of bribery and corruption. As a result, a major scandal in the country's legal system has been exposed by revealing the corrupt acts that judges, lawyers, prosecutors, and lawyers have committed in the past. A few weeks ago, after the publication of a report by journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos on his popular television show "Zoungla" on Alpha TV, MP and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos, resigned because members of his office were involved in bribery and corruption. Furthermore, chief judge Evangelos Kalousis was jailed because he was found guilty of corruption and bad behavior."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa alifanya alama za juu za fursa, pointi 70 katika mipira 41 kwa kufikia nne 11 na sita 2. Wachezaji wa kati wa kriketi, Sachin Tendulkar na Rahul Dravid, walicheza vizuri na kushirikiana katika masafa mia moja. Lakini, baada ya kupoteza wiketi ya kapteni India ilifanya pointi 36 na kupoteza wiketi 7 kumaliza fursa.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the top score of the innings, 70 runs in 41 balls for 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, played well and cooperated in the 100 run stand. But after losing the captain's wicket, India scored 36 runs and lost 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Msimamizi wa Commons Adam Cuerden alielezea kufadhaika kwake kuhusu ufutaji huo alipoongea na Wikinews mwezi uliopita. ""Yeye [Wales] kimsingi alindanganya tangu mwanzo. Kwanza kwa kufanya kama hii ni kwa sababu za kisheria. Pili, kwa kujifanya alikuwa anatusikiliza, hadi saana yake ifutwe."" Hasira ya jamii imesababisha juhudi za sasa za kutayarisha sera kuhusu kadiri ya ngono kwa wavuti ambayo inakaribisha mamilioni ya vyombo vya habari vilivyo na leseni wazi."
mt: "Commons manager Adam Cuerden described his frustration over the deletion of that page when he spoke to Wikinews last month.  ""He [Wales] has been playing us from the start. First, because of legal reasons. Second, by pretending to listen, until his own page is deleted."" Community outrage has led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding the extent of pornography on websites that accept millions of open-licensing news articles."
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Si wote waliunga mkono kuingizwa kwa vyeo vya wanawake. Daktari wa medali ya fedha ya Olimpiki ya 2004 Amir Khan alisema, ""Chini kabisa nadhani wanawake hawapaswi kupigana. Huo ni maoni yangu."" Licha ya maoni yake alisema ataunga mkono washindani wa Kiingereza katika Olimpiki za 2012 ambazo zinafanyika nchini London."
mt: 2004 Athens Olympic gold medalist Amir Khan, a boxing doctor, said, "I don't think women should be fighting. That's my opinion." He said he would support British competitors at the 2012 Olympics, which will be held in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, mwendeshaji wa pikipiki za mashindano mwenye umri wa miaka 13, alifariki baada ya kuhusika katika ajali kwenye Motor Speedway ya Indianapolis. Wakati akiwa kwenye mazoezi yake ya matayarisho, Lenz alianguka kutoka kwa baiskeli yake, kisha akagongwa na mwanariadha mwenzake Xavier Zayat. Mara moja alihudumiwa na wafanyikazi wa matibabu ya kufuatilia na kusafirishwa hadi hospitali ya eneo hilo ambapo baadaye alifariki. Zayat hakujeruhiwa katika ajali hiyo.
mt: 13-year-old motorcycle racer Peter Lenz died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While in his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, then was struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately treated by trackside medical personnel and transported to the local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the crash.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

Mara moja alihudumiwa na wafanyikazi wa matibabu ya kufuatilia na kusafirishwa hadi hospitali ya eneo hilo ambapo baadaye alifariki. Zayat hakujeruhiwa katika ajali hiyo.
mt: 13-year-old motorcycle racer Peter Lenz died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While in his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, then was struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately treated by trackside medical personnel and transported to the local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the crash.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Kusafiri kwa ndege kunaweza kuwa uzoefu wa kuogofya kwa watu wa umri na malezi yote, hasa kama hawajasafiri kwa ndege tena au walipatwa na tukio la kufadhaisha. Si jambo la kuaibikia: si tofauti sana na hofu ya kibinafsi na isiyopenda vitu vingine ambayo watu wengi wako nayo. Kwa wengine, kuelewa jinsi ndege inavyofanya kazi na kinachotokea wakati wa ndege kuruka inaweza kusaidia kushinda hofu ambayo msingi wake ni mambo yasiyojulikana ama kutokuwa kwenye udhibiti.
mt: Flying can be an anxiety-inducing experience for people of all ages, especially if they haven't flown before or have been traumatized by a previous flight. It's not a big deal: it's not much different from other fears and phobias that many people have. For some, understanding how planes work and what happens when they take off can help overcome fears that are based on unknowns or lack of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Siku hizi usafiri wa ndege huhifadhiwa moja kwa moja mara chache kupitia kampuni ya ndege bila kwanza kutafuta na kulinganisha bei. Wakati mwingine safari moja inaweza kuwa na bei zinazotofautiana sana katika wajumuishaji tofauti na ina faida kulinganisha matokeo ya utafutaji na pia kuangalia tovuti ya kampuni ya ndege yenyewe kabla ya kuhifadhi.
mt: Today, air travel is often booked one at a time through an airline's website. Sometimes a single trip can have widely varying prices in different aggregators and it is beneficial to compare results and also look at the airline's website itself before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Kampuni za uchukuzi hulipwa vizuri kwa kufikisha vitu haraka. Mara kwa mara, muda ni muhimu sana kwa hati za kibiashara, bidhaa, au vipuli kwa ukarabati wa haraka. Katika baadhi ya njia, kampuni kubwa zina ndege zao wenyewe, lakini kwa njia nyingine na kampuni ndogo kulikuwa na shida. Kama wangetuma vitu kwa mizigo ya ndege, katika baadhi ya njia huenda ingechukua siku kadhaa kukamilisha upakuaji na forodha. Njia pekee ya kuipitisha kwa haraka ilikuwa kuituma kama mzigo uliokaguliwa. Kanuni za kampuni za ndege hazitazikubalia kutuma mzigo bila abiria, ambapo ndipo unaingilia.
mt: Shipping companies are paid well for fast delivery. Often, time is very important for business, product, or construction. In some cases, large companies have their own planes, but in other cases, small companies had a problem. If they shipped goods by plane, in some cases it could take days to complete the loading and customs. The only way to get it done quickly was to ship it as cargo only. Airlines' rules do not allow shipping cargo without passengers, where you enter.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Unafaa kuchagua kampuni ya Usafiri wa Mara Nyingi katika muungano kwa makini. Ingawa unaweza kudhani ni bora zaidi kujiunga na kampuni ya ndege unayotumia zaidi, unapaswa kujua kuwa marupurupu yanayotolewa mara nyingi ni tofauti na pointi za usafiri wa mara kwa mara huenda zikawa karimu zaidi chini ya kampuni tofauti katika muungano mmoja.
mt: When choosing an airline alliance, you may think it's best to join the one you fly most often, but you should know that frequent flyer points may be different under different airlines in one alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Kunywa vinywaji vyenye pombe kwa kiasi tu. Pombe inaathiri kila mtu kwa njia tofauti, na kujua kiwango chako ni muhimu sana. Matukio ya kiafya ya muda mrefu kutokana na kunywa kupita kiasi yanaweza kujumuisha uharibifu wa ini na hata upofu na kifo. Kuwepo kwa hatari huongezeka wakati wa kunywa pombe iliyotengenezwa kiharamu. Mivinyo isiyo halali inaweza kuwa na uchafu mwingi hatari pamoja na methanoli, ambayo inaweza kusababisha upofu au kifo hata kwa kiasi kidogo.
mt: 1. Drink only occasionally. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is important. Long-term health problems from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even death. The risk increases when drinking homemade alcohol. Illicit alcohol can be very dangerous, containing high levels of methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small amounts.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Wilaya ya Canal (Kiholanzi: Grachtengordel) ni wilaya maarufu ya karne ya 17 inayozunguka Binnenstad ya Amsterdam. Wilaya nzima imeteuliwa kama Pahali pa Urithi wa Shirika la Umoja wa Mataifa la Elimu, Sayansi na Utamaduni kwa thamani yake ya kipekee ya kitamaduni na kihistoria, na thamani yake ya mali ni kati ya zile za juu zaidi ya nchi.
mt: 17th-century Canal District is a well-known district surrounding Amsterdam's Binnenstad. The entire district has been designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, kilomita 12 kusini magharibi mwa Siem Reap. Hekalu hili la kilimani lilijengwa mwishoni mwa karne ya 9, wakati wa utawala wa Mfalme Yasovarman. Mazingira yenye huzuni ya hekalu na mwonekano wa ziwa la Tonle Sap ulifanya ukweaji kilima kuwa wa maana. Ziara katika eneo hilo inaweza kujumuishwa kwa urahisi na safari ya ziwa katika boti. Kibali cha Angkor kinahitajika ili kuingia katika hekalu kwa hivyo usisahau kubeba pasipoti yako unapoelekea Tonle Sap.
mt: 12 kilometers southwest of Siem Reap. This mountain temple was built at the end of the 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. The temple's somber atmosphere and the view of Lake Tonle Sap made the mountain's construction meaningful. A visit to the area can be easily combined with a boat trip on the lake. An Angkor pass is required to enter the temple, so don't forget to bring your pass with you when you head to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antaktika ndio mahali baridi zaidi Duniani na huzunguka Nguzo la Kusini. Ziara za watalii ni za gharama kubwa, zinahitaji usawa wa kimwili, zinaweza kufanyika tu katika msimu wa joto wa Novemba-Februari, na kwa njia kubwa zinafanyika tu Peninsula, Visiwani na Bahari ya Ross. Maelfu machache ya wafanyakazi huishi hapa wakati wa kiangazi kwenye dazeni nne za makazi aghalabu katika maeneo hayo; idadi ndogo hukaa wakati wa msimu wa baridi. Bara la Antaktiki ni jangwa la ukiwa lililofunikwa na kilomita 2-3 za barafu. Safari za anga za mara kwa mara za wataalam huenda bara, kwa upandaji milima au kufikia Nchani, ambayo ina msingi mkubwa.
mt: Antartica is the coldest place on Earth and circles the South Pole. Tourist visits are expensive, require physical fitness, can only be made in the warm season of November-February, and are mostly limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. Few workers live here during the summer in four camps, but in those areas; a small number stay during the winter. The land of Antartica is a frozen desert with 2-3 meters of ice. Air trips to the land, over mountains or to the interior, which has a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Uchunguzi kabla ya kisasa kwa kawaida hautumiki leo, na hubaki kama makavazi, ama sehemu za elimu. Kwani uchafuzi wa mwanga nyakati zao haukuwa shida kama ilivyo leo, mara nyingi wako mijini au katikavyuo vikuu, rahisi kufikia kuliko zile zimejengwa siku za kisasa. Darubini nyingi za utafiti za kisasa ni vifaa kuu katika maeneo ya mbali yaliyo na hali nzuri za angahewa.
mt: Pre-modern research usually does not require electricity today, and remains as candles, or parts of education. Because their lighting problems were not as bad as today, they are often in cities or large universities, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Many modern research tools are the main tools in remote areas with good lighting conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Kuna fukwe nyingi, kutokana na kukaliwa magamaga kwa kwa bandari mbili na Auckland. Maarufu zaidi ziko katika sehemu tatu. Fukwe za pwani ya Kaskazini (katika wilaya ya Kaskazini mwa Bandari) ziko kwenye Bahari ya Pasifiki na zinyooka kutoka Long Bay kaskazini hadi Devonport kusini. Karibu fukwe zote ni za mchanga na uogeleaji salama na nyingi yake huwa na kivuli chini ya miti ya pohutukawa. Pwani za Tamaki Drive ziko katika Bandari ya Waitemata, kwenye maeneo ya kifahari ya Mission Bay na St. Heliers katika Auckland ya Kati. Hizi ni pwani za kifamilia ambazo wakati mwingine hujaa watu, zilizo na masafa ya maduka katika ufuo. Uogeleaji ni salama.
mt: There are many, due to the closure of two harbours and Auckland. The most famous are in three areas. The North Shore (in the North Shore Harbour) are on the Pacific Ocean and run from Long Bay north to Devonport south. All beaches are sandy and safe for swimming and most have shade under pohutukawa trees. The Tamaki Drive beaches are in the Waitemata Harbour, in the inner city areas of Mission Bay and St. Heliers in Auckland Central. These are family beaches that sometimes people go, with shops in the foreshore. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Tafadhali kumbuka kuwa hasa unatembelea mahali penye kaburi la watu wengi, na pia mahali ambapo pana maana isiyoweza kutabiriwa kwa sehemu kubwa ya idadi ya watu ulimwenguni. Kungali kuna wanaume na wanawake wengi walio hai walioishi muda wao hapa, na wengine wengi ambao wapendwa wao waliuawa au walifanyishwa kazi hadi kufa, Wayahudi na wasio Wayahudi vilevile. Tafadhali tendea mahali hapo kwa hadhi yote, utaratibu na heshima inayostahiki. Usifanye utani juu ya Maangamizo au Wanazi. Usiumbue tovuti kwa kuashiria au kukata michoro kwenye miundo.
mt: Please remember that especially when visiting a place with many graves, and also where there is a large amount of people living there, there are many men and women who lived their lives here, and many others who were loved and who were made to work until they died, both Jews and non-Jews. Please respect the place with all due respect, order and dignity. Do not make a disturbance over the Prophecies or the Prophets. Do not focus on the website by posting or taking pictures of the layout.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Lugha saidizi ni lugha bandia au za kubuniwa zinazoundwa kwa lengo la kusaidia mawasiliano kati ya watu ambao vinginevyo wangepata shida ya kuwasiliana. Wao ni tofauti na lingua Francas, ambayo ni lugha asilia au ya kikaboni ambazo huwa maarufu kwa sababu moja au nyingine kama njia ya mawasiliano kati ya wasemaji wa lugha nyingine.
mt: A constructed language is a language that has been consciously devised rather than having evolved naturally. They are distinct from natural languages, which are either the result of natural evolution of a spoken language or the result of language planning. Constructed languages are also distinct from creole languages, which are the result of natural evolution of a pidgin language.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Kama unavuka Northern Baltic katika msimu wa baridi, kagua eneo la kibanda, kwani kupita katika theluji husababisha kelele mbaya kwa wale wanaoathirika zaidi. Safari za baharini za Mtakatifu Petersburge hujumuisha muda wa mjini. Abiria hawa wameepushwa na mahitaji ya visa (angalia masharti).
mt: If you are traveling to the Northern Baltic in the winter season, consider visiting the countryside, as driving through the snow can be dangerous for those who are more affected. Cruises to St. Petersburg include city time. These passengers have been pushed by visa requirements (see terms).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Lugha rasmi za Baselona Kikatalani na Kihispania. Takribani nusu yao wanapendelea kuongea Kikatalani, idadi kubwa wanaielewa, na karibu kila mtu anajua Kihispania. Hata hivyo, ishara nyingi huonyeshwa kwa Kikatalani kwa sababu imewekwa kisheria kama lugha rasmi ya kwanza. Kihispania bado hutumika sana katika uchukuzi wa umma na maeneo mengine. Matangazo ya mara kwa mara katika Metro hufanywa tu kwa Kitalani, lakini usumbufu usiopangwa hutangazwa kwa mifumo otomatiki kwa kutumia lugha mbalimbali zikiwemo Kihispania, Kiingereza, Kifaransa, Kiarabu na Kijapanisi.
mt: Official languages of Barcelona Catalan and Spanish. About half of its population prefers to speak Catalan, a large majority understands it, and almost everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are in Catalan because it is the official language of first choice. Spanish is still widely used in public administration and other areas. Announcements on the Metro are only in Catalan, but unattended announcements are made in several languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Katika nchi zilizoendelea leo, kuandaa kitanda cha deluksi na kiamshakinywa imeimarishwa kwa aina fulani ya kisanaa. Mwishowe, ni wazi kwamba B&Bs hushindana haswa kwenye vitu viwili vikuu: matandiko na kiamsha kinywa. Ipasavyo, katika bora zaidi ya vituo hivyo mtu anafaa kupata matandiko ya kistarehe zaidi, pengine firasha iliyotengenezwa kwa mkono au kitanda cha kizamani. Kiamsha kinywa kinaweza kujumuisha faraha za misimuwa kutoka katika eneo au mlo maalum ya mwenyeji. Kikao kinaweza kuwa kwenye jumba nzee la kihistoria lililo na vyombo vya kale, uwanja wenye nyasi zilizokatwa vizuri na bwawa la kuogelea.
mt: In developing countries today, preparing a bed and breakfast has been made easier by some sort of competition. In the best of these establishments, one should be able to get better morning coffee, perhaps made by hand or a historical building with old fixtures. Breakfast can be on a manicured lawn with a well-trimmed golf course and a fishing pond.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Mji wa Beijing nchini Uchina utakuwa mji mwenyeji wa mashindano ya Olimpiki ya Msimu wa Baridi mwaka wa 2022, ambayo itaifanya Beijing kuwa mji wa kwanza kuwa mwenyeji wa Olimpiki ya majira ya joto na baridi. Beijing itakuwa mwenyeji wa sherehe za kufungua na kufunga na matukio ya ndani kwenye barafu. Matukio mengine ya kuteleza kwenye theluji yatakuwa katika eneo la Taizicheng katika Zhangjiakou, takribani kilomita 220 (maili 140) kutoka Beijing.
mt: Beijing, China will be the host city of the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the ice events. Other events will be held in the Zhangjiakou area, about 220 kilometers (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Homa ya ndege inaweza kuambukiza ndege na pia mamalia. Kesi chache chini ya elfu zimewahi kuripotiwa kwa wanadamu, lakini baadhi yazo zilipelekea kifo. Mengi yamehusisha watu ambao hufanya kazi na kuku, lakini pia kuna hatari kiasi kwa watazama ndege.
mt: Bird strikes can injure or kill animals and aircraft. Fewer than 100 human bird strike cases have been reported, but some have been fatal. Many involve people who work with birds, but there is also a risk for bird watchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Maharamia wa Skandinavia walitumia njia za majini za Kirusi kufika kwenye Bahari Nyeusi na Bahari ya Kaspi. Sehemu za njia hizo bado zinaweza kutumika. Angalia uwezekano wa kuhitaji vibali maalum, ambavyo huenda ikawa vigumu kuvipata. Mfereji kati ya Bahari Nyeupe na Baltic huunganisha Bahari kuu ya Atiki na Bahari ya Baltic, kupitia Ziwa Onega, Ziwa Ladoga na Saint Petersburg, mara nyingi kwa mito na maziwa. Ziwa Onega limeunganishwa na Volga, kwa hivyo bado inawezekana kusafiri kutoka Bahari Caspian kupitia Urusi.
mt: Scandinavian ships have used the Russian inland waterways to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some parts of these routes are still usable. Check the possibility of requiring special permits, which may be difficult to obtain. The Baltic Sea connects the main Baltic Sea and the Baltic Sea, through Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, often by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is connected to the Volga, so it is still possible to travel from the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Kituo cha kukaguliwa kwa wahamiaji kwa kawaida ndipo mahali pa kwanza kusimama unaposhuka kwenye ndege, meli ama gari jingine. Katika baadhi ya garimoshi zinazovuka mipaka ukaguzi hufanywa terni likiwa kwenye mwendo na hivyo unapaswa kuwa na kitambulisho halali unapopanda mojawapo ya treni hizo. Kwenye treni za kulala usiku, pasipoti zinaweza kukusanywa na kondakta ili usingizi wako usitatizwe.
mt: 1. The first place to stop is usually a port of entry. When you get off the plane, boat, or car, you will be asked to show your passport. 2. On some trains that cross borders, you will be asked to show your passport while the train is moving. 3. On overnight trains, the conductor may collect your ticket to make sure you are sleeping in your assigned seat.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Singapori kwa ujumla ni mahali salama zaidi kuwa na rahisi sana kuabiri, na unaweza kununua karibu chochote baada ya kuwasili. Lakini kwa kuwekwa katika “tropiki za juu” digrii chache tu kaskazini mwa istiwai utahitaji kukabiliana na joto jingi (kila wakati) na jua kali (wakati anga ni safi, nadra zaidi).
mt: Singapore is generally a safe and easy place to visit, and you can buy almost anything after you arrive. But being in the “upper tropics” only a few degrees north of the equator, you will need to deal with hot (all the time) and strong sun (when the weather is dry, less often).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Mikate ya Kijerumani ni mizuri mno, na huko Bavaria, ni bora zaidi na tofauti, sawasawa na ile ya jirani yao wa kusini, Austria. Vinyunga vya matunda ni za kawaida, na tufaa zilizopikwa kuwa vinyunga mwaka mzima, na cheri na plamu zikionekana wakati wa msimu wa joto. Nyingi ya bidhaa za kuokwa kutoka Ujerumani huwa lozi, na karanga. Keki zilizo maarufu mara nyingi huambatana vizuri na kikombe cha kahawa kali. Ikiwa unataka vitumbua vidogo ingawa bora, jaribu kile ambacho kutegemea eneo kinaitwa Berliner, Pfannkuchen au Krapfen.
mt: German breads are excellent, and in Bavaria, they are better and different, just like their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pies are common, and pies baked to be fruit pies all year, cherries and plums appear during the hot season. Many of the baked goods from Germany are light, and cakes. Common cakes often go well with a strong cup of coffee. If you want small but good, try what is called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Ikiwa unataka kuuona ulimwengu kwa urahisi, kwa umuhimu, mtindo wa maisha au chamgamoto, kuna baadhi ya njia za kufanya hivyo. Kimsingi wao huwa katika vikundi viwili: fanya kazi ukiwa safarini ama jaribu upunguze gharama zako. Nakala hii inaangazia wa mwisho. Kwa wale walio tayari kuacha starehe, muda na utabiri ili kupunguza garama hadi sufuri, angalia usafiri wa bajeti ndogo. Ushauri huo unachukulia kuwa wasafiri hawaibi, hawana uingiliaji, hawashiriki katika soko haramu, hawaombi, au kunyonya watu wengine kwa faida yao.
mt: If you want to see the world easily, with importance, lifestyle or adventure, there are some ways to do so. In principle, they are in two groups: work while traveling or try to reduce your costs. This article is about the latter. For those ready to give up comfort, time and forecast to reduce costs down to the bone, see budget travel. This advice assumes that these travelers are not tourists, they do not interfere, they do not participate in the black market, they do not ask, or bribe other people for their benefit.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Eneo katikati mwa Point Marion na Fairmont hutoa hali za uendeshaji gari zenye changamoto zaidi katika Barabara Kuu ya Buffalo-Pittsburgh, inayopitia mara kwa mara kwenye maeneo ya ardhi yaliyo katika misitu iliyotengwa. Kama hujazoea kuendesha gari katika barabara za mashambani, kaa chonjo: miinuko mikali, njia nyembamba, na na pembe kali zimejaa. Viwango vya kasi vilivyotumwa viko chini kabisa kuliko vya sehemu za zamani na zilizofuata — kawaida maili 35-40 kwa saa (kilomita 56-64 kwa saa) — na utii mkali kwavyo ni muhimu zaidi kuliko vinginevyo. Cha kushangaza hata hivyo, huduma ya simu ya rununu ina nguvu sana hapa kuliko tandaa zingine za njia kama Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The middle section of Point Marion to Fairmont offers the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, which passes through frequently logged forested areas. If you're not used to driving in rural areas, stay alert: narrow roads, winding roads, and sharp curves abound. Speed limits are the lowest of any section and the most important to follow — typically 35-40 mph (kilometers 56-64 per hour) — and caution is especially important here than in other areas.  Surprisingly, cell phone service is strong here than in other stretches of road such as Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Kuingia kwenye korongo (au: canyoneering) ni kuhusu kwenda chini ya korongo, ambayo imekauka au imejawa na maji. Mchezo wa korongo huchanganya vipengele kutoka kuogelea, kupanda na kuruka--lakini unahitaji mafunzo kiasi au hali nzuri ya kimwili ili kuanza (ukilinganishwa na kupanda mwamba, upigaji mbizi wa scuba au kuteleza milimani, kwa mfano).
mt: Caving (or: canyoneering) is about going down into a cave, which has been formed or eroded by water. The sport of caving combines elements of hiking, climbing and rappelling—but you need training or good physical condition to start (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or mountaineering, for example).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Kuingia kwenye korongo (au: canyoneering) ni kuhusu kwenda chini ya korongo, ambayo imekauka au imejawa na maji. Mchezo wa korongo huchanganya vipengele kutoka kuogelea, kupanda na kuruka--lakini unahitaji mafunzo kiasi au hali nzuri ya kimwili ili kuanza (ukilinganishwa na kupanda mwamba, upigaji mbizi wa scuba au kuteleza milimani, kwa mfano).
mt: Caving (or: canyoneering) is about going down into a cave, which has been formed or eroded by water. The sport of caving combines elements of hiking, climbing and rappelling—but you need training or good physical condition to start (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or mountaineering, for example).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Kuingia kwenye gari lako na kuelekea kwa safari ya mbali ya barabara kuna mvutio wa ndani kwa urahisi wake. Tofauti na magari makubwa, labda tayari unajua kuendesha gari lako na unajua mapungufu yake. Kuweka hema kwenye mali ya kibinafsi au katika mji wa saizi yoyote kunaweza kuvutia watu wasiofaa. Kwa kifupi, kutumia gari lako ni njia mwafaka ya safari za barabarani lakini nadra kwa gari lenyewe kuwa njia ya “kupiga kambi”. Kupiga kambi kwenye gari kunawezekana kama una minivani, SUV, Sedan au Stesheni Wagon lenye viti ambavyo vinaweza kulazwa.
mt: Getting into your car and heading out on a long highway trip has its own set of challenges. Unlike larger vehicles, you may already know how to drive your car and know its faults. Placing a tent on your personal property or in any sized city can attract people who are not prepared. In short, using your car is a convenient way to travel on the open road but rarely is your car the way to “camp out”. Camping out in your car can be done with a minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with doors that can be rolled down.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Jiji la sasa la Kasablanka lilianzishwa na wavuvi wa Berber katika karne ya 10 kabla ya Masihi, na lilitumiwa na Wafoenisi, Warumi, na Wamerenidi kama bandari ya mikakati iliyojulikana kama Anfa. Wareno waliiharibu na kuijenga tena chini ya jina Casa Branca, lakini wakaiacha baada ya tetemeko la ardhi mnamo 1755. Sultani wa Moroko alijenga mji upya kama Daru I-Badya na ukapewa jina la Kasablanka na wafanyabiashara wa Kihispani ambao walianzisha vituo vya biashara huko. Kasablanka ni mojawapo ya mahali pa kuvutia kidogo zaidi kununua vitu katika Moroko yote. Karibu na Madina ya zamani ni rahisi kupata sehemu zinazouza bidhaa za kitamaduni za Moroko, kama vile tagines, ufinyanzi, bidhaa za ngozi, ndoano, na wigo mzima wa geegaws, lakini yote ni kwa ajili ya watalii.
mt: The present city of Casablanca was founded in the 10th century by Berber merchants, and was later used by Phoenicians, Romans, and Vandals as a trading port known as Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed and rebuilt the city under the name Casa Branca, but abandoned it after an earthquake in 1755. The Sultan of Morocco built a new city called Daru I-Badya and gave it the name Casablanca to the Spanish merchants who established trading posts there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to buy things in all of Morocco. Close to the old Medina are places to find traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, couscous, leather goods, and all the geegaws, but all are for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Upande wa kaskazini na mahali rahisi kufika kuna mji wa mahaba na wa kuvutia, uliofanywa maarufu na wageni baada ya kusimulia mapambo yake ya kung'aa kama yalivyorekodiwa na Lord Byron. Basi la Skotabu 403 husafiri mara kwa mara hadi Sintra, na kusimama Kabo da Roka. Pia upande wa kaskazini tembelea Hekalu la Mama Yetu Fatima (Madhabahu), mahali maarufu duniani pa maonyesho ya Maria.
mt: 403 bus from Skotabu runs frequently to Sintra, and stops at Cabo da Roca. Also in the north, visit Our Lady of Fatima (Madhabahu), a famous site for Marian apparitions.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Mnamo 1994, eneo la Azabaijan lililo la Nagorno-Karabakh kikabila lilifanya vita dhidi ya Azeris. Kwa kuungwa mkono na Armenia, jamhuri mpya iliundwa. Hata hivyo, hakuna nchi thabiti - si hata Armenia - huitambua kirasmi. Hoja za kidiplomasia dhidi ya eneo hilo zinaendelea kutatiza uhusiano kati ya Armenia na Azerbaian.
mt: 1994, the region of Nagorno-Karabakh was fighting against Azeris. With the support of Armenia, a new republic was created. However, no country - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments against this region continue to complicate relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Mojawapo ya sifa kali za Charlotte, Carolina Kaskazini, ni kwamba ina idadi kubwa ya machaguo ya hali ya juu kwa familia. Wakazi kutoka maeneo mengine mara nyingi hutaja urafiki wa kifamilia kama sababu msingi ya kuhamia huko, na mara nyingi wageni huchukulia mji kuwa rahisi kufurahia na watoto wakiwa karibu. Katika miaka 20 iliyopita, kiasi machaguo yenye kuwapendeza watoto huko Uptown Charlotte yamekuwa yakiongezeka. Kwa jumla teksi hutumiwa na familia katika Charlotte, ingawa zinaweza kutumika kiasi katika hali fulani. Kuna kuongeza fedha za ziada kwa kuwa na abiria zaidi ya 2, kwa hivyo chaguo hili linaweza kuwa ghali kuliko inavyohitajika.
mt: One of Charlotte's best-kept secrets is its large number of high-end family-friendly activities. Visitors often cite the city's family friendliness as a reason to move there, and locals tend to view the city as a great place to raise children. In the past 20 years, the number of family-friendly activities in Uptown Charlotte has increased. Overall, taxis are used by families in Charlotte, although they can be used sparingly in some cases. There is an extra fee for more than 2 passengers, so this option can be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Kabla ya Wahispania kuwasili katika karne ya 16, Chile kaskazini ilikuwa chini ya utawala wa Inca huku wenyeji Waarauka (Mapuche) wakiishi Chile ya kati na kaskazini. Mapuche pia walikuwa mojawapo ya vikundi huru asilia vya Marekani, ambavyo havikuzama kabisa katika sheria ya Kihispania hadi baada ya uhuru wa Chile. Ingawa Chile ilitangaza uhuru mnamo 1810 (katikati mwa vita vya Kinapoleoni ambavyo viliacha Uspanya bila serikali kuu thabiti kwa miaka kadhaa), ushindi kamili dhidi ya Uspanya haukufikiwa hadi 1818.
mt: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule, with the Mapuche people living in central and northern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the few indigenous groups in the Americas to remain free of Spanish rule until after the independence of Chile. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (in the midst of the Napoleonic Wars which left Spain without a central government for several years), complete victory over Spain was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, yaani Ardhi Tano, ina vijiji vitano vya kipwani vya Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza na Monterosso vilivyo katika eneo la Kiitaliano la Liguria. Wameorodheshwa katika Orodha ya Urithi wa Dunia ya UNESCO. Kwa karne nyingi, watu walijenga matuta kwa umakini katika mandhari yenye mawemawe na mwinuko hadi kwenye majabali yaliyo juu ya bahari. Sehemu ya haiba yake ni ukosefu wa maendeleo ya shirika yanayoonekana. Njia, treni na maboti huunganisha vijiji, na magari hayawezi kuvifikia kutoka nje.
mt: Cinque Terre, meaning Five Lands, is a section of the Italian Riviera coastline, located in Liguria, north-western Italy. It is a popular tourist destination, and is well known for its hiking trails, the nearby villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso al Mare, and the nearby islands Palmaria, Tino and Tinetto. The area has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. For centuries, people have built houses and terraces in the steep, narrow cliffs, with the aid of man-made caves and tunnels. The area is characterized by the absence of modern developments. Roads, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot enter from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Sababu ya kawaida zaidi ya ajali katika msimu wa baridi ni barabara, lami (vijia vya kando) na hasa ngazi zenye utelezi. Kwa kiwango cha chini, unahitaji viatu vilivyo na nyayo zinazofaa. Viatu vya kiangazi kwa kawaida huwa telezi sana katika barafu na theluji, hata buti za baridi zina upungufu. Ruwaza hiyo inapaswa kuwa na kina kirefu, milimita 5 (inchi 1/5) au zaidi, na nyenzo laini za kutosha katika hali ya baridi. Baadhi ya buti zina hazama na kuna zana za nyongeza zilizo na hazama kwa hali telezi, zinazofaa kwa viatu na buti nyingi, kwa kisigino au kisigino na wayo. Viatu vya juu vinafaa kua chini na pana.Mchanga, kokoto au chumvi (Kloridi kalsiamu) mara nyingi hupatikana zimetawanyika kwenye barabara na njia ili kuboresha msuguano.
mt: 1. The most common cause of winter accidents is roads, ice (shoulder) and especially snow. For the most part, you need tires with adequate tread depth, at least 5 mm (1/5 inch) and sufficient treads in snowy conditions. Some tires have sipes that are good for many tires, for studded or studded and studless tires. High tires are best to be low and wide. Sand, salt or chloride (calcium chloride) is often found on roads and paths to improve traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
