src: "Visiwa vya Cook ni nchi ya kisiwa katika ushirika huru na Nyuzilandi, iliyoko Polynesia, katikati mwa Bahari la Pasifiki ya Kusini. Ni funguvisiwa lililo na visiwa 15 vilivyoenea zaidi ya mraba wa kilometa milioni 2.2 ya bahari. Vikiwa katika eneo la saa sawa na Hawaii, wakati mwingine visiwa hivyo hufikiriwa kuwa ""Hawaii ya chini kwa chini"". Ingawa kidogo, huwakumbusha baadhi ya wageni wakongwe wa Hawaii wakati kabla ya utaifa bila mikahawa yote mikubwa ya watalii na maendeleo mengine. Visiwa vya Cook havina miji yoyoyte lakini vinajumuisha visiwa 15 tofauti. Vikuu kati yazo ni Rarotonga na Aitutaki."
mt: "The Cook Islands are a self-governing island country in free association with New Zealand, in the southern Pacific Ocean, in-falling Polynesia, at the centre of the Southern Pacific Ocean. It comprises 15 islands whose total land area is 2.2 square kilometres (0.85 sq mi). The Cook Islands'15 islands have sometimes been referred to as the "Hawaii of the South Pacific" due to their resemblance to the Hawaiian Islands; however, the Cook Islands bear a closer resemblance to Polynesian outlying islands such as Samoa, Tonga, Tuvalu, and Niue. Although small, it is home to a large number of unique species of flora and fauna, as well as unique geological formations, such as the Cook Islands' barrier reefs. The Cook Islands have a tropical climate with warm, humid inter-tropical weather all year round. The islands are volcanic in origin, although most are now dormant. The population of the Cook Islands is around 12,000, with 11,000 living on Rarotonga. The islands have no cities. The largest settlement is the main island, Rarotonga, with a population of around 11,000. The second largest island, Aitutaki, has a population of around 2,000. The capital is Avarua on Rarotonga."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: "Visiwa vya Cook ni nchi ya kisiwa katika ushirika huru na Nyuzilandi, iliyoko Polynesia, katikati mwa Bahari la Pasifiki ya Kusini. Ni funguvisiwa lililo na visiwa 15 vilivyoenea zaidi ya mraba wa kilometa milioni 2.2 ya bahari. Vikiwa katika eneo la saa sawa na Hawaii, wakati mwingine visiwa hivyo hufikiriwa kuwa ""Hawaii ya chini kwa chini"". Ingawa kidogo, huwakumbusha baadhi ya wageni wakongwe wa Hawaii wakati kabla ya utaifa bila mikahawa yote mikubwa ya watalii na maendeleo mengine. Visiwa vya Cook havina miji yoyoyte lakini vinajumuisha visiwa 15 tofauti. Vikuu kati yazo ni Rarotonga na Aitutaki."
mt: "The Cook Islands are a self-governing island country in free association with New Zealand, in the southern Pacific Ocean, in-falling Polynesia, at the centre of the Southern Pacific Ocean. It comprises 15 islands whose total land area is 2.2 square kilometres (0.85 sq mi). The Cook Islands'15 islands have sometimes been referred to as the "Hawaii of the South Pacific" due to their resemblance to the Hawaiian Islands; however, the Cook Islands bear a closer resemblance to Polynesian outlying islands such as Samoa, Tonga, Tuvalu, and Niue. Although small, it is home to a large number of unique species of flora and fauna, as well as unique geological formations, such as the Cook Islands' barrier reefs. The Cook Islands have a tropical climate with warm, humid inter-tropical weather all year round. The islands are volcanic in origin, although most are now dormant. The population of the Cook Islands is around 12,000, with 11,000 living on Rarotonga. The islands have no cities. The largest settlement is the main island, Rarotonga, with a population of around 11,000. The second largest island, Aitutaki, has a population of around 2,000. The capital is Avarua on Rarotonga."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Ni lazima vibali vihifadhiwe mapema. Lazima uwe na kibali ili kukaa usiku kucha. Sirena ndicho kituo pekee cha walinzi ambacho hutoa malazi ya bweni na vyakula moto pamoja na kambi. La Leona, San Pedrillo, na Los Patos hutoa kambi bila huduma ya chakula. Inawezekana kupata vibali vya mbuga moja kwa moja kutoka kwa Kituo cha Walinzi katika Puerto Jimerez, lakini hawakubali kadi za deni. Huduma ya Mbuga (MINAE) haitoi vibali vya zaidi ya mwezi mmoja kabla ya kutarajiwa kwa kuwasili. CafeNet El Sol hutoa huduma ya kuhifadhi kwa ada ya dola 30 za Kimarekani na pasi za siku moja kwa dola 10 za kimarekani; maelezo kwenye ukurasa wao wa Corcovado.
mt: 1. Reservations must be made in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight. The sirens are the only campsite that provides meals and firewood. Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos provide camping without food service. It is possible to get permits for individual parks from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jimenez, but they do not accept credit cards. MINAE does not issue permits more than one month in advance of your planned arrival. CafeNet El Sol provides camping for $30 USD per night and $10 USD per day for a campsite; details on their Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Kuteleza kwa kubeba shanta: Shughuli hii pia huitwa kuteleza mashambani, kutalii kwa kuteleza au matembezi ya kuteleza. Inahusiana na lakini kawaida haishirikiani na ziara za utelezaji kwenye theluji ya milima mirefu au upandaji wa milima, hilo la mwisho hufanywa katika eneo lenye mteremko na linahitaji bao na buti ngumu. Fikiria kuhusu njia ya utelezaji kwa theluji kama njia mfanano ya kukwea. Katika hali nzuri utaweza kufikia umbali mkubwa kiasi kuliko kutembea – lakini ni mara chache sana utapata kasi za kuteleza sehemu za mashambani bila shanta nzito katika njia zilizopitiwa awali.
mt: Carrying a load: This also is called backcountry travel, backcountry touring or backcountry skiing. It is related to but does not usually involve ski mountaineering, which is done in glaciated terrain and requires ropes and ice axes. Think of backcountry skiing as the cross-country equivalent of uphill skiing. In good conditions you can cover much greater distances than walking – but it is very rare that you will find groomed trails without significant snow in backcountry areas.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Mshtuko wa kurudi tena huja upesi kuliko mshtuko wa tamaduni (kuna kipindi chini ya fungate), hukaa kwa muda mrefu, na huweza kuwa kali zaidi. Wasafiri ambao walikuwa na wakati rahisi kuzoea utamaduni mpya wakati mwingine wana wakati mgumu wa kurekebisha upya utamaduni wao wa asili. Wakati wa kurudi nyumbani baada ya kuishi ughaibuni, umezoea utamaduni mpya na kupoteza baadhi ya tabia zako kutoka kwa utamaduni wako wa nyumbani. Wakati ulienda ng’ambo kwa mara ya kwanza, watu walikuwa pengine na subira na kuelewa, wakijua wasafiri katika nchi ya kigeni, wanahitaji kuzoea. Huenda watu wasitarajie kwamba uvumilivu na ufahamu pia ni muhimu kwa wasafiri wanaorudi nyumbani.
mt: 1. A reverse culture shock is less severe than a culture shock (there is a period of adjustment), it lasts longer, and it can be more painful. People who had an easy time adjusting to a new culture when they first arrived may have a hard time readjusting to their original culture. When you return home after living abroad, you have adjusted to a new culture and lost some of your original culture. When you first went abroad, people were perhaps more patient and understanding, knowing that travelers in a foreign country need to adjust. It may be that people also forget that patience and understanding are also important for travelers returning home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Kongoni (pia wanajulikana kama elk) hawana fujo kiasili, lakini watajitetea ikiwa watakisia kuna hatari. Wakati watu hawaoni kongoni kama anayeweza kuwa hatari, huenda wakamsogea karibu sana na kujiweka hatarini.
mt: Elk are not naturally aggressive, but they will defend themselves if they feel threatened. When people do not see an elk as a threat, they may get too close and put themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Katika joto la siku, wasafiri wanaweza kuona mazigazi ambayo hutoa dhana ya maji (au vitu vingine). Hizi zinaweza kuwa hatari ikiwa msafiri atafuata mazigazi, kupoteza nishati ya thamani na maji iliyobaki. Hata jangwa lililo na joto zaidi linaweza likawa baridi sana usiku. Hipothemia ni hatari halisi bila mavazi ya joto.
mt: In hot weather, travelers can see mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if a traveler follows mirages, wasting valuable energy and water. Even a desert with higher temperatures can be very cold at night. Hypothermia is a real danger without warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Jamhuri ya Dominika (Kihispania: Republica Dominicana) ni nchi ya Karibi ambayo imechukua nusu ya kisiwa cha Hispaniola, ambacho inashirikisha na Haiti. Kando na pwani zenye mchanga mweupe na mandhari ya milima, nchi hiyo ni nyumbani mwa mji wa zamani zaidi wa Kiingereza katika Amerika, ukiwa sasa sehemu ya Santo Domingo. Wenyeji wa kwanza wa kisiwa walikuwa Wataino na Wakaribi. Wakaribi walikuwa watu wenye kuongea lugha ya Arakwan waliokuwa wamefika takribani mwaka wa 10,000 BCE. Kwa kipindi cha miaka michache mifupi kufuatia kuwasili kwa wavumbuzi wa Ulaya, idadi ya watu ya Tainos ilikuwa imepunguzwa sana na washindi wa Kihispania. Kulingana na Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) kati ya 1492 na 1498 washindi wa Kispanya waliwaua takribani Wataino 100,000.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: Republica Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. Along with its coastline of white sand beaches and mountainous terrain, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, Santo Domingo. The original inhabitants of the island were the Taíno people, who were later replaced by the Caribs. The first Europeans to arrive were the Spanish, who named the island La Española. The Taíno were forced into slavery and were later exterminated. The country was later occupied by the French, who named it La Haïti. The Haitians were forced into slavery and were later exterminated. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "Michezo ya theluji ya kuteremka, ambayo ni pamoja na mchezo wa kuteleza juu ya theluji na mchezo wa kupanda theluji, ni michezo maarufu inayohusisha kuteleza chini ya ardhi iliyofunikwa na theluji kwa ubaos au bao za theluji zilizofungiwa kwenye miguu yako. Kuteleza juu ya theluji ni shughuli kubwa huku washiriki wengi, ambao mara kwa mara hujulikana kama ""ski bums,"" wakipanga likizo nzima kwa kuteleza juu ya theluji katika eneo fulani. Wazo la uendeshaji ubao kwenye theluji ni la zamani sana - michoro ya pango inaonyesha waendeshaji wa ubao kwenye theluji wa miaka ya zamani ya hadi 5000 KK! Mchezo wa kuteleza kwa kasi kwenye mteremko wenye theluji ulianza angalau karne ya 17, na mnamo 1861 kilabu cha kwanza cha burudani cha utelezaji kwenye barafu kilifunguliwa na watu wa Norwegi huko Australia."

ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: "Michezo ya theluji ya kuteremka, ambayo ni pamoja na mchezo wa kuteleza juu ya theluji na mchezo wa kupanda theluji, ni michezo maarufu inayohusisha kuteleza chini ya ardhi iliyofunikwa na theluji kwa ubaos au bao za theluji zilizofungiwa kwenye miguu yako. Kuteleza juu ya theluji ni shughuli kubwa huku washiriki wengi, ambao mara kwa mara hujulikana kama ""ski bums,"" wakipanga likizo nzima kwa kuteleza juu ya theluji katika eneo fulani. Wazo la uendeshaji ubao kwenye theluji ni la zamani sana - michoro ya pango inaonyesha waendeshaji wa ubao kwenye theluji wa miaka ya zamani ya hadi 5000 KK! Mchezo wa kuteleza kwa kasi kwenye mteremko wenye theluji ulianza angalau karne ya 17, na mnamo 1861 kilabu cha kwanza cha burudani cha utelezaji kwenye barafu kilifunguliwa na watu wa Norwegi huko Australia."

src: Visiwa vya Afrika Mashariki vimo katika Bahari ya Hindi karibu na pwani ya mashariki ya Afrika. Madagaska ndiyo kubwa tena kwa mbali, na bara lilojisimamia, ikifikia ni suala la wanyamapori. Vingi vya visiwa vidogo ni mataifa huru, au vinahusishwa na Ufaransa, na vinajulikana kama vituo vya mapumziko vya pwani. Waarabu pia walileta Uislamu katika maeneo, na iliathiri sana Komoros na Mayote. Ushawishi wa Ulaya na ukoloni ulianza katika karne ya 15, wakati mvumbuzi wa Ureno Vasco da Gama alipopata njia Cape kutoka Ulaya kwenda India.
mt: The islands of East Africa lie in the Indian Ocean near the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and the landmass it supports is a matter of wildlife. Many of the smaller islands are independent states, or are associated with France, and are known as coastal resorts. Arabs also brought Islam to the region, and greatly influenced Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonization began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found a route Cape from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Kuna desturi ya kukesha usiku wa Pasaka katika sehemu fulani wazi ili kuona jua likichomoza. Kwa kweli kuna maelezo ya thiolojia ya Kikristo ya utamaduni huu, lakini pia huenda ikawa ibada ya Majira ya kuchipua na Uzazi kabla ya Ukristo. Makanisa zaidi ya jadi huwa na Mkesha wa Pasaka usiku wa Jumamosi wakati wa wikendi ya Pasaka, waumini wakisherehekea saa sita kamili za usiku kuadhimisha ufufuo wa Kristo.
mt: There is a tradition of Easter Monday night in some areas to see the sun rise. There are theological explanations of this Christian custom, but it may also be a pre-Christian fertility ritual before Christianity. More traditional churches have an Easter Monday night vigil when believers celebrate six o'clock in the morning to commemorate the resurrection of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ekuado inahitaji kwamba raia wa Cuba wapate barua ya mwaliko kabla ya kuingia Ekuado kupitia viwanja vya ndege vya kimataifa ama vituo vya uandikishaji kwenye mipaka. Barua hii ni lazima ihalalishwe na Wizara ya Mambo ya Nje ya Kiekwado, na itimize mahitaji fulani. Mahitaji haya yameandaliwa ili kutoa uhamiaji ulioandaliwa kati ya nchi zote mbili. Wananchi wa Kuba ambao wana kadi ya kijani ya Marekani, wanaweza kutembelea ubalozi wa Ekuado ili kusamehewa hitaji hili. Pasipoti yako lazima iwe halali kwa angalau miezi 6 zaidi ya tarehe zako za kusafiri. Tikiti ya safari ya kwenda na kurudi/kuendelea inahitajika ili kudhibitisha urefu wa kukaa kwako.
mt: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens obtain an invitation letter before entering Ecuador through international airports or border entry points. This letter must be approved by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ecuador, and meet certain requirements. These requirements have been established to provide orderly migration between the two countries. Cuban citizens who have a valid green card from the United States can visit the Ecuadorian Embassy to obtain this letter. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round-trip ticket is required to establish the length of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Miwani inaweza kuwa bei rahisi katika nchi ya kigeni, haswa katika nchi za mapato ya chini ambapo gharama za kazi ziko chini. Fikiria kufanyiwa uchunguzi wa macho nyumbani, haswa ikiwa bima inaugharamia, na kuleta agizo nawe ili lifailiwe mahali pengine. Fremu za kifahari za kampuni tajika ambazo hupatikana katika maeneo kama haya zina shida mbili; baadhi huenda zikawa ni nakala zisizo na leseni, na zile halisi zilizoletwa ndani huenda zikawa ghali zaidi kuliko nyumbani.
mt: 3D printers can be cheap in foreign countries, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are low. Consider having your eyes tested at home, especially if your glasses are expensive, and bring a prescription with you to have them filled elsewhere. The counterfeit 3D printers from reputable companies that are available in these areas have two problems; some may be unlicensed copies, and the real ones that are imported may be more expensive than at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Sarafu rasmi ya Falkilandi ni pauni ya Falkilandi (FKP) ambayo thamani yake inakadiriwa kuwa sawa na ile pauni moja ya Uingereza (GBP). Pesa zinaweza kubadilishwa katika benki ya pekee visiwani ambayo inapatikana Stanley mkabala na duka la FIC West. Kwa jumla pauni za Uingereza zitakubaliwa mahali popote katika visiwa, na ndani ya Stanley kadi za mikopo na dola za Marekani pia hukubaliwa mara nyingi. Katika visiwa vya nje kadi za mkopo huenda zisikubalike, ingawa pesa za Uingereza na Amerika zinaweza kuchukuliwa; angalia na wamiliki mapema ili kujua ni njia gani ya malipo inayokubalika. Haiwezekani kubadilishana sarafu ya Falkland nje ya visiwa, kwa hivyo badilisha pesa kabla ya kuondoka kwenye visiwa.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is estimated to be worth one British pound (GBP). The currency can be exchanged at the island's only bank, which is located in Stanley near FIC West. In general, British pounds will be accepted anywhere in the islands, and in Stanley, American Express and Visa credit cards are also accepted frequently. In the outlying islands, credit cards may not be accepted, although British and American currency can be used; check with your hosts early on to find out which method of payment is accepted. It is not possible to exchange Falkland currency outside the islands, so exchange your money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Hekalu nyingi zina sikukuu ya Kila mwaka kuanzia mwishoni mwa Novemba hadi katikati mwa Mei, ambayo hufautiana kulingana na kalenda ya mwaka ya kila hekalu. Sherehe nyingi za Hekaluni zinaadhimishwa kama sehemu ya maadhimisho ya hekalu au siku ya kuzaliwa kwa mungu anayeongoza au tukio lolote jingine kuu linalohusiana na hekalu. Tamasha za hekalu za Kerala ni za kufurahisha sana kuona, kwa msafara wa mara kwa mara wa ndovu waliopambwa, bendi za hekalu na tamasha nyinginezo.
mt: Many temples have a festival every year from late November to mid-May, which varies according to the temple's calendar. Many temple festivals are celebrated as part of the temple's anniversary or the birth of a deity or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala temple festivals are a great sight to see, with elephants in procession, temple chariots and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Njia dhahiri ya kusafiri katika daraja la kwanza au kibiashara ni kutoa pesa nyingi kwa fursa hiyo (au, bora zaidi, kufanya kampuni yako ikulipie). Walakini, hii haikuji kwa bei rahisi: kwa sababu ya sheria mbaya zisizobainika, unaweza kutarajia kulipa hadi mara nne ya kawaida ya uchumi, nauli ya biashara, na mara 11 kwa cheo cha kwanza! Kuongea kwa jumla, hakuna haja ya hata kutafuta vipunguzo kwa biashara au viti vya daraja la kwanza katika safari za ndege za moja kwa moja toka A hadi B. Kampuni za ndege zinajua vizuri kwamba kuna kundi fulani la ndani la wasafiri ambao wako tayari kulipa pesa nyingi kwa haki ya kufika mahali kwa haraka na kwa starehe, na wanabadilisha ipasavyo.
mt: 1. The most obvious way to travel in the first or business class is to pay a lot for that opportunity (or, better yet, have your company pay). However, this is not cheap: due to unknown laws, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare, first class business fare, and eleven times for first class! In general, there is no need to even look for discounts on first or business class tickets from A to B. Airline companies know that there is a certain group of travelers who are willing to pay a lot for the privilege of getting to their destination quickly and comfortably, and they adjust accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Kampuni za ndege kama vile Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways na Turkish Airlines zimepanua huduma zao pakubwa katika Afrika, na hutoa miunganisho kwenye miji mingi muhimu ya Afrika kwa bei bora kuliko kampuni nyingine za Uingereza. Shirika la ndege la Uturuki hupaa angani kwenda kwa vituo 39 katika nchi 30 za Kiafrika kuanzia mwaka wa 2014. Ikiwa unao wakati wa ziada wa kusafiri, angalia uone jinsi ankarakifani yako ya jumla ya nauli kwenda Afrika inalingana na nauli ya kuuzunguka ulimwengu. Usisahau kuongeza gharama za ziada za visa za ziada, ushuru wa kuondoka, usafiri kwenye ardhi, n.k., kwa sehemu hizo zote nje ya Afrika.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have expanded their services in Africa, and offer connections to many important African cities at better prices than other British airlines. The Turkish airline will fly to 39 destinations in 30 African countries from 2014. If you have extra time to travel, see how your total cost to go to Africa compares to the cost of circling the world. Don't forget to add extra visa fees, departure tax, land travel, etc., for those parts outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Kwa kawaida, kununua chakula katika supamaketi ndiyo njia ya bei rahisi kabisa ya kujilisha. Bila fursa za kupika, machaguo hata hivyo yamepunguzwa kwa chakula kilichotengenezwa tayari. Maduka makubwa yanazidi kupata seehemu ya chakula kilichotengenezwa tayari. Baadhi ya maduka makuu hutoa tanuri ya miale ya kupasha chakula joto. Katika baadhi ya nchi au aina za maduka kuna angalau mkahawa kwenye eneo, mara nyingi usio wa kirasmi na wenye bei nafuu.
mt: 1. Buying food at a buffet is the cheapest way to eat. Without the option to cook, the prices have been reduced for pre-made food. Large stores are increasingly getting a section of pre-made food. Some stores or types of stores have at least a cafeteria in the area, often not kosher and cheap.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Kwa kawaida, kununua chakula katika supamaketi ndiyo njia ya bei rahisi kabisa ya kujilisha. Bila fursa za kupika, machaguo hata hivyo yamepunguzwa kwa chakula kilichotengenezwa tayari. Maduka makubwa yanazidi kupata seehemu ya chakula kilichotengenezwa tayari. Baadhi ya maduka makuu hutoa tanuri ya miale ya kupasha chakula joto. Katika baadhi ya nchi au aina za maduka kuna angalau mkahawa kwenye eneo, mara nyingi usio wa kirasmi na wenye bei nafuu.
mt: 1. Buying food at a buffet is the cheapest way to eat. Without the option to cook, the prices have been reduced for pre-made food. Large stores are increasingly getting a section of pre-made food. Some stores or types of stores have at least a cafeteria in the area, often not kosher and cheap.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Aina za Kifaransa zinazozungumzwa katika Ubelgiji na Uswizi zinatofautiana kidogo na Kifaransa kinachozungumzwa Ufaransa, ingawa zinalingana kiasi cha kueleweka baina yazo. Hasa, mfumo wa hesabu katika Ubelgiji na Uswizi zinazozungumza Kifaransa una mambo yasiyo ya kawaida ambayo ni tofauti na Kifaransa kinachozungumzwa Ufaransa, na matamshi ya maneno kadhaa ni tofauti kidogo. Walakini, Wabelgiji wote waliozungumza Kifaransa na Kiswisi walijifunza Kifaransa shuleni, kwa hivyo wangeweza kukuelewa hata ukitumia mfumo wa nambari wa Kifaransa.
mt: French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differs slightly from French spoken in France, although they are mutually intelligible. Especially, the numerical system in Belgium and Switzerland spoken in French has unusual features that are different from French spoken in France, and some words are slightly different in pronunciation. However, all Belgians who speak French and Swiss have learned French in school, so they can understand even if you use the French numerical system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Ni mashirika machache tu ya ndege ambayo bado hutoa nauli ya kufiwa, ambayo hupunguza kidogo gharama ya kusafiri kwa mazishi dakika ya mwisho. Ndege zinazotoa hizi ni pamoja na Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa kwa ndege zinazotoka Marekani au Kanada, na WestJet. Katika visa vyote, lazima ujitengee nafasi mapema kwa kupiga simu moja kwa moja kwenye shirika la ndege.
mt: It is only a few airlines that still offer a bereavement fare, which reduces the cost of last-minute travel. These airlines include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights departing from the United States or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book in advance by calling the airline directly.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Kutumia programu za kuabiri za GPS kwenye rununu yako kunaweza kuwa njia rahisi na bora ya kuabiri ukiwa nje ya nchi yako. Inaweza kuokoa pesa badala ya kununua ramani mpya za GPS, au kifaa cha GPS kinachojisimamia au kukodisha kimoja kutoka kwa kampuni ya kukodisha magari. Ikiwa huna muunganisho wa data kwa simu yako, au ikiwa mbali na masafa, utendakazi wake utakwazika au hautakuwepo.
mt: Using GPS navigation software on your phone can be a cheap and easy way to navigate outside your country. It can save you money instead of buying new GPS maps, or a GPS device that is supported or damaged by one company. If you don't have data connectivity on your phone, or if you are far from cell towers, its signal will be lost or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Kuona mandhari na wanyamapori wa Galapagos hufanywa vizuri kwa boti, kama vile Charles Darwin alivyofanya mnamo 1835. Zaidi ya meli 60 za kifahari husafiri kwenye maji ya Galapagos - zikiwa zenye saizi ya abiria 8 hadi 100. Watu wengi huhifadhi nafasi zao mapema sana (kwani kwa kawaida boti hizo hujaa wakati wa msimu wenye shughuli nyingi). Hakikisha kwamba wakala unayetumia kupata uhifadhi ni mtaalamu wa Galapagos aliye na maarifa mengi ya aina tofauti tofauti za meli. Hii itahakikisha kwamba masilahi na/au vizuizi vyako vinalingana na meli inayowafaa zaidi.
mt: 60+ boats sail the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their trips well in advance (as boats are usually busy during the busy season). Make sure that the agent you use to book your trip is an expert on Galapagos and has extensive knowledge of the different types of boats. This will ensure that your needs and/or preferences are best met.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Makasino kwa kawaida hufanya juhudi nyingi ili kuongeza pesa na muda unaotumika na wacheza kamari. Madirisha na saa kwa kawaida huwa hazipo na mlango wa kutoka huwa mgumu kupata. Aghalabu huwa na chakula cha kipekee, vinywaji na matoleo ya burdani, ili kuwatumbuiza wageni na kuwatunza katika majengo yao. Baadhi ya kumbi hutoa vileo ndani ya nyumba. Hata hivyo, ulevi hutatiza maamuzi, na wacheza kamari wote wazuri wanajua umuhimu wa kuwa watulivu.
mt: Casinos typically make many efforts to increase the money and time spent by gamblers. Doors and hours of operation are typically not available, and the food, drinks and entertainment are designed to attract and retain customers in their buildings. Some rooms offer in-room service. However, gambling can be addictive, and all gamblers know the importance of being discreet.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Nomino zote, ikiwemo Sie kwa wewe, daima huanza kwa herufi kubwa, hata katika katikati mwa sentensi. Hii ni njia muhimu ya kutofautisha kati ya baadhi ya vitenzi na vitu. Pia bila shaka inafanya kusoma rahisi, ingawa kuandika kwa kiasi fulani ni ngumu kwa haja ya kutaka kujua kama kitenzi au kivumishi kinatumika kwa umuhimu.
mt: All words, including Sie, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some nouns and pronouns. It also makes reading easier, although writing it is somewhat difficult because you want to know if a noun or pronoun is being used for emphasis.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: "Katika sehemu nyingi za dunia, kupunga mkono ni ishara ya kirafiki, kuashiria ""hujambo."" Walakini, huko Malaysia, angalau kati ya Malay katika maeneo ya vijijini, inamaanisha ""kuja huku,"" sawa na kidole cha kwanza kilichoelekezwa kuelekea kwenye mwili, ishara ambayo hutumiwa katika nchi fulani za Magharibi, na inapaswa kutumiwa tu kwa sababu hiyo. Vivyo hivyo, msafiri wa Uingereza huko Uhispania anaweza kukosea kuagana kwaheri kwa kupepa kuhusisha viguzo akikabilia mpepapi (badala ya mtu anayepepewa) kama ishara ya kurudi."
mt: "In many parts of the world, a thumbs-up is a sign of friendship, indicating "hello." However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come here," similar to pointing a finger at the first person to the body, a sign used in some Western countries, and should be used only for that reason. Similarly, a British traveler in Spain may mistakenly greet a stranger with a handshake, instead of a person being handed (instead of a person being given) as a sign of returning."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Mabarafuto si imara, lakini yanatiririka kuenda chini ya mlima. Hii itasababisha nyufa, mianya, ambayo inaweza kufichwa na madaraja ya theluji. Kuta na paa za mapango ya barafu zinaweza kuporomoka na nyufa zinaweza kuzibwa. Kwenye ukingo wa barafuto vipande vikubwa hujitenga, kuanguka na pengine kuruka au kubingirika mbali zaidi na ukingo.
mt: 1. The snow is not stable, but it is sliding down the mountain. This will cause avalanches, which can be triggered by ski lifts. The snow and ice on the slopes of the avalanche can melt and the snow can be blown away. Large pieces of snow break off, fall and sometimes roll or slide further away from the slope.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma ni mji wa kitalii wa Jamburi ya Kidemokrasia ya Congo ulioko mashariki uliokithiri karibu na Rwanda. Mnamo 2002, Goma iliharibiwa na lava kutoka kwa volkano ya Nyiragongo iliyofunika mingi ya mitaa ya mji, hususan katikati ya mji. Japo kwa kiwango kizuri Goma ni salama, ziara zozote nje ya Goma zinapaswa kuchunguzwa ili kufahamu hali ya mapigano yanayoendelea katika jimbo la Kaskazini mwa Kivu. Jiji hilo pia ndio msingi wa kukwea volkano ya Nyiragongo pamoja na njia rahisi kabisa za kufuatilia Gorilla wa Milimani barani Afrika. Unaweza kutumia boda-boda (teksi ya pikipiki) kuzunguka Goma. Nauli ya kawaida kwa wenyeji ni Franki 500 za Kongo kwa safari fupi.
mt: Goma is a tourist town in the Democratic Republic of the Congo located near Rwanda. In 2002, Goma was devastated by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which destroyed much of the city, especially the central part of the city. Although Goma is relatively safe, any trips outside of Goma should be carefully considered to assess the situation of the ongoing conflict in North Kivu province. The town is also the base for climbing the Nyiragongo volcano and the easiest way to track mountain gorillas in Africa. You can use a boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to tour Goma. The local currency is the Congolese franc, which is worth about 500 to a US dollar.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Ukitaji kambi wowote chini ya ukingo katika Grand Canyon unahitaji kibali cha sehemu za mashambani. Vibali hupunguzwa kulinda korongo na hupatikana katika siku ya kwanza ya mwezi, mienzi nne kabla ya mwezi kuanza. Kwa hivyo, idhini ya kurudi nchini kwa tarehe yoyote ya kuanza mwezi Mei inapatikana mnamo tarehe 1 Januari. Nafasi katika maeneo maarufu zaidi, kama vile Bright Angel Campground karibu na Phantom Ranch, kwa jumla hujaa kwa maombi yanayopokewa siku ya kwanza yanapofunguliwa kwa uhifadhi. Kuna idadi ndogo ya vibali zilizohifadhiwa kwa maombi ya papo hapo zinazopatikana kwa hali ya fika kwanza, hudumiwa kwanza.
mt: Any camping in the inner canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the corridor and are available on the first day of the month, four months before the month the trip begins. Thus, a return permit for any date in May is available on January 1. Permits for the most popular areas, such as Bright Angel Campground near Phantom Ranch, are awarded by lottery to applications submitted on the first day the permits are available. There is a small number of permits held for first-come, first-served applications.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Baadhi ya hoteli zina urithi kutoka kwenye zama za usitawi za reli za mvuke na meli kubwa kubwa za abiria; kabla ya Vita vya Pili vya Dunia, katika karne za 19 au 20 mapema. Hizi ni hoteli ambazo watu tajiri na maarufu enzi zile wangeishi, na mara nyingi walikula na kujitumbuiza. Zana hizo za kale, ukosefu wa huduma za kisasa, na uzee fulani wenye neema pia ni sehemu ya tabia zao. Japo huwa zinamilikiwa kibinafsi, wakati mwingine huwa zinatumiwa kuwapokea marais wanaozuru, pamoja na waheshimiwa wengine. Msafiri aliye na vitita vya pesa huenda akafikiria safari ya ndege kuzunguka ulimwengu, inayositishwasitishwa kwa kukaa katika nyingi ya hoteli hizi.
mt: Some hotels have a heritage from the heyday of ocean liners and transcontinental railroads in the late 19th or early 20th centuries. These are hotels that catered to the wealthy and famous, and where they dined and entertained. The old-fashioned, lack of modern amenities, and a certain amount of eccentricity are also part of their character. Although privately owned, they are sometimes used to host visiting dignitaries, as well as other celebrities. A traveler with a budget may think of a world tour, with stops at many of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: Shukrani kwa viungo vya kebo za nyuzi za kioo chini ya bahari katika Uropa na satelaiti pana yenye bendi za masafa mapana, Greenland imeunganishwa vizuri na asilimia 93 ya watu wana ufikiaji wa intaneti. Hoteli au wenyeji wako (ikiwa unakaa katika nyumba ya wageni au nyumba ya kibinafsi) ina uwezekano wa kuwa na WiFi au kompyuta iliyounganishwa kwenye intaneti, na makao yote yana duka la huduma za intaneti au mahali fulani palipo na WiFi ya umma. Kama ilivyosemwa hapo juu, ijapokuwa neno “Eskimo” limebaki kukubalika Marekani, linachukuliwa kuwa la dharau na wengi watu wengi wa Aktika wasiokuwa wa Marekani, haswa katika Canada. Wakati unaweza kusikia neno hilo likitumiwa na Wenyeji wa Grinilandi, wageni wanapaswa kuepuka kulitumia. Wenyeji wa Greenland hujiita Inuit huko Canada na Kalaalleq (kwa wingi Kalaalit), Greenlander, katika Greenland. Uhalifu, na uhasidi kwa wageni kwa jumla, haujulikani katika Grinlandi. Hata katika miji, hakuna “maeneo mabaya”. Hali ya hewa ya baridi labda ndiyo hatari tu ambayo wasiyojiandaa watakuta. Ikiwa utatembelea mji wa Greenland wakati wa msimu wa baridi (ukizingatia kuwa jinsi unavyokwenda kaskazini ndivyo inavyozidi kuwa baridi), ni muhimu kuleta mavazi ya kutosha ya joto. Siku ndefu sana katika msimu wa kiangazi zinaweza kupelekea shida za kupata usingizi wa kutosha na shida za kiafya zinazohusika. Wakati wa kiangazi, pia jihadhari na mbu wa Skandinavia. Ingawa hawaenezi magonjwa, wanaweza kukera.

ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardin de la Union. Nafasi hii ilijengwa kama nyumba ya watawa ya karne ya 17, ambapo Templo de San Diego ndilo jengo pekee lililopo sasa. Sasa inafanya kazi kama magulio ya kati, na daima ina mambo mengi yanayoendelea, mchana na usiku. Kuna mikahawa kadhaa inayozunguka bustani, na katika nyakati za adhuhuri na jioni maonyesho ya bure hufanywa huko katika gazebo iliyo katikati. Callejon del Beso (Kichochoro cha busu). Roshani mbili zilizotengwa na sentimita 69 tu ni nyumba ya shujaa mkongwe wa mapenzi. Kwa mapeni machache baadhi ya watoto watakusimulia hadithi hiyo.
mt: 1. Jardin de la Union. This was built as a 17th century convent, where the only building remaining is the Temple of San Diego. It now serves as a central courtyard, and is always busy, day and night. There are several cafes that surround the garden, and in the evenings and at night, free performances are held there in the gazebo in the center. 2. Callejon del Beso (Kichochoro cha busu). Two candles, 69 centimeters tall, are the home of an old hero of love. For a few pennies, some children will tell you the story.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Matembezi ni shughuli ya nje ambayo huwa na kutembea katika mazingira asili, mara nyingi katika njia za matembezi. Matembezi ya mchana huhusisha umbali wa chini ya maili hadi umbali zaidi ambao unaweza kufikiwa kwa siku moja. Kwa matembezi ya mchana kando ya njia rahisi maandalizi kidogo yanahitajika, na mtu yeyote aliye na usawa wastani wa kimwili anaweza kufurahia. Huenda familia zilizo na watoto wadogo zikahitaji matayarisho mengi, lakini siku moja nje inawezekana kwa urahisi hata kukiwa na watoto wachanga na wale walio karibu kwenda shuleni.
mt: Hiking is a form of walking, usually done for pleasure, recreation, exercise or sport. Hiking is done with footgear, often in natural environments, in contrast with walking or running, which are usually done on paved surfaces. While walking primarily involves leg movements, hiking typically also involves arm movements and the upper body. Hiking is the preferred term in Europe, while in the United States and Canada, "hiking" refers to walking in the wilderness, and walking on more moderate or relatively flat trails is called "walking". The word hiking is often used in the UK, along with rambling, walking and fell walking. In the United States, the synonym "rambling" was once applied to long, vigorous walks in the countryside, by the middle of the 20th century it had come to be understood as a more subdued activity, done mainly on the flat, and in the open air.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "Kawaida kwa Norwei kuwa na vilango-bahari vyenye miinuko mikali na mabonde ambayo ghafla hugeuka kuwa kilima kirefu tambarare ambacho ni bapa, kwa kadiri fulani. Nyanda hizi za juu mara nyingi huitwa ""vidde"" kumaanisha nafasi pana, wazi isiyo na miti, eneo lisilo na mipaka. Katika Rogaland na Agder kwa kawaida huitwa ""hei"" kumaanisha ardhi iliyotengwa isiyo na miti na mara nyingi hufunikwa na mimea ya vichakani."
mt: "It is common for Norway to have fjords with steep sides and cliffs that suddenly become high and flat plateaus, which are called "vidde" meaning a wide, open, treeless area without borders. In Rogaland and Agder, it is usually called "hei" meaning land cleared of trees and often covered with heather."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Msimu wa watalii kwa vituo vya vilimani kwa jumla hupata shughuli nyingi wakati wa kiangazi cha Kihindi. Hata hivyo, vina urembo na haiba ya aina fulani wakati wa msimu wa baridi, na vituo vingi vya vilima hupata viwango vya kutosha vya theluji na kutoa shughuli kama utelezaji na utelezaji kwa vibao.
mt: The tourist season for ski resorts in general has many activities during the off-season. However, they have a certain charm and beauty during the winter season, and many ski resorts have insufficient snowfall and provide activities such as snowmaking and snowmaking.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Kuwa na uhakika ya kwamba unapofika bandarini, kila kitu kitakuwa dhahiri. Utapatana na waombajilifti wa machua wengine na watashiriki habari nawewe. Kimsingi utakuwa unaweka matangazo kuhusu msaada wako, kutembea katika gati, kuongelesha watu wanaosafisha mashua zao, kujaribu kuwasiliana na mabaharia kwenye baa, na kadhalika. Jaribu kuongea na watu wengi iwezekanavyo. Baada ya muda mfupi kila mtu atakujua na watakutolea vidokezo kuhusu ni boti ipi inayotafuta mtu.
mt: When you arrive in port, everything will be obvious. You will meet other people who are also looking for a ride, and people who are offering rides. In general, you will be putting up signs about your needs, walking in circles, trying to talk to sailors on the docks, and so on. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a short time, everyone will know and will be giving you advice about where to look for a ride.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Kisiwa cha Hong Kong hulipatia eneo la Hong Kong jina lake na ni mahali ambapo watalii wengi huangazia sana. Msururu wa majengo yanayojenga wingu la Hong Kong umeoanishwa na chati ya baa inayopendeza na ambayo yamkini imeundwa kwa uwepo wa maji ya Bandari ya Viktoria. Ili kujionea Hong Kong vizuri zaidi, ondoka kiswani kisha uelekee upande wa mwambao wa Kowloon ulio mkabala. Mengi ya maendeleo ya mji ya Visiwa vya Hong Kong yamesongamana katika ardhi iliyorejeshwa katika ufuo wa kaskazini. Hapa ndipo mahali wakoloni wa Kiingereza walichukulia kuwa pao na kwa hivyo kama unatafuta ushahidi wa zama za kikoloni wa eneo, hapa ni mahali pazuri pa kuanza.
mt: Hong Kong Island is the site of the Victoria Harbour, one of the deepest natural harbours in the world. To see Hong Kong better, leave the island and head to the Kowloon side. Many of the city's landmarks are located on the Hong Kong Island. Here is where the British colonists settled and as such, if you are looking for a glimpse of the colonial era, this is the place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Vikuku ni nguzo zinazoshikilia miguu ya mwendeshaji ambazo huning’inia chini katika pande zote mbili za matandiko. Zinampa mpanda farasi utulivu mkubwa lakini zinaweza kuwa na wasiwasi wa kiusalama kwa sababu ya uwezo wa miguu ya mpanda farasi kukwama ndani yake. Ikiwa mwendeshaji farasi atatupwa kuotka kwa farasi lakini mguu wake ufungiwe kwenye tandiko, wanaweza kukokotwa ikiwa farasi atatoroka. Ili kupunguza hatari hii, hatua kadhaa za usalama zinaweza kuchukuliwa. Kwanza, waendeshaji wengi huvaa kiatu cha buti kilicho juu na laini, chembamba kabisa, soli. Kisha, matandiko mengine, hasa matandiko ya Kiingereza yana fito za kiusalama ambzo huruhusu ngozi ya kuvutwa kuangukia tandiko kama kama itavutwa nyuma na mpanda farasi anayeanguka.
mt: Stays are the stirrups that hold the rider's legs in place under the saddle. They provide the rider with great stability but can be dangerous because of the horse's ability to kick out with its legs. If the rider is thrown from the horse but the stirrups remain in the stirrups, they can be kicked by the horse. To reduce this risk, several safety measures can be taken. First, many riders wear a protective vest over their chest and back, which is very thick and padded. Second, other stirrups, especially English stirrups, have safety features that allow the stirrup leather to be pulled into the stirrup if the horse kicks out.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Kubadilishana mitandao ya ukarimu ndio shirika linalounganisha wasafiri na wenyeji kwenye miji wanayoizuru. Kujiunga na mtandao kama huo kwa kawaida kunahitaji tu kujaza fomu ya mtandaoni; hata hivyo mitandao mingine itatoa ama kuhitaji uhakiki zaidi. Orodha ya wenyeji wanaopatikana hutolewa kwa kuchapishwa kwenye nakala na/au mitandaoni, wakati mwingine pamoja na marejeleo na hakiki kutoka kwa wasafiri wengine. Kulala kwenye nyumba za watu kwa muda kulianzishwa mnamo Januari 2004 baada ya mtengenezaji wa programu za kompyuta Casey Fenton kupata safari ya ndege ya bei nafuu kuelekea Aislandi lakini hakuwa na mahali pa kukaa. Akawatumia wanafunzi wa chuo kikuu chaa ndani barua pepe na akapata matoleo mengi sana ya malazi ya bure.
mt: Swapping contact information is what connects travelers and locals in the cities they visit. Joining a network like this usually requires only filling out an online form; however, some networks may require more scrutiny. A list of hosts is published on paper and/or online, sometimes with reviews and ratings from other travelers. Staying in people's homes was started in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton got a cheap flight to Iceland but didn't have a place to stay. He used students at his university's email and got many offers of free lodging.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Hosteli hushughulikia vijana kimsingi - mgeni wa kawaida ana miaka ishirini hivi - lakini mara nyingi unaweza kuwapata wasafiri wazee huko pia. Familia zilizo na watoto si jambo la kawaida, lakini baadhi ya hosteli huwaruhusu katika vyumba vya kibinafsi.
mt: Hostels cater to youth - the average guest is 20 years old - but you can often find senior travelers there as well. Families with children are not common, but some hostels allow them in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Utupaji wa bumarengi ni ujuzi maarufu ambao watalii wengi wanataka kupata. Ukitaka kujua kutupa bumarengi inayorudi kwa mkono yako, hakikisha uko na bumerang’i sahihi itakayorudi. Bumerangi nyingi zinazopatikana Australia si za kurudi tena. Ni vizuri kwa wanaoanza wasijaribu kuzirusha wakati wa upepo
mt: Throwing boomerangs is a well-known skill that many tourists want to learn. If you want to know how to throw a boomerang that comes back to you, make sure you have a boomerang that comes back. Many boomerangs available in Australia are not returnable. It is advisable for beginners not to try to throw them in windy conditions.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Kukiwa na visiwa 17,000 vya kuchagua, chakula cha Indonesia ni jina la kijumla linalosimamia aina kubwa ya vyakula vinavyopatikana kote nchini. Lakini, llikitumiwa bila vivumishi zaidi, neno hilo huelekea kumaanisha chakula ambacho mwanzoni kilitoka sehemu za kati na mashariki mwa kisiwa kikuu cha Java. Chakula kinachopatikana sana katika maeneo mapana ya funguvisiwa, ni vyakula vya Kijavanese vilivyotayarishwa kwa ustadi sahili, ladha yake ya kimsingi ikiwa ni njugu karanga, pilipili, sukari (hususan sukari ya nazi ya Javanese) na viungo tofauti vinavyonukia.
mt: 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesia's cuisine is a name for a large variety of foods available throughout the country. But, when used without qualifiers, the term usually refers to food that originated from the central and eastern part of the main island of Java. Food that is commonly found in the coastal areas of the archipelago, is Javanese cuisine prepared with a seaside flair, its main flavoring being peanuts, chili peppers, sugar (especially Javanese palm sugar) and various spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Kwa wale wasioelewa lugha ya kimatibabu, jina maambukuzi na kuambukizwa yana maana tofauti. Ugonjwa wenye maambukizi ni ule unaosababishwa na pathojeni, kama vile kirusi, bakteria, kuvu au vimelea wengine. Ugonjwa ambukizi ni ugonjwa ambao unasambazwa kwa urahisi kwa kuwa karibu na mtu aliyeambukizwa. Serikali nyingi zinahitaji wageni wanaoingia, au wenyeji wanaoondoka kwenye nchi zao kuchanjwa dhidi ya magonjwa tofauti. Mara nyingi mahitaji haya huenda yakategemea ni nchi gani msafiri amezuru au anakusudia kuzuru.
mt: For those unfamiliar with medical terminology, the names of infectious diseases and their transmission are different. Diseases caused by pathogens, such as viruses, bacteria, fungi, or other microorganisms, are called infectious diseases. Diseases that are easily spread to a person who has been infected are called communicable diseases. Many governments require incoming or outgoing visitors to be vaccinated against different diseases. These requirements often depend on which country a traveler has visited or plans to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Watoaji wa VPN (mtandao pepe wa kibinafsi) ya kibinafsi ni njia bora ya kukwepa uzuiaji wa kisiasa na uchujaji wa kibiashara wa IP kulingana na eneo. Ni bora kuliko wakala wa tovuti kwa sababu kadhaa: Huelekeza upya trafiki yote ya intaneti, si http pekee. Kwa kawaida huwa wanatoa upana wa bendi wa juu na huduma bora zaidi. Wamesimbwa kwa hivyo ni vigumu kuwapeleleza.
mt: Private VPNs are a better way to avoid political and business IP blocking and throttling based on location. They are better than a proxy because they route all internet traffic, not just http. They usually have a higher bandwidth and better service. They are so popular that they are hard to explain.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Kwa sababu simu hupitishwa kwenye intaneti, huhitaji kutumia kampuni ya simu iliyo mahali unakoishi au unakosafiri. Pia hakuna sharti kwamba upate nambari ya kienyeji kutoka kwa jamii unakoishi; unaweza kupata unganisho la mtandao wa satelaiti kwenye porini ya Chicken, Alaska na uchague nambari inayodai uko katika Arizona yenye jua. Mara nyingi, unafaa kununua kando nambari ya kimataifa ambayo inakubali simu za PSTN kukupigia. Mahali nambari hiyo imetoka huleta tofauti kwa watu wanaokupigia.
mt: Because the phone is connected to the Internet, it requires a carrier in the area you live or travel. Also, there is no requirement that you get a local number from the community you live in; you can get a satellite network connection on the Chicken, Alaska porch and choose a number that claims you are in Arizona with the sun. Often, it is advisable to buy an international number that accepts PSTN calls. Where this number comes from brings differences for people calling.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Matamshi ni rahisi kiasi kwa Kiitaliano kwani maneno mengi hutamkwa hasa yalivyoandikwa Herufi muhimu za kuzingatia ni c na g, kwani matamshi yake hubadilika kulingana na vokali inayofuata. Pia, hakikisha kutamka r na rr tofauti: caro inamaanisha mpenzi, ilhali carro inamaanisha gari la kuvurutwa na farasi.
mt: 1. Pronunciation is easy for Italian because many words are spelled as they are pronounced. The most important letters to remember are c and g, because their pronunciation changes depending on the vowel that follows them. Also, make sure to distinguish r and rr: caro means lover, while carro means horse-drawn carriage and fara means horse.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir ni mji wa tatu kwa ukubwa nchini Uturuki na idadi ya watu ya takribani milioni 3.7, bandari ya pili kwa ukubwa baada ya Istanbul, na kitovu kizuri sana cha uchukuzi. Uliokuwa mji wa kale wa Smyma, sasa ni wa kisasa, ulioendelea, na wa kibiashara wenye shughuli nyingi, ulioewekwa kuzunguka kituo kikubwa na umezungukwa na milima. Njia pana, majengo yenye vioo sehemu za mbele na vituo vya kisasa vya kibiashara vimejaa paa za vigae vyekundu vya jadi, soko la karne ya 18, misikiti na makanisa ya zamani, ingawa jiji lenyewe lina anga ya Uropa kuliko Uturuki ya jadi.
mt: Izmir is the third largest city in Turkey and has a population of approximately 3.7 million, the second largest port after Istanbul, and a very good logistics hub. The ancient city of Smyrna, now a modern, developed, and commercial city, is located around a large port and surrounded by mountains. A wide avenue, ancient buildings with balconies in the front and modern business centers, have been built on the red clay terraces of the old bazaar, the 18th century market, mosques and old churches, although the city itself has a European atmosphere rather than the traditional Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Utazamaji wa maua ya cheri, inayojulikana kama hanami, imekuwa sehemu ya utamaduni wa Kijapani tangu karne ya 8. Dhana hiyo ilitoka Uchina ambapo maua ya plamu ndiyo yaliyokuwa maua yaliyopendelewa. Huko Japani, sherehe za kwanza za maua ya mcheri ziliandaliwa na maliki kwa ajili yake mwenyewe na washiriki wengine wa upatanishi waliozunguka Mahakama ya Imperi.
mt: The viewing of cherry blossoms, known as hanami, has been part of Japanese culture since the eighth century. The practice originated in China, where the plum tree was the preferred blossom. In Japan, the first cherry blossom festivals were organized by aristocrats for their own enjoyment and that of other courtiers who gathered around the Imperial Palace.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Yerusalemu ni mji mkuu na mkubwa zaidi wa Israeli, ijapokuwa nchi nyingine nyingi na Umoja wa Mataifa haziutambui kama mji mkuu wa Israeli. Mji wa kale katika Vilima vya Judea una historia ya kusisimua ya maelfu ya miaka. Mji ni mtakatifu kwa dini tatu zinazomwamini Mungu mmoja - Dini ya Kiyahudi, Ukristo na Uislamu, na hutumika kama kituo cha kiroho, kidini, na kitamaduni. Kwa sababu ya umuhimu wa kidini wa mji huo, na hususan sehemu nyingi za maeneo ya Mji wa Zamani, Yerusalemu ni mojawapo ya sehemu kuu zinazowavutia watalii nchini Israeli. Yerusalemu ina sehemu nyingi za kihistoria, akiolojia na kitamaduni, pamoja na vituo vya ununuzi, mahoteli na migahawa mahariri na iliyojaa.
mt: Jerusalem is the largest and most populous city in Israel, although other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as such. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a tumultuous history of thousands of years. The city is holy to three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and is used as a religious, spiritual and cultural center. Because of the city's religious importance, and especially the many areas of the Old City, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist attractions in Israel. The city has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites, including shopping centers, hotels and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Kruger (KNP) iko kaskazini-mashariki mwa Afrika Kusini na inapakana na Msumbiji upande wa mashariki, Zimbabwe upande wa kaskazini, na Mto wa Mamba upande wa kusini. Mbuga hiyo inachukua kilomita 19,500 mraba na imegawanywa katika maeneo 14 tofauti ya ekolojia , kila moja ikisaidia wanyama tofauti wa porini. Ni mojawapo ya vivutio vya Afrika Kusini na huzingatiwa kuwa kuu kati ya Mbuga za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini (SANParks). Kama ilivyo na Mbuga zote za Wanyama za Kitaifa Kusini mwa Afrika, kuna malipo ya kila siku ya uhifadhi na kiingilio. Inaweza kuwa manufaa kwa mtu kununua Kadi Mbugani, ambayo hutoa kiingilio kwa baadhi ya mbuga za Afrika Kusini au Mbuga zote za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa and borders with Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Limpopo River to the south. The park covers 19,485 square kilometres (7,505 sq mi) and is divided into 14 different ecozones, each supporting different types of wildlife. It is one of South Africa's premier tourist attractions and is also one of the largest game reserves in Africa. It is managed by the South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there is an entrance fee charged to visitors. It is possible to purchase a Wild Card, which gives access to all South African National Parks, and also provides a discount on accommodation and activities.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
