src: Juu ya mwisho wa kaskazini mwa Machu Picchu ni mlima ulio na mwinuko, mara nyingi ni uwanja wa nyuma wa picha nyingi za magofu. Inaonekana kutisha kutoka chini, na ni mwinuko mkali na mgumu, lakini watu wanaokusudiwa kuwa na hali nzuri ya mwili wanapaswa kuwa na uwezo wa kuupanda kwa dakika kama 45. Hatua za mawe zimewekwa kando ya idadi kubwa ya vijia, na katika sehemu za mteremko nyaya za chuma hutoa reli za kushikiliwa inayounga mikono. Hilo likiwa limesemwa, tarajia kuishiwa na pumzi, na kuwa mwangalifu katika sehemu zenye mwinuko mno, haswa wakati wa unyevunyevu, kwa sababu inaweza kuwa hatari haraka. Kuna pango ndogo karibu na juu ambalo lazima lipitwe, liko chini kabisa na la kubana sana.
mt: At the top of the northern end of Machu Picchu is a mountain with a steep slope, often a dangerous descent. It looks terrifying from below, and is a steep and difficult climb, but people with good physical condition should be able to climb it in about 45 minutes. Steps of stone have been placed alongside a large number of stairs, and in areas of loose rock, metal handrails provide support. This having been said, the trail is narrow and exposed, and can be dangerous in bad weather, especially when wet. There is a small ledge near the top that must be traversed, which is at the bottom and very slippery.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Vyakula vya Majokan, kama vile vya sehemu nyingine kwenye kanda ya bahari ya Mediterranean, vimetengenezwa kwa mkate, mboga na nyama (hasa ya nguruwe), na hutumia mafuta ya mizeituni nyakati zote. Chakula rahisi cha jioni, hasa wakati wa kiangazi, huwa ni Pa ambi Oli: Mkate wa mafuta ya mizeituni, nyanya, na viungo vingine vinavyopatikana kama vile jibini na samakituna.
mt: Meals are typically made of bread, fish and meat (especially lamb), and olive oil is used year-round.  Evening meals, especially during Lent, are often Pa amb i Oli: bread with olive oil, tomatoes, and other available ingredients such as onions and capers.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Mlo wa Hangi hupikiwa kwenye shimo lenye joto ardhini. Shimo hilo huchomwa kwa mawe moto kutoka kwa moto, au katika baadhi ya maeneo nishati ya jua huyafanya maeneo ya ardhi kiasilia kuwa moto. Hangi hutumika mara nyingi kupikia chajio cha mtindo wa kuchoma. Sehemu kadhaa katika Rotorua hutoa hangi ya jotoardhi, wakati hangi nyingine zinaweza kupatikana katika Christchurch, Wellington na kwingineko.
mt: A geothermal well is drilled into a hot rock formation. The rock is heated by magma, or in some areas by the sun, making the ground naturally hot. A geothermal well is often used to heat a hot spring. Some areas in Rotorua produce geothermal wells, while others can be found in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Wakati wa kutembelea nyumba za watawa, wanawake wanatarajiwa kuvaa sketi zinazofunika magoti na pia wafunike mabega yao. Nyingi za monasteri hutoa kanga kwa wanawake wanaokuja bila, lakini ukija na kanga yako, haswa iliyo na rangi kali, utapata tabasamu kutoka kwa monaki au sista kwenye kiingilio. Vile vile, wanaume wanahitajika kuvaa suruali zinazofunika magoti. Hii pia inaweza kuombwa kutoka kwa akiba kwenye lango lakini nguo hizo hazifuliwi baada ya kila mtumiaji kwa hivyo huenda usijihisi mwenye starehe unapovaa sketi hizo. Saizi moja hutosha wote kwa wanaume!
mt: When visiting a convent, women are expected to wear a veil that covers their shoulders and also their heads. Many of the monasteries offer a veil for those who do not have one, but if you bring your own veil, especially one with bright colors, you will get a smile from the monks or nuns at the entrance. Men are also expected to wear trousers that cover their knees. This can also be requested from the entrance, but once used by all visitors, the clothes are not cleaned afterwards, so you may not feel welcome wearing those veils. One size fits all for men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Ukitembelea maeneo ya Aktiki na Antaktiki msimu wa baridi utapata tajriba ya usiku wa pola, ambayo ina maana kuwa jua halichomozi juu ya upeo wa macho. Hii inatoa fursa nzuri ya kuona mwanga wa Aurora, kwani anga itakuwa giza kwa kadiri fulani mchana na usiku. Kwa kuwa maeneo hayo hayana idadi kubwa ya watu, na uchafuzi kidogo aghalabu huwa si tatizo, pia utaweza kufuruhia nyota.
mt: If you visit the Arctic and Antarctic in the winter, you will experience polar night, which means the sun does not rise above the horizon. This gives you a great opportunity to see the aurora, because the sky will be dark for some time during the day and night. Because these areas have few people, and little crime, you can also enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Katika sehemu za mbali, bila signali za simu za mkononi, simu ya setilaiti huenda ikawa chaguo lako la pekee. Simu ya satelaiti sio kwa ujumla mbadala wa simu ya rununu, kwani lazima uwe nje wazi na kuona laini za satelaiti ili kupiga simu. Huduma hutumika mara kwa mara na usafirishaji, vikiwemo vyombo vya anasa, vilevile safari zilizo na mahitaji ya data na sauti ya mbali. Mtoaji wako wa huduma za simu anastahili aweze kutoa habari zaidi kuhusu kuunganishwa na huduma hii.
mt: In remote areas, without cell phone towers, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not a regular cell phone, as it requires you to be outside and see the satellite to make a call. The service is used frequently by travelers, including boaters, as well as those who need data and long-distance voice in remote areas. Your service provider should be able to tell you more about connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Mji mkuu wa Moldova ni Chisinau. Lugha ya ndani ni Kiroma, lakini Kirusi inatumika sana. Moldova ni taifa lenye makabila mngi ambayo yameteseka kutokana na migogoro ya kikabila. Mnamo 1994, migogoro hii ilipelekea kuundwa na kujitangaza kwa Taifa la Transnistria mashariki mwa Moldova, ambalo lina serikali na sarafu yake, lakini halitambuliwa na taifa lolote wanachama wa Umoja wa Mataifa. Viungo vya kiuchumi vimeanzishwa tena kati ya sehemu hizi mbili za Moldova licha ya kutofaulu kwa majadiliano ya kisiasa. Dini kuu katika Moldova ni Ukristo wa Kiorthodoksi.
mt: Chisinau is the capital of Moldova. The official language is Romanian, but Russian is widely spoken. Moldova is a multiethnic country that has suffered from ethnic strife. In 1994, this led to the creation and declaration of the breakaway state of Transnistria in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is recognized by no other state. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure of political negotiations. The main religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

In 1994, this led to the creation and declaration of the breakaway state of Transnistria in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is recognized by no other state. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure of political negotiations. The main religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Kwa kuwa Montevideo imo kusini mwa Ikweta, huko huwa ni msimu wa kiangazi wakati Nyanda ya Kaskazini ni baridi na kinyume chake. Montevideo iko upande wa sabutropiki; katika miezi ya kiangazi, hali ya joto zaidi ya +30ºC ni hali ya kawaida. Msimu wa baridi unaweza kuwa baridi kidanganyifu: kadiri ya joto kwa mara chache sana huenda chini ya kiwango cha kugandisha, lakini upepo na unyevu huchanganyika na kufanya kuwe na baridi zaidi kuliko ile ambayo kipimajoto kinasema. Hakuna vipindi maalum vya “mvua” au “ukavu”: kiwango cha mvua hubaki takribani sawa mwaka mzima.
mt: Because Montevideo is south of the equator, there it is summer when the Northern Hemisphere is cold and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30ºC are common. The winter can be cold: occasionally the temperature drops below freezing, but wind and humidity combine to make it colder than the thermometer says. There are no distinct “rainy” or “dry” seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same year-round.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Michoro ya kuta au maandishi yasiyotakikana yanajulikana kama grafiti. Huku ikiwa mbali na tukio la kisasa, watu wengi labda huishirikisha na vijana kuharibu mali ya kibinafsi na ya umma kutumia rangi ya kunyunyizia. Walakini, siku hizi kuna wasanii wa grafiti waliobobea, hafla za michoro na kuta “halali”. Uchoraji wa grafiti kwenye muktadha huu mara nyingi hufanana na kazi za kisanaa badala ya vitambulisho visivyosomeka. """
mt: "Mural or unknown writing is known as graffiti. Here, far from the current event, many people may participate and vandalize private and public property using spray paint. However, today there are graffiti artists who excel, legal graffiti shows. Graffiti on this wall often resembles street art rather than illegible tags."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Kwa baadhi ya tamasha, idadi kubwa ya wanaohudhuria tamasha za muziki huamua kukita kambi kwenye eneo, na wengi wao hukuchukulia kuwa sehemu muhimu ya tajriba hiyo. Ikiwa ungetaka kuwa karibu na matukio utahitajika kurauka mapema ili upate eneo la kukita kambi karibu na muziki. Kumbuka kuwa hata muziki kwenye jukwaa kuu ukimalizika, kunaweza kuwa na sehemu za tamasha ambazo zitaendelea kucheza muziki hadi usiku wa manane. Tamasha kadhaa zina maeneo maalumu ya kukita kambi kwa familia zenye watoto wadogo.
mt: For some festivals, a large number of attendees choose to camp in the area, and many consider this to be an important part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you will need to arrive early to secure a campsite close to the music. Remember that even when the main stage music ends, there may be other stages that will continue playing music until midnight. Some festivals have designated family-friendly camping areas.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Kwa kuzingatia umbali wa wapueblo wengi, hutaweza kupata maisha ya usiku ya maana bila kusafiri kwenda Albakuku au Santa Fe. Walakini, karibu kasino zote zilizoorodheshwa hapo juu hutoa vinywaji, na kadhaa huleta chapa tajika za burudani (kimsingi zile kubwa zinazozingira Albukuku na Santa Fe moja kwa moja). Jihadhari: Baa za mji mdogo hapa sio mahali pazuri kwa mgeni wa nje ya nchi kutangamana. Kwa jambo moja, kaskazini mwa New Meksiko mna shida kubwa ya uendeshaji gari kwa ulevi, na idadi kubwa ya madereva walevi iko karibu sana na baa za miji midogo.
mt: Because of the distance from most people, you can't get a meaningful night life without driving to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, all the casinos listed above offer drinks, and some bring in big-name entertainment (Albuquerque and Santa Fe one at a time). Local tip: The small-town bars here are not a good place for an out-of-state visitor to get drunk. For one thing, northern New Mexico has a serious drunk-driving problem, and a large percentage of the drunk drivers are close to small-town bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Bia kuu katika eneo ni ‘Number One’, sio bia tata, ila ni zuri na hufariji. Hio bia nyingine ya mtaa huitwa ‘Manta’. Kuna aina nyingi za mvinyo wa Kifaransa inavyopatikana, lakini mvinyo wa New Zealand na Australia waweza safiri bora. Maji ya ndani ya bomba ni salama kabisa kwa kunywa, lakini maji ya chupa ni rahisi kupata iwapo una hofu. Kwa Waaustralia, wazo la kahawa ‘nyeupe’ ni la kigeni. Nyeusi fupi ni ’espresso’, cappuccino inakuja imerundikwa zaidi na malai (si povu) na chai inaandaliwa bila maziwa. Kinywaji moto cha chokoleti kinafikia viwango vya Ubelgiji. Sharubati za matunda ni bei ghali lakini ni bora.
mt: 1. The main drink in the area is ‘Number One’, not tea, but it is good and strong. The other street drink is called ‘Manta’. There are many types of French wine available, but New Zealand and Australian wines can travel well. The water inside the bottle is safe to drink, but the water in the cup can be contaminated if you are concerned. For Australians, the idea of a ‘black’ coffee is foreign. Espresso is short and dark, cappuccino is more frothy with milk (not powder) and tea is made without milk. Chocolate hot drinks reach Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive but good.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Waguaraní walikuwa kundi lenye maana zaidi ambalo linakaa kule ambako sasa kunaitwa Paragwai Mashariki, wakiishi kama wawindaji wahamahama ambao pia walikuwa wakilima mazao ya kujikimu. Eneo la Chako lilikuwa nyumbani mwa vikundi vingine vya kienyeji kama vile Guaycurú na Payaguá, ambao waliishi kwa uwindaji, ukusanyaji na uvuvi. Katika karne ya 16, Parague, iliyojulikana awali kama ""Jitu la Mkoa wa Indi"", ilizaliwa kufuatia makabiliano kati ya washindi wa Kihispania na makundi asilia. Wahispania walianza kipindi cha ukoloni ambacho kilidumu kwa karne tatu. Tangu msingi wa Asuncion mnamo 1537, Paraguai imeweza kudumisha sifa na utambulisho wake wa kienyeji."
mt: "The Guarani were a more significant group that lived where Paraguay East is now, living as hunter-gatherers who also cultivated crops. The Chaco was home to other indigenous groups such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who lived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century, Paraguay, previously known as the "Jewel of the Indies", was born from the conflicts between Spanish conquerors and indigenous groups. The Spanish began a colonial period that lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asuncion in 1537, Paraguay has managed to preserve its indigenous character."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: Waparisi wana sifa ya kujipenda, jeuri na wenye kiburi. Wakati hii mara nyingi ni aina ya dhana tu isiyofaa, njia nzuri ya kupatana kule Paris bado ni kuwa katika tabia yako njema, kufanya kama mtu ambaye ni “bien e’lev’e” (amelelewa vizuri). Itafanya kupatana rahisi mno. Umbo za nje za ghafla za Parisiani zitayeyuka haraka ikiwa unaonyesha ustahifu kadhaa za kimsingi.
mt: 1. Deputies are often arrogant, cruel and proud. At this time, most of the time it is just a thought, a good way to be in Paris is to be in your good behavior, to do as a person who is “bien e’lev’e” (well behaved). It will make it easy to get along. The sudden external forms of Parisians will quickly change if you show several basic crimes.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail ina daraja mbili katika treni za abiria ndani na karibu na Cape Town: MetroPlus (pia huitwa Daraja la Kwanza) na Metro (huitwa Daraja la Tatu). MetroPlus ina starehe zaidi na haina msongamano lakini ni ya bei ghali kiasi, ingawa bado ni ya bei ya chini kuliko tiketi za kawaida za reli huko Uropa. Kila treni ina kochi za MetroPlus na Metro; kila wakati kochi za MetroPlus huwa katika upande wa treni ulioko karibu na Cape Town.
mt: MetroRail has two passenger lines in Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called Line One) and Metro (called Line Three). MetroPlus has more stops and is less crowded but is more expensive, though still cheaper than regular European rail tickets. Each train has MetroPlus and Metro stops; MetroPlus stops are always on the side of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Wasafiri wanaweza kukutana na wadudu wa wanyama ambao hawawatambui kutoka maeneo yao ya nyumbani. Wadudu waharibifu wanaweza kuharibu chakula, kusababisha maudhi, au katika hali mbaya kusababisha athari za mzio, kueneza sumu au kusambaza maambukizi. Maradhi yenyewe ya kuambukiza, au wanyama hatari ambao wanaweza kujeruhi au kuua watu kwa nguvu, kwa kawaida hawahitimu kama wanyama-vipenzi.
mt: Passengers can encounter animals they are not used to from their home areas. Harmful insects can destroy food, cause contamination, or in a worst case scenario cause disease, spread poison or transmit infections. The diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people with their strength, usually do not count as pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Kila duka la karibu limejawa na aina nyingi za kukanganya za kadi za simu za kulipia kabla ambazo zinaweza kutumika katika simu za kulipia au simu za kawaida. Huku kadi nyingi zikiwa nzuri kwa kupiga simu kila mahali, nyingine ni maalumu kwa kutoa gharama za chini za kupiga simu kwa vikundi mahususi vya mataifa. Ufikiaji wa huduma hizi mara nyingi ni kupitia nambari ya simu isiyolipishwa ambayo inaweza kupigwa kutoka simu nyingi bila malipo.
mt: Every nearby store has a variety of prepaid calling cards that can be used in payphones or regular phones. Some cards are good for calling anywhere, others are special for low-cost calling to specific countries. Access to these services is often through an uncharged phone number that can be dialed from many phones without charge.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Plitvice Lakes ina misitu sana, hususan mifune, misonobari, na miti ya misonobari, na mchanganyiko wa uoto wa safu ya milima ya Alp na mediterania. Ina aina anuwai za jamii za mimea, kutokana na masafa yake ya hali ndogondogo za anga, mchanga tofauti na kutofautiana kwa viwango vya urefu. Eneo hilo pia ni nyumbani mwa aina nyingi sana mbalimbali za spishi za wanyama na ndege. Wanyama nadra kama vile Dubu wa hudhurungi wa Ulaya, mbwa mwitu, tai, bundi, simba-mangu, paka mwitu na kware wa Ulaya wanaweza kupatikana huko, pamoja na spishi nyingine nyingi za kawaida.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is heavily forested, especially with beech, fir, and spruce, and a mixture of alpine and mediterranean climate. It has a variety of plant communities, due to its varying altitudes, different soils, and varying degrees of exposure. The area is also home to many different species of animals and birds. Rare animals such as the European brown bear, wolf, lynx, wildcat, wild boar, deer, and the European wild goat can be found there, along with many other common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Plitvice Lakes ina misitu sana, hususan mifune, misonobari, na miti ya misonobari, na mchanganyiko wa uoto wa safu ya milima ya Alp na mediterania. Ina aina anuwai za jamii za mimea, kutokana na masafa yake ya hali ndogondogo za anga, mchanga tofauti na kutofautiana kwa viwango vya urefu. Eneo hilo pia ni nyumbani mwa aina nyingi sana mbalimbali za spishi za wanyama na ndege. Wanyama nadra kama vile Dubu wa hudhurungi wa Ulaya, mbwa mwitu, tai, bundi, simba-mangu, paka mwitu na kware wa Ulaya wanaweza kupatikana huko, pamoja na spishi nyingine nyingi za kawaida.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is heavily forested, especially with beech, fir, and spruce, and a mixture of alpine and mediterranean climate. It has a variety of plant communities, due to its varying altitudes, different soils, and varying degrees of exposure. The area is also home to many different species of animals and birds. Rare animals such as the European brown bear, wolf, lynx, wildcat, wild boar, deer, and the European wild goat can be found there, along with many other common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Kampuni za midia daima hudanganya kuhusu madhumuni ya hili, zikidai kwamba ni kwa “kuzuia uharamu”. Kwa kweli, misimbo ya mikoa hazina athari kabisa kwa unakilishaji haramu; nakala ndogo ndogo za diski zitacheza tu vizuri kwenye kifaa chochote kinachocheza nakala halisi. Lengo halisi ni kuzipatia kampuni hizo udhibiti zaidi wa masoko yake; yote ni kuhusu kutengeneza pesa.
mt: Media companies always confuse the purpose of this, claiming it is to "prevent piracy". In fact, region codes have no effect at all on illegal copying; small portions of a disc will play just fine on any device that plays the original. The real purpose is to give these companies more control over their markets; all is about making money.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Wakati kuangaliwa kwa uhamiaji kawaida haupo au ni urasmi ukifika katika nchi yako, udhibiti wa forodha unaweza kuwa shida. Hakikisha unajua kile unachoweza na hauwezi kuleta kisha kutangaza kitu chochote juu ya mipaka ya kisheria.
mt: When reviewing a typical immigration application, there is no or is a presumption that you are arriving in your country, border control may be a problem. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring before announcing anything about the legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Bonde la Cochamo – eneo kuu la makusudio ya ukweaji nchini Chile, lijulikanalo kama Yosemite ya Marekani Kusini, na kuta kubwa anuwai za matale na majabali. Mikutano huwa na mandhari za kusisimua kutoka vileleni. Wapanda mlima kutoka pande zote za ulimwengu wanaendelea kuanzisha njia mpya kati ya uwezo wake wa kuta.
mt: The Cochamo Valley – the main site of Chilean climbing, known as the Yosemite of South America, and a huge wall of basalt and granite. The meetings have a stunning view from the back. Climbers from all over the world continue to establish new routes between its power of the wall.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Ikiwa unataka kusafiri kuzunguka ulimwengu katika Kizio cha Kusini, machaguo ya ndege na mahali si mengi kwa sababu ya ukosefu wa ndege zinazosafiri kuvuka bahari. Hakuna muungano wa ndege unaohudumia vivukio vyote vitatu vya bahari katika Ulimwengu wa Kusini (na hakuna kivukio ambacho SkyTeam inahudumia). Hata hivyo, Star Alliance hushughulikia kila kitu isipokuwa South Pacific ya mashariki kutoka Santiago de Chile kwenda Tahiti, ambayo ni safari ya LATAM Oneworld. Safari hii ya ndege siyo chaguo la pekee kama unataka kuruka Pasifiki Kusini na pwani ya magharibi ya Marekani Kusini. (tazama chini)
mt: If you want to fly around the world in the Southern Hemisphere, flight connections and locations are not many due to the lack of flights crossing the oceans. There is no alliance that serves all three Southern Ocean crossings (and SkyTeam does not serve any). However, Star Alliance does serve everything except the South Pacific east from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld route. This flight is not a unique choice if you want to rise in the Southern Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Kimataifa, kuna mashirika karibu 200 ya ziara za mbio. Nyingi kati yazo hufanya kazi kwa uhuru. Mrithi wa Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours huunganisha makundi mengi ya kutoa huduma ya ukimbiaji na utazamaji kwenye mabara manne. Kwa mizizi ya Running Tours huko Barcelona na Copenhagen’s Running kwa Copenhagen, ilijumuishwa haraka na Running Tours huko Prague na wengineo.
mt: 200+ running tours exist worldwide. Many of them are run by independent operators. Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours brings together many tour operators offering running and sightseeing in four continents. Running Tours in Barcelona and Copenhagen’s Running in Copenhagen were quickly followed by Running Tours in Prague and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Pengine safari ndizo kivutio kikubwa zaidi cha watalii katika Afrika na angazio la wageni wengi. Neno safari linamaanisha kusafiri kuona Wanyama wa pori wa Afrika wanaoshangaza, haswa kwenye savanna Baadhi ya wanyama, kama vile ndovu na twiga, huelekea kusogea kukaribia magari na vifaa vya kawaida vitaruhusu utazamaji mwema. Simba, duma na chui wakati mwingine huwa na aibu na utawaona bora na darubini. Safari ya miguu (ijulikanayo kama ""matembezi kichakani"", ""safari ya kukwea"", au kwenda ""kwa miguu"") hujumuisha ukweaji, iwe kwa saa chache au siku kadhaa."
mt: "Perhaps safaris are the biggest attraction for tourists in Africa and the most popular of all. The word safari means travelling to see the wild animals of Africa, especially in the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, are attracted to vehicles and ordinary equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, tigers and hyenas sometimes are shy and will not be seen well and clearly. A walking safari (also known as ""hiking safari"", ""safari on foot"", or ""walking"") includes hiking, for a few hours or a few days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Ziara huwa bei nafuu kwa vikundi vikubwa, kwa hivyo kama uko peke yako au na rafiki mmoja tu, jaribu kukutana na watu wengine na kuunda kikundi cha watu wanne hadi sita kwa bei bora kwa mtu mmoja. Hata hivyo, kwa kweli hii haifai kukosa kukupa wasiwasi, kwa sababu mara nyingi watalii huchanganywachanganywa ili kuyajaza magari. Inaonekana kweli kuwa njia zaidi ya kuwadanganya watu kuamini wanapaswa kulipa zaidi
mt: A trip is often cheaper for a group, so if you're alone or with just one friend, try to meet up with other people and form a group of four to six people for the best price for one person. However, this doesn't always work, as often tourists are mixed together to fill up cars. It seems true that the best way to fool people into thinking they should pay more is to mix them up.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Huku uchumi wa San Francisco ukiunganishwa nayo kuwa kivutio cha watalii cha kimataifa, uchumi wake ni mseto. Sekta kubwa zaidi za ajira ni huduma za kitaalamu, serikali, fedha, biashara, na utalii. Kuonyeshwa kwake mara kwa mara katika muziki, filamu, fasihi na utamaduni maarufu kumesaidia kuufanya mji huo na minara yake ijulikane ulimwenguni kote. San Francisko imekuza miundombinu kubwa ya watalii ambayo ni hoteli mikahawa, na vifaa vingi, vya kongamano vya hali ya juu. San Francisco pia ni mojawapo ya mahali bora nchini kwa vyakula vya Kiasia: Korea, Thai, India, na Japani.
mt: 1. San Francisco's economy is closely tied to tourism, which is a major international draw. Its largest industries are professional services, government, finance, business, and tourism. It is often shown in music, film, literature, and popular culture, which has helped make the city and its landmarks known worldwide. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure, including hotels, restaurants, and meeting facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country for Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Kuhifadhi mapema humpatia msafiri amani ya akili kwamba atapata mahali pa kulala atakapofika. Kampuni za uwakala wa usafiri mara nyingi huwa na ofa na hoteli maalum, ingawa unaweza kupata uwezekano wa kuhifadhi aina nyingine za malazi, kama mahali pa kupiga kambi, kupitia wakala wa usafiri. Kampuni za wakala wa usafiri kwa kawaida hutoa vifurushi vya ofa ambavyo hujumuisha kiamshakinywa, mipango ya uchukuzi kwenda/kutoka kwenye uwanja wa ndege au hata vifurushi vya ndege na hoteli vilivyochanganywa. Pia wanaweza kukuwekea uhifadhi iwapo unahitaji muda wa kufikiria kuhusu ofa hiyo au kupata hati nyingine za mahali unapokwenda (k.m. visa). Marekebisho au maombi yoyote lazima yafuatwe kupitia wakala wa kusafiri kwanza na si moja kwa moja na hoteli.
mt: Booking in advance gives you peace of mind that you will have a place to stay when you arrive. Many travel agencies have special hotels, although you may be able to find other types of accommodations, such as camping, through a travel agency. Travel agencies usually offer packages that include meals, transfers to and from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They may also be able to arrange lodging if you need time to think about that package or to obtain other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any changes or requests must be made through the travel agency first and not directly with the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Programu za utafsiri wa matini kwa wakati halisi – programu-tumizi ambazo zina uwezo wa kutafsiri sehemu nzima za matini kutoka lugha moja kwa nyingine kiotomatiki. Baadhi ya programu-tumizi katika kategoria hii zinaweza hata kutafsiri matini ya lugha za kigeni kwenye vibao vya ishara au vitu vingine katika dunia halisi wakati mtumiaji anapoelekeza simu maizi kwenye vitu hivyo. Injini za utafsiri zimeimarika sana, na sasa mara nyingi hutoa tafsiri inayokaribia usahihi (na kawaida huwa si upuzi), lakini umakini unahitajika, kwani zinaweza kuwa zimekosea kabisa. Mojawapo ya programu maarufu sana katika kategoria hii ni Google Translate, ambayo huruhusu utafsiri nje ya mtandao baada ya kupakua data ya lugha inayotakikana.
mt: Real-time translation programs – programs that have the ability to translate entire texts from one language to another automatically. Some programs in this category can even translate foreign languages into the real world when a user points a phone at objects in the real world. Translation engines have improved greatly, and now often provide near-perfect translations (and usually are not errors), but caution is required, as they can be completely wrong. One of the most famous programs in this category is Google Translate, which allows off-line translation after downloading language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

Translation engines have improved greatly, and now often provide near-perfect translations (and usually are not errors), but caution is required, as they can be completely wrong. One of the most famous programs in this category is Google Translate, which allows off-line translation after downloading language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Maporomoko ya theluji si uhitilafiani wa kawaida; mteremko mkali unaweza kushikilia theluji kiwango fulani, na viwango vya ziada vitashuka kama maporomoko ya theluji. Tatizo ni kwamba theluji ni danganyifu, kwa hivyo inahitaji kuanzishwa ili iteremke, na kuteremka kwa theluji kidogo huenda kukawa tukio la kuanzisha iliyobaki. Wakati mwingine tukio asilia linalochochea ni jua kupasha joto theluji, wakati mwingine kuanguka zaidi kwa theluji, wakati mwingine matukio ya asili, mara nyingi binadamu.
mt: Glacial calving is not a normal occurrence; a large calving can hold a glacier at a certain level, and higher levels will break off as glacial calving. The problem is that glaciers are fragile, so they need to be started to calve, and calving a small glacier may be a triggering event. Sometimes the triggering event is a sun warming the glacier, sometimes calving more of the glacier, sometimes natural events, often humans.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "Bizari ni chakula kilichoundwa kwa mimea na viungo, pamoja na nyama au mboga. Bizari inaweza kuwa ""kavu"" au ""yenye unyevunyevu"" kulingana na kiasi cha kioevu. katika maeneo ya bara la Kaskazini mwa India na Pakistani, mtindi kwa kawaida hutumiwa katika mchuzi wenye viungo; Katika Kusini mwa India na mikoa mingine ya pwani ya bara ndogo, maziwa ya nazi hutumiwa sana."
mt: "A curry is a food dish in the South Asian cuisine. It is usually made with spices, herbs, vegetables and meat or seafood. Curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid used. In the northern parts of India and Pakistan, whole spices are used in dishes with pieces; In the southern parts of India and other coastal areas of the subcontinent, coconut milk is used extensively."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Njia ya Ncha ya Kusini (au Barabara Kuu) ni njia yenye urefu wa kilomita 1600 kutoka Kituo cha McMurdo katika Bahari ya Ross hadi kwenye ncha. Ni theluji iliyoshikanishwa na mianya kuzibwa ndani na kuwekwa alama ya bendera. Inaweza kusafiriwa tu na matrekta maalum, magari ya kukokota kwenye theluji yenye mafuta na vifaa. Hizi si nyepesi sana kwa hivyo inabidi treni kuchukua mzunguko mrefu katika Milima ya Transantarctic ili kuja kwenye tambarare.
mt: South Pole Road (or Main Street) is a 1600 km road from McMurdo Station in Ross Sea to the South Pole. It is a snow-covered road with a flag marker in the middle. It can only be driven by special vehicles, snowmobiles with fuel and equipment. These are not very fast, so the train has to take a long detour in the Transantarctic Mountains to come to the plains.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Kuingia Afrika Kusini kwa gari ni njia ya ajabu ya kuona uzuri wote wa eneo vilevile kufika mahali kusiko katika njia za kawaida za watalii. Hii inaweza kufanywa kwenye gari la kawaida kwa mipango makini lakini inapendekezwa sana gari la 4 kwa 4 na sehemu nyingi zinaweza kufikika tu kwa gari la 4 kwa 4 lenye magurudumu mapana. Zingatia wakati wa kupanga kwamba ingawa Kaskazini mwa Afrika ni imara si nchi zote jirani zilizo imara. Mahitaji na gharama ya visa hutofautiana toka nchi hadi nchi na huathiriwa na nchini unakotoka. Kila nchi pia ina sheria za kipekee zinazotaja ni vifaa vipi vya dharura unavyohitaji kuwa navyo garini mwako.
mt: 4x4 is a great way to see the beauty of the area and get to places that are not accessible by normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but it is highly recommended that you have a 4x4 with good ground clearance. Remember when planning that although North Africa is generally safe it is not safe everywhere. Visa requirements and costs vary from country to country and are affected by where you are coming from. Each country also has its own specific rules as to what emergency equipment you need to have in your car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Kuwabebea wengine - Usiwahi kuondoa macho yako kwenye begi zako, hasa unapovuka mipaka ya kimataifa. Unaweza kujipata ukitumiwa kama msafirishaji wa dawa za kulevya bila kujua, jambo ambalo litakuweka katika shida kubwa. Hii ni pamoja na kungoja kwenye foleni, wakati mbwa wa kunusa dawa wanaweza kutumiwa wakati wowote bila notisi. Baadhi ya nchi zina adhabu za kibabe zaidi hata kwa makosa ya kwanza; hizi zinaweza kuhusisha kufungwa jela kwa zaidi ya miaka 10 ama kifo. Begi zisizotunzwa ni lengo la wizi na pia zinaweza kuvutia umakinifu kutoka kwa mamlaka wanaohofia vitishio vya bomu.
mt: 1. Don't be a carrier - Don't take your eyes off your bag, especially when crossing international borders. You could get caught using drugs without knowing, which could put you in serious trouble. This includes waiting in line, when drug-sniffing dogs can be used at any time without notice. Some countries have harsher penalties for first offenses; these could include up to 10 years in jail or death. Unsecured bags are the goal of theft and also could attract attention from authorities who fear bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Jaza nyumba yako na kahawa bora asubuhi na chai ya kutuliza ya chamomile jioni. Wakati uko katika likizo karibu na nyumbani, una muda wa kujifurahisha na kuchukua dakika chache za ziada kutengeneza kitu spesheli. Ikiwa unajisikia jasiri zaidi, chukua fursa ya kutengeneza juisi au sharubati fulani: pengine utagundua kinywaji rahisi ambacho unaweza kutengeneza kwa kiamshakinywa utakaporejea utaratibu wako wa kila siku. Kama unaishi kwenye mji ulio na utamdauni wa kunywa, nenda kwenye baa jirani ambazo huendi mara kwa mara.
mt: Fill your home with good coffee in the morning and chamomile tea in the evening. When you're on vacation near home, you have time to enjoy yourself and take a few extra minutes to make something special. If you feel more adventurous, take the opportunity to make a juice or syrup: maybe you'll discover a drink that you can make for yourself on a regular basis. If you live in a city with a farmers' market, go to the stand that goes once a week.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Kijiji cha Haldarsvik kina mtazamo wa kisiwa kilicho karibu cha Eysturoi na kina kanisa lenye umbo lisilo la kawaida la pembe nane. Katika uwanja wa kanisa, kuna vinyago vya kuvutia vya marumaru vya njiwa juu ya kaburi. Inafaa nusu saa kutembeatembea katika kijiji hicho ambacho kinavutia.
mt: The village of Haldarsvik has a view of a nearby island of Eysturoy and an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are intriguing sculptures of trolls above the graves. It is worth half an hour to walk around this village that attracts.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Wakati huenda usihitaji visa kwa ziara fupi katika nchi fulani kama mtalii au kwa biashara, kwenda huko kama mwanafunzi wa kimataifa kwa jumla kunahitaji kukaa kwa muda mrefu kuliko kwenda huko kama mtalii wa kawaida tu. Kwa ujumla, kukaa kwenye nchi ya kigeni kwa muda mrefu zaidi kunahitaji upate visa mapema. Kwa jumla visa za wanafunzi huwa na mahitaji na utaratibu wa maombi tofauti na visa za kawaida za kitalii au kibiashara. Kwa nchi nyingi, utahitaji barua ya ofa kutoka kwa taasisi ambayo unataka kusomea, na pia ushahidi wa pesa za kujisaidia kwa angalau mwaka wa kwanza wa kozi yako. Angalia katika taasisi, vilevile idara ya uhamiaji ya nchi ambako unahitaji kusomea kwa mahitaji ya kina.
mt: When you may not need a visa for a short visit to a particular country as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student for a long period of time will require a visa. In general, student visas require earlier application than tourist or business visas. In most countries, you will need a letter of acceptance from the institution you wish to study at, and also proof of financial support for at least your first year of study. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department of the country you wish to study in for details.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Katika kiangazi, hasa, utahitaji kujihadhari na mbu ukiamua kutembea katika msitu wa mvua. Hata ikiwa unaendesha kupitia msitu wa mvua wa kitropiki ndogo, sekunde chache milango ikiwa wazi unapoingia kwenye gari ni muda unaotosha kwa mbu kuingia na wewe garini.
mt: In the tropics, especially, you will need to be alert and watchful when walking in a rain forest. Even if you are driving through a small tropical rain forest, a few seconds with the doors open is enough time for a monkey to enter your car and you to enter theirs.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sandabani ndizo mikoko mikubwa zaidi ya ukanda wa pwani duniani, yenye urefu wa kilomita 80 (maili 50) ndani ya Bangladeshi na bara ya Indi kutoka pwani. Sandarbans imetangazwa kuwa Eneo la Urithi wa Dunia la UNESCO. Sehemu ya msitu ndani ya wilaya ya India inaitwa Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Sandarbans. Misitu hiyo si mikoko ya mabwawa tu - inajumuisha baadhi ya misitu mikuu iliyosalia ambayo kwa wakati mmoja ilikuwa imefunikwa na tambarare ya Gaengitiki. Sundarban zimo katika eneo la kilomita 3,850 mraba, ambapo theluthi moja imefunikwa kwa maji/kinamasi. Tangu mwaka wa 1966 Sandabani zimekuwa mbuga za wanyama pori, na inakadiriwa kuwa sasa kuna chui 400 wa Royal Bengal na kulungu takribani 30,000 katika eneo hilo.
mt: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, covering 80 km (50 mi) along the coast of Bangladesh and India. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Indian part of the forest is called the Sundarbans National Park. The Sundarbans is not just a mangrove swamp - it also includes some of the world's most important intact mangrove forests. The Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km2 (1,500 sq mi), of which one-third is covered by water and tidal land. Since 1966 the Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

Sundarban zimo katika eneo la kilomita 3,850 mraba, ambapo theluthi moja imefunikwa kwa maji/kinamasi. mt: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, covering 80 km (50 mi) along the coast of Bangladesh and India. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Indian part of the forest is called the Sundarbans National Park. The Sundarbans is not just a mangrove swamp - it also includes some of the world's most important intact mangrove forests. The Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km2 (1,500 sq mi), of which one-third is covered by water and tidal land. Since 1966 the Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Ulimwengu una zaidi ya lugha 5,000, zikiwemo zaidi ya ishirini zilizo na wazungumzaji zaidi ya milioni 50. Maneno yaliyoandikwa mara nyingi huwa rahisi kuelewa kuliko maneno yaliyotamkwa, pia. Hii huwa hususan ni kweli kwa anwani, ambazo aghalabu huwa vigumu kutamkwa kwa busara. Mataifa mengi mazima huzungumza Kiingereza kwa ufasaha kabisa, na kwa hata mengine mengi unaweza kutarajia ufahamu mdogo - hasa miongoni mwa watu wenye umri mdogo. Fikiria, ukitaka, Mmankunia, Mbostonia, Mjamaika, na Msydney wakiwa wameketi wamezunguka meza wakila chajio mkahawani katika Toronto. Wanaburudishana na hadithi kutoka kwa mitaa ya manyumbani kwao, inayosemwa katika lafudhi zao tofauti na lugha ya kienyeji isiyo rasmi.
mt: The world has more than 5,000 languages, including more than 20 with more than a million speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, especially. This is especially true for countries that speak English fluently, and for others you can expect limited understanding - especially among young people. Imagine, for example, that Mmankunia, Mbostonia, Mjamaika, and Msydney are sitting at a table eating dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They are exchanging stories from their hometowns, which are written in different languages from their official native language.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Mabasi huondoka kituo cha basi cha kati ya mawilaya (upande mwingine wa mto) siku nzima, ingawa mengi, haswa yale yanaoelekea mashariki na Jakar / Bumthang huondoka kati ya saa 6 na dakika 30 na saa 7 na dakika 30. Kwa kuwa mara nyingi mabasi yanayounganisha wilaya huwa yamejaa, inashauriwa kununua tikiti siku kadhaa mapema. Wilaya nyingi huhudumiwa na Mabasi madogo ya Pwani ya Kijapani, ambayo ni ya starehe na imara. Teksi zilizoshirikiwa ni aina haraka na starehe ya kusafiri katika maeneo ya karibu, kama vile Paro (Nu 150) na Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Buses leave the central bus station (opposite the river) all day, though many, especially those heading east to Jakar/Bumthang, leave between 6:30 and 7:30. As buses connecting the districts are often full, it is recommended to buy tickets a few days in advance. Many districts are served by small Japanese Coastal Buses, which are comfortable and reliable. Taxis are fast and comfortable in nearby areas, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Pamoja na kutofikika kwake kwa wastani, “Timbuktu” imekuja kutumika kama sitiari ya nchi za kigeni zilizo mbali sana. Leo hii, Timbuktu ni mji maskini, ingawa sifa zake huufanya kivutio cha watalii, na pia kuna uwanja wa ndege. Mnamo 1990, uliongezwa katika orodha ya maeneo ya urithi duniani yaliyo hatarini, kwa sababu ya tishio la mchanga wa jangwani. Ilikuwa mojawapo ya vituo vikuu wakati wa Maajabu ya Dunia ya Kiafrika spesheli ya PBS ya Henry Louis Gates.. Jiji hilo liko katika ulinganishi mgumu na miji mingine ya nchi, kwa sababu lina wangavu zaidi wa Kiarabu kuliko ule wa Kiafrika.
mt: Despite its lack of modern infrastructure, "Timbuktu" has come to be used as a byword for remote places. Today, Timbuktu is a poor town, though its fame makes it a tourist attraction, and it also has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of World Heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desertification. It was one of the major stops during the PBS special Africa: The Story of Us, hosted by Henry Louis Gates.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Mbio za Walemavu zitaanza mnamo Agosti 24 hadi Septemba 5, 2021. Baadhi ya mashindano yatafanyika katika maeneo tofauti tofauti kote Japani. Tokyo itakuwa mji wa kipekee wa Asia kuwahi kuwa mwenyeji wa Olimpiki mbili za kiangazi, kwani ilikuwa mwenyeji wa michezo hiyo mnamo 1964. Ikiwa ulihifadhi nafasi ya ndege na malazi yako 2020 kabla ya uahirisho kutangazwa, unaweza kuwa na hali ya hila. Sera za kufuta zinatofautiana, lakini kufikia mwishoni mwa mwezi Machi sera nyingi za ughairi kwa sababu ya virusi vya korona hazifiki hadi Julai 2020, wakati Olimpiki ilikuwa imeratibiwa. Inatarajiwa kwamba tiketi nyingi za hafla zitagharimu kati ya Yeni 2,500 na Yeni 130,000, na tiketi za kawaida zikigharimu takriban Yeni 7,000.
mt: 2020 Summer Olympics will begin on August 24 and end on September 5, 2021. Some events will be held in different areas across Japan. Tokyo will be the first Asian city to host the Summer Olympics twice, as it hosted the games in 1964. If you stored your plane and hangar in 2020 before the cancellation was announced, you may be in a pickle. Cancellation policies vary, but by the end of March most cancellation policies due to coronavirus were extended until July 2020, when the Olympics was postponed. Tickets for the event are expected to cost between Yen 2,500 and Yen 130,000, and regular tickets will cost about Yen 7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "Tufani ni safuwima inayozunguka iliyo na presha ya chini sana ya hewa, ambayo hufyonza hewa ya karibu ndani na juu. Wanafanyiza upepo (mara nyingi maili 100-200 kwa saa) na kuinua vitu vizito hewani, kubeba kama vile chemchela. Huanza kama faneli zinazoshuka kutoka kwenye mawingu ya dhoruba, na yakawa tufani yanapogusa ardhi."""
mt: "A tornado is a violently rotating column of air that is in contact with both the surface of the earth and a cumulonimbus cloud or, in rare cases, the base of a cumulus cloud. Tornadoes come in many sizes but typically eat up to 1.6 km (0.99 mi) in diameter, though much larger ones have occasionally been recorded. Tornadoes generally occur in conjunction with thunderstorms and are sometimes associated with hurricanes. They usually move at a speed of 17 to 48 km/h (10 to 30 mph), although they can move at speeds as high as 320 km/h (200 mph). Tornadoes have been reported in every state in the United States and in every Canadian province, but they are most common in the Great Plains region of the United States. Tornadoes are most common in the spring and summer months, and most frequently between 3 and 9 p.m. Tornadoes are most likely to occur in the United States, followed by Canada, Australia, and Europe. Tornadoes are also known as twisters, whirlwinds, cyclones, and eddies."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Kama nchi utakayozuru itakua ni somo kwa ushauri wa kusafiri, bima ya afya yako au bima ya kufuta usafiri wako huenda ikaathirika. Pia pengine ungetaka kushauriana na ushauri wa serikali bali na yako, lakini ushauri wao umeundiwa raia wao. Kama mfano mmoja, raia wa Marekani katika Mashariki ya Kati huenda wakakumbwa na hali tofauti kutoka kwa Wazungu na Waarabu. Ushauri ni muhtasari mfupi tu wa hali ya kisiasa katika nchi moja. Maoni yanayowasilishwa mara nyingi huwa ni ya haraka, ya kijumla na yaliyosahilishwa sana yakilinganishwa na habari za kina zinazopatikana kwingineko.
mt: As you travel to a new country, it is important to get advice on travel, health insurance, or cancellation of your trip. You may also want to consult with the government, but their advice has been undermined by their own citizens. For example, citizens of the United States in the Middle East may be confronted with a different situation from Arabs and Europeans. Advice is a brief summary of the political situation in one country. Opinions are often rushed, general and highly biased when compared to news from other sources.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Mawakala wa usafiri wamekuwapo tangu karne ya 19. Kwa kawaida wakala wa usafiri huwa chaguo zuri kwa safari ambayo ni zaidi ya uzoefu wa awali wa msafiri wa maumbile, utamaduni, lugha au nchi za mapato madogo. Ingawa mashirika mengi ya uwakala yako tayari kufanya uhifadhi mwingi wa kawaida, mawakala wengi hushughulika na aina maalum za usafiri, masafa ya bajeti au mahali pa kwenda. Inaweza kuwa afadhali kutumia wakala ambaye huhifadhi safari sawa na yako kila wakati. Angalia ni safari zipi ambazo wakala anapendekeza, iwe kwenye tovuti au kwenye dirisha la duka.
mt: Travel agents have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good choice for a trip that is more than a first-time traveler's experience, a different culture, language or country. While many travel agencies offer standard services, many specialize in a particular type of travel, budget or destination. It may be best to use an agent who specializes in the type of trip you are taking. Look at which trips the agent recommends, whether on their website or in their storefront.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Kuna mambo mengi sana unayofaa kutilia maanani kabla na wakati wa kusafiri mahali. Unaposafiri, tarajia mambo yasiwe kama yalivyo “nyumbani”. Tabia, sheria, chakula, trafiki, mahali pa kulala, viwango, lugha na kadhalika zitatofautiana kwa kiwango fulani na mahali unapoishi. Hili ni jambo ambalo unahitaji kukumbuka kila wakati, ili kuepuka kukata tamaa au hata kuchukizwa na njia za kawaida za kufanya mambo.
mt: There are many things you should be aware of before and during your travels. When you travel, expect things to be different from what they are at “home”. Customs, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will vary to some degree in the place you are visiting. This is something you should keep in mind at all times, to avoid frustration or even being arrested by local authorities.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Ikiwa unasafiri kwa mara ya kwanza katika taifa linaoendelea – au katika sehemu geni ulimwenguni – usipuuze uwezekano wa mshtuko wa kitamaduni. Wasafiri wengi wenye uwezo wameshindwa na upya wa usafiri wa ulimwengu unaokua, ambapo marekebisho mengi madogo ya kitamaduni yanaweza kuongezeka haraka. Hasa katika siku zako za mwanzo, zingatia utumizi wa pesa kwa wingi katika hoteli za mitindo ya Magharibi na bora, chakula, na huduma za kusaidia kujizoesha. Usilalie godoro au mto kwenye ardhi katika maeneo ambayo hujui wanyama wake wa kienyeji. Ikiwa unapanga kukaa kambini, beba kitanda kidogo cha kambini au kitanda cha bembea ili ujiepushe na nyoka, nge na vitu kama hivyo.
mt: If you're traveling to a developing country – or to a remote area of the world – don't overlook the possibility of a cultural faux pas. Many travelers with good intentions have been stymied by the rapid changes in global travel, where many small cultural adjustments can quickly escalate. In your early days, be aware of the use of money in Western-style and upscale hotels, food, and assistance. Don't sit on a rock or a river in areas you don't know the local wildlife. If you're planning to camp, bring a small camping cot or a hammock to keep you away from snakes, bugs, and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Ikiwa unasafiri kwa mara ya kwanza katika taifa linaoendelea – au katika sehemu geni ulimwenguni – usipuuze uwezekano wa mshtuko wa kitamaduni. Wasafiri wengi wenye uwezo wameshindwa na upya wa usafiri wa ulimwengu unaokua, ambapo marekebisho mengi madogo ya kitamaduni yanaweza kuongezeka haraka. Hasa katika siku zako za mwanzo, zingatia utumizi wa pesa kwa wingi katika hoteli za mitindo ya Magharibi na bora, chakula, na huduma za kusaidia kujizoesha. Usilalie godoro au mto kwenye ardhi katika maeneo ambayo hujui wanyama wake wa kienyeji. Ikiwa unapanga kukaa kambini, beba kitanda kidogo cha kambini au kitanda cha bembea ili ujiepushe na nyoka, nge na vitu kama hivyo.
mt: If you're traveling to a developing country – or to a remote area of the world – don't overlook the possibility of a cultural faux pas. Many travelers with good intentions have been stymied by the rapid changes in global travel, where many small cultural adjustments can quickly escalate. In your early days, be aware of the use of money in Western-style and upscale hotels, food, and assistance. Don't sit on a rock or a river in areas you don't know the local wildlife. If you're planning to camp, bring a small camping cot or a hammock to keep you away from snakes, bugs, and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Tengeneza na ubebe nakala za hati ya bima na maelezo ya mawasiliano ya mtoa huduma wako wa bima. Wanahitaji kuonyesha anwani ya barua pepe na nambari za simu za kimataifa za mtoa bima kwa ushauri/idhini na kufanya madai. Kuwa na nakala nyingine katika mzigo wako na mtandaoni (baruapepe iliyo na kiambatisho kwako mwenyewe, au kuhifahiwa kwenye “wingu”). Kama unafasiri na kipakatilishi au kibao, hifadhi nakala kwenye kadi kasima yake(unayoweza kufikia bila mtandao) Pia toa nakala za sera/mkataba kwa wenzi wa kusafiri na jamaa au marafiki nyumbani walio tayari kusaidia.
mt: 1. Create and keep copies of your insurance policies, and contact information for your insurance provider. They will need to show proof of your address (a letter with your own stamp, or a “winged” stamp) and make claims. If you are a translator or interpreter, keep a copy of your policies in a safe place (that you can access without internet) 2. Give copies of your policies to your travel companions and family/friends at home who are willing to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Kuna aina nyingi za filamu ambazo zimetumika kwa miaka. Filamu ya milimita 35 (kanda hasi ya milimita 36 kwa milimita 24) ni ya kawaida zaidi. Kwa kawaida inaweza kujazwa tena kwa urahisi kiasi ikiisha, na hutoa ubora wa mwonekano unaoweza kulinganishwa na ule wa DSLR ya sasa. Kamera ingine za muundo wa kati zinatumia muundo wa 6 kwa 6, kwa usahihi 56 kwa 56 hasi. Hii hutoa ubora wa mwonekano karibu mara nne ya ule wa picha hasi ya milimita 35 (3136 mm2 dhidi ya 864).
mt: 35mm film is the most common. It can be easily re-used when it is finished, and provides an image quality that can be compared to that of a modern DSLR. Other cameras of intermediate format use a 6x6, or 56x56 frame. This provides an image quality about four times that of 35mm film (3136 mm2 vs. 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
