src: Njia ilio rahisi kuanza biashara ya uandishi wa usafiri ni kuonyeshana ujuzi wako kwenye tovuti ya blogu ya usafiri iliyo imara. Unaporidhika na umbizo na uhariri kwenye wavuti, basi baadaye, labda utaunda tovuti yako mwenyewe.
mt: A simple way to start a travel writing business is to show your expertise on a well-established travel blog. If you enjoy writing and editing on a website, then later, maybe you will start your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Nyumbani, kwa sababu ya kuwa kwenye viini vya ndani kila wakati, kuna uwezekano mkubwa kwamba tayari una kinga dhidi yavyo. Lakini katika sehemu nyingine za dunia, ambapo wanyama wa kibakteria ni wapya kwako, una uwezekano mkubwa zaidi wa kukumbwa na shida. Pia, katika hali joto za hewa bakteria hukua kwa haraka na kuishi kwa muda mrefu nje ya mwili. Hivyo pigo la Delhi Belly, Laana ya Firauni, Kisasi cha Montezuma, na marafiki zao wengi. Kama vile shida za kupumua katika hali baridi za hewa, shida za mara katika hali joto za hewa ni kawaida kiasi, na katika hali nyingi hukera wazi lakini si hatari kwa kweli.
mt: At home, because of the constant presence of bacteria in your gut, you have a good chance of already having immunity against them. But in other parts of the world, where you are new to the bacteria, you have a greater chance of being exposed to illness. Also, in hot weather, bacteria grow quickly and live longer outside the body. So, Delhi Belly, Pharaoh's Plague, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. Like the common cold in cold weather, the common stomachache in hot weather is common, but not really dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Uropa ni bara ambalo ni dogo kiasi lakini lina nchi nyingi huru. Katika hali ya kawaida, kusafiri kupitia nchi nyingi kungemaanisha kulazimika kufanya maombi ya visa na udhibiti wa pasipoti mara nyingi. Eneo la Schengen, hata hivyo, hufanya kazi kiasi kama nchi moja kuhusiana na jambo hili. Bora ubakie katika eneo hili, unaweza kuvuka mipaka bila kupitia maeneo ya ukaguzi wa pasipoti tena. Vilevile, kwa kuwa na visa ya Schengen, huhitaji kutoa maombi ya visa kwa kila nchi iliyo memba wa Schengen kivyake, hivyo kuokoa muda, pesa na nyaraka.
mt: Europe is a small continent but has many free countries. In normal circumstances, traveling through many countries means having to apply for visas and passport controls many times. The Schengen area, however, works somewhat like one country in this regard. Better yet, in the Schengen area, you can cross borders without going through passport control again. Also, because you have a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a visa for each country that is a member of Schengen, thus saving time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Kaburi la Tutankhamun (KV62). Huenda KV62 ndilo kaburi maarufu zaidi katika Bonde, eneo la ugunduzi wa Howard Carter wa mazishi salama ya kifalme ya mfalme mchanga mnamo 1922. Ikilinganishwa na makaburi mengine mengi ya kifalme, hata hivyo, kaburi la Tutankhamun halistahili sana kutembelewa, ni dogo sana na lina mapambo machache. Mtu yeyote aliye na shauku ya kuona ushahidi wa uharibifu uliofanyiwa maiti ya kale wakati wa kujaribu kuitoa kutoka kwa jeneza atasikitika kuwa ni kichwa na mabega tu zinazoonekana Utajiri mwingi wa kaburi haupo tena ndani yake, ila umepelekwa katika Jumba la Makumbusho la Misri huko Kairo. Ni bora wageni wasiokuwa na muda mrefu kutumia muda wao mahali pengine.
mt: The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 is perhaps the most famous of the tombs discovered by Howard Carter's excavation of the Valley of the Kings in 1922. Compared to other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is small and sparsely decorated. Anyone who has a desire to see evidence of the desecration of an ancient corpse when attempting to remove it from its sarcophagus will be disappointed to find that there is only a skull and a few bones remaining inside, the rest having been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. It is better for visitors with limited time to spend elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Kisiwa cha Bowen ni maarufu kwa safari ya mchana ama safari ya wikendi na inatoa safari za kayaki, matembezi, maduka, migahawa, na nyinginezo. Jamii hii halisi iko katika Howe Sound nje ya Vancouver, na inafikiwa kwa urahisi kupitia teksi za majini zilizoratibiwa zinazoondoka Kisiwa cha Granville katika Vancouver ya chini. Kwa wale ambao hufurahia shughuli za nje, matembezi kwenye korido toka Baharini hadi Angani ni muhimu. Whistler (mwendo wa saa 1.5 kutoka Vancouver) ni pa bei ghali lakini panajulikana kwa sababu ya Olimpiki ya Msimu wa Baridi ya 2010. Katika msimu wa baridi, furahia baadhi ya utelezaji mzuri wa Marekani Kaskazini na katika msimu wa joto jaribu uendeshaji baiskeli halisi milimani.
mt: Bowen Island is known for its day or weekend trips and offers kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This community is located in Howe Sound outside of Vancouver, and is easily accessible via ferry from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a walk from the beach to the sky is important. Whistler (a 1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in the North America and in the summer try some real mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls ni mji ulioko katika sehemu ya magharibi mwa Zimbabwe, kuvuka mpaka kutoka Livingstone, ya Zambia, na karibu na Botswana. Jiji liko mara moja karibu na maporomoko ya maji ambayo ndiyo kivutio kikuu, lakini sehemu hii maarufu ya watalii huwatolea wanaotafuta kusisimka na kutembea maeneo mbali mbali fursa ya kukaa kwa muda mrefu. Katika msimu wa mvua (Novemba hadi Machi), kiasi cha maji kitakuwa cha juu na maporomoko ya maji yatakuwa ya fujo sana. Umehakikishiwa kupata unyevunyevu ukiweza kuvuka daraja ama kutembea kando ya njia zinazozunguka karibu na Maporomoko. Kwa upande mwingine, ni kwa sababu kiwango cha maji hususan ni kikubwa sana hivi kwamba mtazamo wako wa Maporomoko halisi ya Maji utazuiliwa – na maji yote!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the west of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone in Zambia, and close to Botswana. The town lies on the Zambezi River and is the gateway to the falls. This popular tourist destination offers visitors the opportunity to stay for a long time and explore many areas. In the rainy season (November to March), the water level will be high and the falls will be in full flood. It is advisable to get wet and cross the bridge or walk along the paths around the falls. On the other hand, because the water level is so high, your view of the falls will be obscured – and all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Kanuni kuhusu upigaji picha za kawaida pia hutumika kwa kurekodi video, pengine hata zaidi. Ikiwa kupiga picha ya kitu tu hakuruhusiwi, basi hupaswi hata kufikiria kurekodi video yake. Ikiwa unatumia ndege-roboti, angalia mapema ni nini unachoruhusiwa kuchukua filamu yake na ni vibali au leseni gani za ziada zinazohitajika. Kurusha kidege-roboti karibu na uwanja wa ndege juu ya umati wa watu ni wazo mbaya karibu kila wakati, hata kama si haramu katika eneo lako.
mt: The rules for taking ordinary pictures also apply to recording video, perhaps even more so. If taking a picture of an object is prohibited, then you should not even think about recording a video of it. If you are using a drone, look early what you are allowed to take a film of and what additional permits or licenses are required. Flying a drone near an airport with a crowd of people is a bad idea almost every time, even if it is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Usajili ni hitaji la ziada kwa mchakato wa visa. Katika baadhi ya nchi, ni lazima usajili uwepo wako na anwani ya unakokaa na mamlaka ya ndani. Hii huenda ikahitaji kujaza fomu na polisi wa ndani au ziara katika ofisi za uhamiaji. Katika nchi nyingi zilizo na sheria kama hiyo, hoteli za ndani zitashughulikia usajili (hakikisha umeuliza). Katika kesi nyingine, wale tu wanoishi nje ya makazi ya watlii wanafaa kujiandikisha. Lakini, hii inafanya sheria kuwa fiche, kwa hivyo jua mapema.
mt: Registration is an extra requirement for visa processing. In some countries, it is necessary to have your presence and address with the local authorities. This may require filling out a form and visiting the police or immigration office. In many countries with such laws, the local hotels will handle registration (ask them). In other cases, only those living outside the military bases need to register. But, this makes the law a joke, so know ahead.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Kujitolea wakati wa kusafiri ni njia nzuri ya kuleta mabadiliko lakini si kuhusu utoaji tu. Kuishi na kujitolea katika nchi ya kigeni ni njia bora ya kupata kujua utamaduni mpya, kukutana na watu wapya, kujifunza juu yako mwenyewe, kupata hisia za mtazamo na hata kupata ujuzi mpya. Pia inaweza kuwa njia bora ya kupanua bajeti ili kuwezesha kukaa mahali kwa muda mrefu kwani kazi nyingi za kujitolea hutoa vyumba na malazi na baadhi hulipa mshahara kidogo.
mt: Volunteering while traveling is a great way to make a difference, but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering abroad is a great way to learn about new cultures, meet new people, learn about yourself, gain new perspectives, and gain new skills. It can also be a great way to stretch your budget and stay somewhere longer, as many volunteer programs provide housing and some even pay a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Kusafiri kuenda Ulimwengu wa Walt Disney inawakilisha hija kuu kwa familia nyingi za Amerika. Ziara ya ""kawaida"" inajumuisha kutua kwenye Uwanja wa kimataifa wa ndege wa Orlando, kusafiri kwa basi hadi kwenye hoteli ya Disney, kukaa karibu wiki bila kutoka kwa miliki za Disney, na kurudi nyumbani. Kuna tofauti zisizo na kikomo zinazopatikana, lakini hili linabaki kuwa jambo ambalo watu wengi humaanisha wanaposema wanaenda Ulimwengu wa Disney”."" Tiketi nyingi zinazouzwa mtandaoni kupitia tovuti za minada kama eBay au Craiglist ni zilizotumika kidogo za siku nyingi za kutembelea mbuga nyingi. Ingawa hii ni shughuli ya kawaida sana, imekatazwa na Disney: tiketi haziwezi kuhamishwa."
mt: "Flying to the Walt Disney World is a major event for many American families. A ""typical"" trip includes flying into Orlando's international airport, taking a bus to a Disney hotel, staying for a week without leaving the Disney property, and returning home. There are differences that are not insignificant, but this remains something that many people dream of when they say they are going to Disney World."  Many tickets sold online through sites like eBay or Craiglist are used tickets from many days of visiting the park. Although this is a common practice, it is prohibited by Disney: tickets cannot be transferred."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Mtu yeyote anayepanga kutembelea nchi ambayo inazingatiwa kuwa eneo la vita anapaswa kupata mafunzo ya kitaalamu. Utafutaji wa ‘Kozi ya mazingira yenye uhasama’ kwenye Intaneti huenda pengine ukatoa anwani ya kampuni ya kienyeji. Kwa kawaida kozi itashughulikia masuala yote yaliyojadiliwa hapa kwa kina, na aghalabu pamoja na uzoefu wa moja kwa moja. Kwa kawaida kozi itachukua siku 2-5 na itahusisha uigizaji, huduma nyingi za kwanza na wakati mwingine mafunzo ya kutumia silaha. Vitabu na majarida yanayozungumzia maisha ya nyikani ni ya kawaida, lakini machapisho yanayohusiana na maeneo ya vita ni machache.
mt: Any person planning to visit a country that is considered a war zone should receive specialized training. A search on the Internet for “War Zone Training” may provide the address of a local company. The course will address all issues discussed here in detail, and in addition to one-on-one experience. The course will take 2-5 days and will include role-playing, first aid, and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines discussing life in the wilderness are common, but publications dealing with war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Kuna njia tofauti za kusafisha maji, baadhi zikiwa na mafanikio dhidi ya vitishio maalum. Katika baadhi ya maeneo mengine kuchemsha maji kwa dakika moja kunatosha, kwingineko dakika kadhaa zitahitajika. Vichujio hutofautiana katika utendaji, na iwapo utapatwa na wasiwasi, basi unafaa kufikiria kununua maji yako katika chupa iliyofungwa kabisa kutoka kwa kampuni tajika.
mt: There are different ways to purify water, some of which are effective against specific contaminants. In some areas, flushing water for one minute is enough, in others, it will take several minutes. The performance of filters varies, and if you are unsure, you should consider buying your water in sealed bottles from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Mikondo ya mawimbi ya maji ni yale yanayorudi kutokwa kwa mawimbi yanayoachana ufukoni, aghalabu mwambani au mahali sawa. Kwa sababu ya topolojia ya chini ya maji, yale yanayorudi huwa yamelimbikizia katika maeneo machache ya kina, na mawimbi ya kasi kwa maji ya kina yanaweza kuundika hapo. Vifo vingi hutokea kutokana na machovu ya kujaribu kuogelea kinyume na mawimbi, hali ambayo huenda ikawa ngumu. Mara tu utakapotoka kwenye mkondo, kuogelea kurudi si kugumu zaidi ya kawaida. Jaribu kulenga mahali ambapo hutashikwa tena au, kulingana na ujuzi wako au kama umeonekana, huenda ukataka kungoja uokovu.
mt: A river's eddy is the flow of water returning to the shore after it has been carried away by the current. Because of the river's low topography, the returning flow is concentrated in a small area, and fast-moving water in a deep river can create a whirlpool. Many deaths occur from trying to swim against the current, which can be difficult. Once you are out of the current, swimming back is not much harder than usual. Try to swim to a place where you will be carried back again or, depending on your knowledge or as you have seen, you may want to wait for rescue.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Njia za maji za barani zinaweza kuwa mandhari mzuri ya kufanyia likizo. Kwa mfano, kutembelea ngome katika Bonde la Loire, Bonde la Rhine au kusafiri katika maeneo ya kuvutia kwa Danube au kusafiri kwa mashua upande wa Mfereji wa Erie. Pia wao hufafanua njia maarufu za matembezi na uendeshaji baiskeli.
mt: Rivers can be a scenic way to take a vacation. For example, touring chateaux along the Loire or Rhine rivers, or cruising through picturesque areas along the Danube or Erie Canal. They also list popular hiking and biking trails.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Mkoa huo umefungwa na Saheli katika upande wa kaskazini, na umefungwa na Bahari ya Atlantiki katika upande wa kusini na magharibi. Wanawake: inapendekezwa kuwa wasafiri wowote wa kike waseme kwamba wameolewa, licha ya hali yao halisi ya ndoa. Ni muhimu pia kuvalia pete (wala si inayoonekana ghali sana). Wanawake wanapaswa kutambua kuwa tofauti za kitamaduni zinaweza kusababisha kile wangechukulia kama unyanyasaji na ni sio jambo lisilo la kawaida kufuatwa, kunyakuliwa kwa mkono, nk. Kuwa imara katika kuwakatalia watu, na usiogope kushikilia msimamo wako (tofauti za kitamaduni au la, hazilifanyi kuwa sawa!).
mt: That region is closed to the north by Sahel and to the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: it is recommended that any female traveler declare that she is married, regardless of her actual marital status. It is also important to wear a ring (not an expensive one). Women should be aware that cultural differences may cause what they would consider harassment and is not something to be followed, grabbing by the hand, etc. Be firm in detaining people, and do not give up your position (cultural differences or not, they do not make it right!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Wanyama pori ni miongoni mwa michoro yenye changamoto zaidi kwa mpiga picha, na inahitaji mchanganyiko wa bahati nzuri, uvumilivu, uzoefu na vifaa vizuri. Upigaji picha za wanyamapori mara nyingi huchukuliwa kwa urahisi, lakini kama upigaji picha kwa ujumla, picha ina thamani ya maneno elfu. Mara nyingi upigaji picha za wanyamapori huhitaji lenzi ndefu, ingawa vitu kama kundi la ndege au kiumbe mdogo huhitaji lenzi nyingine. Ni vigumu kupata wanyama wengi wa kigeni, na mbuga wakati mwingine huwa na sheria zinazohusu upigaji picha kwa ajili za kibiashara. Wanyamapori wanaweza kuwa wenye aibu au wakali. Mazingira yanaweza kuwa baridi, joto, au makali kwa vinginevyo.
mt: Wild animals are among the most challenging subjects to photograph, and require a combination of good fortune, patience, experience, and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often easy, but as a whole, photography has value in the thousands. Often, long lenses are required, although groups of animals or small creatures may require shorter lenses. It is difficult to get exotic animals, and sometimes parks have regulations regarding commercial photography. Animals can be shy or aggressive. Environments can be cold, hot, or dangerous.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Yeyote ambaye atakuwa akiendesha gari maeneo yaliyoinuka au vijia vya milimani anastahili kuzingatia uwezekano wa theluji, barafu, na baridi kali. Katika barabara zenye barafu na theluji, msuguano uko chini na huwezi kuendesha gari kana kwamba uko katika lami tupu. Wakati wa barafu nyingi, barafu ya kutosha kukufanya ukwame inaweza kuanguka kwa muda mfupi. Mwonekano unaweza pia kuzuiliwa kupitia kwa kuanguka au kuvumisha theluji au kwa mtonesho au barafu kwenye madirisha ya magari. Kwa upande mwingine, mazingira ya theluji na barafu ni ya kawaida katika mataifa mengi, na uchukuzi huendelea mwaka mzima bila kutatizwa.
mt: Anyone driving in mountainous or snowy areas should be aware of the possibility of snow, ice, and extreme cold. In icy roads, traction is low and you may not be able to drive as if you were on dry pavement. During heavy snowfall, enough snow to cause a brief road closure is possible. Visibility may also be affected by snow or ice on the road or by snow or ice in the windshield. On the other hand, snowy and icy conditions are common in many countries, and driving continues year-round without interruption.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Isipokuwa kama wewe ni mwanadiplomasia, kufanya kazi ughaibuni kwa jumla humaanisha kwamba utalazimika kufaili ushuru wa mapato nchini uliko. Ushuru wa mapato huundwa kwa njia tofauti katika nchi tofauti, na viwango na vikundi vya ushuru hutofautiana pakubwa toka nchi moja hadi nyingine. Katika baadhi ya nchi za shirikisho, kama vile Marekani na Kanada, ushuru wa mapato hutozwa katika ngazi ya shirikisho na pia ngazi ya ndani, kwa hivyo viwango na vikundi vinaweza kutofautiana toka eneo hadi eneo.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, working abroad usually means you will be required to pay income tax in the country where you work. Income tax is formed in different ways in different countries, and tax brackets and categories can vary greatly from country to country. In some countries of the Commonwealth, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied at the federal level and also at the local level, so brackets and categories can vary from area to area.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Maonyesho ya Dunia (kwa kawaida yanajulikana kama World Exposition, au Expo tu) ni tamasha kubwa ya kimataifa ya sanaa na sayansi. Nchi zinazoshiriki huwasilisha maonyesho ya kisanaa na kielimu katika kumbi za kitaifa ili kuonyesha masuala ya kidunia au utamaduni na historia ya nchi yao. Maonyesho ya Kimataifa ya Maua ni matukio maalum ambayo huonyesha maonyesho ya maua, bustani za mimea na kitu chochote kingine kinachohusisha mimea. Ingawa katika nadharia zinaweza kutokea kila mwaka (mradi zako katika nchi tofauti), kwa mazoezi hazipo. Matukio hayo huwa kwa miezi mitatu hadi miezi sita, na hufanyika kwenye maeneo yasiyopungua hekta 50.
mt: A World's Fair (usually known as a World Exposition, or Expo for short) is a large international exhibition designed as an experiential show within a temporary setting. Usually built in a purpose-built exhibition center, World's Fairs have been held since the mid-19th century and remain a common occurrence in many parts of the world. World's Fairs usually celebrate a particular theme, and are usually held in a different city every few years. The most popular World's Fair was the 1958 Brussels World's Fair, which drew 42 million visitors. The most recent World's Fair was the 2010 Shanghai World's Fair, which drew 73 million visitors. World's Fairs are also known as World Expositions, World Expos, Universal Expositions, or International Expositions. ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Ingawa wanyama wengi mbugani wamezoea kuwaona wanadamu, kwa vyovyote wanyapori ni wa mwituni, wala hawastahili kulishwa au kusumbuliwa. Kwa mujibu wa usimamizi wa mbuga, kaa walau yadi/mita 100 mbali na dubu na mbwa mwitu na yadi/mita 25 kutoka kwa wanyama mwitu wengine wote! Haijalishi jinsi watulivu wanavyokaa, baisani, elki, kongoni, dubu, na karibu wanyama wote wakubwa wanaweza kushambulia. Kila mwaka, dazeni za wageni huumia kwa sababu hawakuzingatia umbali unaofaa. Wanyama hawa ni wakubwa, wa mwitu, na uwezekano wa kuwa hatari, kwa hivyo wape nafasi yao. Kwa kuongezea, fahamu kuwa harufu huwavutia dubu na wanyama wengine mwitu, kwa hivyo epuka kubeba au kupika vyakula vyenye harufu na utunze usafi kwenye kambi.
mt: While many wild animals are accustomed to seeing humans, the wild animals are still wild, and should not be approached or disturbed. According to the park's management, stay at least 100 yards (300 feet) away from bears and wolves, and 25 yards away from all other wildlife! No matter how they are behaving, bison, elk, bears, and all other large animals can be dangerous. Every year, visitors are injured because they fail to give wildlife space. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that the smell of food attracts bears and other wildlife, so avoid bringing or cooking food into the campsite.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
